story:
Short Summary

Welcome to our Funding Dock.

The Game Suite is currently a concept. Our Idea is to Fully HiTechnilize (It’s a word I looked it up) Birthday Parties, Family Get together, Graduations, Sales and Grand Openings. Focusing first and foremost on Children’s Birthdays and memories.

[FLASHING BACK]

My Wife and I have 3 Daughters, they get more then the things they need. As a matter of fact my thoughts are the same as most parents, "We all want our Children to have more than the things we did as Children". Technology is awesome these days so much more is possible then when we were growing up in the 70's - 80's. Having said that and realizing what we all do for our children its only rational to believe all parents would do the same. Hence the market and demand is created.

 [CURRENT DAY]

This is where the campaign begins, Now I've seen a few business based off of the same type of concept (All in Huge Big City Markets). The Demand is there. Now we plan to use Our Custom Design and Theme to bring the party strait to our clients door step. That could be a 7 year olds Cinderella Party or a 5 yr olds Bouncing Party. Our design and concept is to be flexible to individualize each and every client ensuing repeat business time and again.

 

Our Dream (My Wife and I) is to own our business and be able to work together. To make things happen together and share these benefits financially as well as charitably. We always want to bring the smiles. Make the Memories of a Life time. Make that day they'll always talk about and remember.

 

What We Need

  • To be honest we are looking at this as a way to bring funding to our idea and to our dream. We’ve tried however unsuccessfully to acquire conventional loans and funding to make this happen. All roads have been dead end. Regardless of that fact we will not give up on this concept and this Goal.
  • Funds will be used two ways.
    • To purchase perks which are being offered.  We have personally created all designs, all are original works.  Estimated Cost of Perks $11,591.00 (Yes the perks work two fold, 1) This puts something in your hands for helping us out, 2) This is Advertising. So in effect every donation is helping in multiple ways.
    • To Start up our businesses
      • Licensing
      • Incorporate
      • Insurance
      • Hardware, Electronics, The Material to build our state of the art System
  • Perks being offered are listed to the Right with description of each. All Orders for Perks will be placed upon completion of this champagne.
 

The Impact

The Impact is Simple, We’re going to Brighten someone’s day Every day. While doing this we will be living our Dream, Working together, being together, making memories together…

  • I do have a full business plan on our concept and business I’ll gladly make this available upon request.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know times are tuff for people and not all can spare financially. No fret you can help anyway. Social Media is in the now. Like us on Facebook (Our Business Facebook account is currently in Design) Share with your friends and family and ask them to pass it on. 

 

Thank You guys for taking the time to Read our Request.  Have a Wonderful Day and don’t forget to Smile…

Thank You guys for taking the time to Read our Request.  Have a Wonderful Day and don’t forget to Smile…

story:
My Story

Hi! I am Brenden Sullivan, a junior who attends high school in Sauk Prairie, Wisconsin â€“ about 30 minutes north of Madison. I am a member of the Sauk Prairie tennis team.

So, why am I posting this? I would like to bring the joys of tennis to kids who may not otherwise have the opportunity to learn this wonderful game. Once you know the basics, tennis is a sport you can play for the rest of your life. Here are a few reasons why I chose tennis

Â· Itâ€™s fun

Â· Itâ€™s social

Â· It improves fitness and promotes a healthy lifestyle

Â· It's a lifetime sport

Â· It helps concentration and focus

Â· Tennis courts are everywhere, especially at schools and public parks

In order to bring the joys abd benefits of tennis to kids that might not otherwise be exposed to it, I need to raise money for rackets and balls.

Once we have the needed equipment, my friends and I will teach the kids to play tennis in a fun, non-threatening yet competitive environment.

Please help us bring the tremendous health, fitness and psychological benefits of tennis to others.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread our message to everyone you know. If you cannot contribute financially, letting others know about this campaign would be greatly appreciated. Help us create opportunities for others.

Letâ€™s make it happen.

Tennis! For the "love" of it.

story:
Fate Of Humankind



Fate Of Humankind is an FPS conceived with a new generation engine.

The game takes the players on a journey through natural disasters such as, tornadoes and tsunamis. Over time, with further investment, additional natural disasters will be added



An outline of the many functionalities of Fate of Humankind

  • - First person shooter
  • - Natural disasters
  • - A new type of gameplay
  • - Compatible for Windows and Mac
  • - Only on Steam at start, and available on PS4 after



Our goal is for Fate Of Humankind to be as realistic and as stunning  as possible. With our team, we conceived a game in which you must pay attention to the natural disasters and the players, which will be very challenging.

The biggest challenge for players will be to be wary of the weather. The player will not be warned of impending weather, they must use thier skills to predict when a disaster arrive. An example of this is during the Tsunami. When the sea is agitated it will be necessary to change your position, to seek higher ground. Your combat will then occur on the roofs.



Alpha will consist of 30% of the total contents :

- Ten weapons will be available

- 3 disasters for the Alpha

- Local servers

- Up to 12 players



The final game will include :

- 7 Disasters

- Around 30 to 50 weapons 

- Land vehicles (armored ...) 

- Complete game's original soundtrack

- 10 Maps 

- Dedicated Server 

This forecast is dependent solely on the success of the proje




‘Backers' will receive a pack of modelled weapons. These will be available only for the backer not sale in steam



Modern futuristic helmet  Version 1


Engineer Concept Version 1


Concept Sniper version 0

 Warrior light armor Version 1
Engineer Concept Version 2

 Warrior Version 1

 Warrior Version 2

 Warrior Version 3

 





List of the catastrophes present at the release of alpha:

- Tsunami

- Earthquake

- Tornado


In Fate Of Humankind the vehicles will be essential in certain circumstances and some maps. Army vehicles are made of strong machine-guns, resistant tires,  and an armor-plated hull so that players are protected from the catastrophes.

List of possible actions while in the vehicle:

- To repair

- To change the wheels

- To add various accessories to maximize the protection or the power of weapons




The system of “spawn” is conceived to be randomised, to make it possible for the player to have a true search. It is planned for beta release to have objects in 3D hidden to find in the debris.

The weapons, are placed at logical places, for example, a weapon will be generally found in a police station (available in final version) 




The day/night cycle will be very important.

During the day various possibilities are offered to you, among these are, to recover objects, and to kill out other players.

At night, visibility will be low. Gameplay will change completely ; the player will have to be discrete and each gesture will be important to maximize their chances of survival.




At the release of alpha Fate Of Humankind will have ten weapons available, which will be followed by regular updates. These updates will add accessories and various interactions.

Our weapons are modelled by our care, they will thus be adapted to offer a new experiment of gameplay.



Our team guarantees frequently updated We are conscious that players occasionally are reluctant to trust “early access” games, therefore,  we will set up a Dev. blog containing all the additions for the future updates.



When you visit our Dev Blog you will be directly informed on new contents which will be added, of any bug discovered and corrected by update. It is a faster means to communicate with you and for you to voice your opinions on various subjects.  



Our team guarantees constant updates We are conscious that players occasionally are reluctant to trust “early access” games, therefore,  we will set up a Dev. blog containing all the additions for the future updates.




If you encounter problems, stand will be set up to help. You will be helped with the ticket system that works constantly. A reply will be sent to you in the shortest time.



If the required goal is not reached, the development will continue, but it will be slower !






Other pledge will be released later


...



- Audrick.l@hotmail.com (Mr Audrick Lenoble)

- squallteamremi@gmail.com (Mr Rémi Brocker)




  • Remi Brocker (Manager, work on engine 3D and in design)

  • Audrick Lenoble (Project Manager, work on the writing and the communication)

  • Alexandre Lenoble (Community managers)

  • Josselin Clairet (Graphic Artist 2D/3D Generalist)
  • Maëlle Gal (CG Artist , concept,modeling,texturing,compositing)

-------------------------


In addition to the five core team members if we reach the threshold of 200,000 euros, your money will help pay our amazing friends and contractors:


  • BASSERY Clement (Modeler decor) that will work for our game already work for games like: Driver, Alone In The Dark ...



                                                             

                                                                       SITE 




                                                              FACEBOOK


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                 VERSION FRANÇAISE DISPONIBLE SUR LE SITE

story:
Short Summary

Infiltration:

The year is 2017. The CIA Has been monitoring the wellbeing of a North Korean military base via satellite. The reason for watching: as one of the USA satellite were passing by it gathered an abundance of corrupt footage. NASA noticed that the base “Mia Minx Zing” were hauling hundreds of prisoners onto the base, with dozens of piles of dead people; like objects burning in the fields. It was evident the North Korean government were testing there biological agents.

To avoid a heighten def-con alert; NASA was forced to draw a mercenaries Social Security Number from the “Hall of Spy’s” to infiltrate the North Korean base. His mission was to figure out exactly what the North Koreans are doing over there. The spy was sent in as a scientist to collect data about the mission at hand. He was in the middle of a Kodak with the president three days ago. We haven’t heard back from our guy in seventy two hours. He’s been ordered to contact the president once every day at noon Western pacific time. We received a Kodak from the North Korean broad of communication. The North Koreans managed to catch our inside man and sentence him to death his execution date is set for tomorrow.

  Just before things went south. He sent in some very disturbing images and footage about the operations taking place inside of that base. The president has given the green light to infiltrate “Mia Minx Zing” and extract our man and return him home.”The in closed objectives are subjects to change”.

What We Need & What You Get

The longest process we face is the creation of the T shirts. We are going to experience a feeling of long windiness with the sticker bundle packages along with the T shirt packages.

- Game/PC/Downloadable Content/ Wire transfer

-T-shirt- 7-10 days to create  

-T-shirt- 7-10 days to deliver

-Stickers bundle- 7-10  to deliver

-Stickers bundle- 7-10 to deliver

-Beta invites = $15 - $25 multi-purpose deductible

story:
Introduction



About The Team


Hello!

We are Dark Energy - an indie video game development studio.

In the studio we are 3 developers: Johnatan, Udi and Jordan. 

We decided to FRESH UP the real time strategy with King Control.



King Control

With King Control, the player can take over the King unit and step into battle.

The King unit hold the Moral for the soldiers - the higher the better.
All units will operate better when high moral is kept.
Keep the king alive to prevent the moral level to reset!

Use the king to win by controlling it and having it sitting on the enemy throne! Be carfull, as in that time the king will be the most vulnerable, and could not be controlled for 1 minute!


Presentation image of stepping into battle with the skeleton king model, as we do not posses the viking king model to date


The King Control As A Game Changer:

King Control will be a key feature in the game. 
In order to win, the player will have to use the king and have it sit on the enemy's throne.
Also, players have the ability to aid attack units, thus change the endgame of EVERY battle! 
It is a fresh view for the Real Time Strategy genre. We believe that the Third Person elements will gain every player endless re-play-ability.  

Players will feel the epic battles that the Real Time Strategy genre has to offer like never before.


About The Game:


The game is set during the period after the expansion of the Vikings.

A group of Vikings were sent North to conquer new lands. Sailing for many days, they eventually  discovered the perfect settlement. Unaware that a life long curse on the land they were going to inhabit had turned the native population into hibernating dead-walkers. Now reawakened, the dead-walkers have one primary objective- the elimination of the invaders.


The player will build a settlement, create an army, and will take control of the land.



What You Get

Check out what is special in each perk we offer:
  • The "Big Thank You" Perk will get you our warm love, and a nice email to let you know when the game is done!

  • If you are as excited as us, and would like to enter the game, the "Get The Game!" Perk will get you one key, once the game is released!

  • Looking for some action even earlier? Get the "Beta Access!"
    Perk to get into our closed beta

  • The "Special Thanks In The Credits" Perk will get your name under our "Special Thanks To" in the credits section

  • Got a partner? Grab the "Two Pack" Perk to share the fun among you!

  • Don't wait in line! "Fast Track!" Perk will get you
    into the game a day earlier than anyone else.

  • "4 Pack" Perk will get the game to you and 3 of your best friends!

  • Looking to leave a mark? You can design an Easter Egg anywhere in the
    game for others to find! Remember, make it a challenge! Grab the "Easter Egg" Perk Now!

  • If you want to hear how it is like to make a game, firsthand account,
    grab the "Premium Pack" for an half an hour chat with us.

  • The "Design a Map!" and "Choose Your Upgrades" (SOLD OUT) Perks will give you the opportunity to leave a distinguish mark than any other perk! Help to design a map, according to the game's style, OR participate in our conversation about building upgrades and express your input about our ideas!

    • In case we do not reach our goal limit, all funds gathered will be
    spent on the 3D characters purchase. We will gather the rest of the funds from
    other private investors.



    The Part You Play

    What your money will be used for?



    Last but not least, we would need some budget to create a website for the game, and advertise it.




    Risks & Challenges


    1. The project is going to be published in Steam. Steam uses "Greenlight" to decide the games that
      will eventually make it available to the store. Not passing the vote is a big risk
      In case we won't pass it for some time, we will enable to download the game from a future website we will establish.

    2. Moreover, if we don't reach our funding, we will have to find alternative ways
      to get the rest of the funding for the game.


    Other Ways You Can Help


    It's OK if you can't support us with money, but it doesn't mean that you can't help us!

    Sometimes, a small share on a social network such as Facebook, Twiter, Google+, etc', can help more than anything.


    We will be thankful should you use any of the IndieGogo share tools to share our project anywhere, anytime.




    With King Control, the player can take over the King unit and step into battle. The King unit hold the Moral for the soldiers - the higher the better. All units will operate better when high moral is kept. Keep the king alive to prevent the moral level to reset! If you manage to get the king onto the enemies throne you win. The player has multiple challenging obstacles preventing this adding to a great gaming experience.

In case we won't pass it for some time, we will enable to download the game from a future website we will establish.

 Moreover, if we don't reach our funding, we will have to find alternative waysto get the rest of the funding for the game.





Other Ways You Can Help

It's OK if you can't support us with money, but it doesn't mean that you can't help us!
Sometimes, a small share on a social network such as Facebook, Twiter, Google+, etc', can help more than anything.

We will be thankful should you use any
of the IndieGogo share tools to share our project anywhere, anytime.










With King Control, the player can take over the King unit and step into battle. The King unit hold the Moral for the soldiers - the higher the better. All units will operate better when high moral is kept. Keep the king alive to prevent the moral level to reset! If you manage to get the king onto the enemies throne you win. The player has multiple challenging obstacles preventing this adding to a great gaming experience.

story: PP
story_txt: PP

story:
The Game

The first title we’re working on is called Aztec Defence (working name only), a 2d platformer tower defence game for the PC, which focuses on constructing defences mid battle, as opposed to other tower defence titles which have instant trap building.

The player takes control of Tonza, an Aztec mason whose daughter was taken for the sun sacrifice. After being refused to take her place, Tonza rebels against the priests and takes control of the temple. This stopped the sacrifice, but he now must defend the temple against the gods' wrath.

Armed with only a bow and a hammer, Tonza must build traps and defences to hold back the invaders until the sun rises. Only through showing the townspeople that the sun will rise without sacrifice is he able to gain their support in disconnecting their town from the gods, and the priests they channel through.

We will be updating with a video of the game and some extra info soon.

 

Features

The base features for the game include;

  • 2D side scrolling action
  • Construction of traps and defences
  • Multiple levels/paths for enemies to take
  • Variety of traps that require construction (time) to build
    • Upgrade tree for each trap that will alter its abilities (e.g. Applying poison to standard spikes, Reinforcing barricades to withstand more damage, etc.) 
  • Gold system, for purchasing traps and upgrades.
  • Ranged combat

With funding beyond our target we will be offering extra content and features which are outlined below under Milestones.

 

Alpha Access

Once you contribute go to www.ImmortalGames.com.au and sign up using the same email that you used to contribute. We will cross check registrations and funders, then update your account to give you access to the current pre-alpha build. Thanks for your support!

 

Little bit about us

Immortal Games was founded by Nicholas Stone and Grant Johnson, two graduates from Qantm College Brisbane. Nick is the designer/artist and sound guy while Grant is the coding wizard.

We decided to try our hand at Indie development, while we we're still accustomed to living off two-minute noodles (from 2 years of fulltime of study). Why are we going PC, instead of jumping on the mobile bandwagon? Two simple answers, there is a massive amount of developers flooding the mobile market, making it harder for emerging studios to be seen, but secondly, and most importantly, is the fact that our passion is with PC development. We are using an in-house engine (The Immortal Engine), which is being developed by Grant. While this means that our initial plans are to focus on PC, the engine has been designed in a way to make adding Mac support at a later date much easier. Writing these plug-ins, however, is a lengthy process.

 

Why we need the money?

The funding we’re asking for will allow us to focus on developing the game fulltime and purchasing a few licenses required to publish the game. In short though, we need to eat and pay rent. The amount of money raised will allow us to add more features and expand the content of the game.

 

Milestones

$2000 goal

The lowest amount of money we need to complete the project is $2000. With this we will include;

  • 10 level story mode, introducing traps and enemies as the player progresses
  • 5 traps, each with a variety of upgrades
    • Stake /arrow trap
    • Barricade
    • Thorn bush
    • Spring launcher
    • Rotating blades
  • 5 Enemy types
  • Endless mode

$5000 goal

The next goal is set at $5000. With this amount we will be adding;

  • 10 extra story levels
  • 10 extra traps, each with a variety of upgrades
    • We will update and list once we finalise which traps will be included (some possible concepts for now are; wall spikes, hanging boulders (that will drop onto enemies) and villagers as AI that can block paths, attack or heal).
  • 10 extra Enemy types
    • We will update and list once we finalise which enemies will be included
  • 5 masks of power
    • Each mask can be swapped to change the types of moves Tonza can use (Also a super special secret ability that will be totally awesome)
    • Pillar of creation mode
      • In this mode, player must collect resources to build and maintain a tower that is under constant attack

$8000+

Our last goal is set at $8000 where we will be adding the following;

  • Full animated story sections
  • Extra mini-games focused on construction and defence
  • More enemies and locations

Due to the amount of time required to add Mac support to the engine we won’t be able to create a Mac version for a while without funding well beyond the $8000 mark. We can’t tell you exactly how much as we don’t really know yet ourselves as making the game for PC is the first priority but if we get enough we will let you all know.

 

Rewards

Design a trap: if you selected the design a trap reward there are some simple guides.

  1. It has to be something that can be anchored to the ground or background wall.
  2. It can’t be large than twice the width of the player and the same height (256x256px max)
  3. Ideally Aztec themed would be great, but we want to let you be creative, so we aren't against mixed theme traps.
  4. No copyrighted, trademarked or inappropriate material as we can’t legally include it

Otherwise go crazy!

Design a monster: if you selected the monster design reward these are the guides.

  1. Limited in size to just larger than the player (128x256px or 256x128px max)
  2. Ranged attacks are allowed
  3. No copyrighted, trademarked or inappropriate material as we can’t legally include it
Please note, the traps and enemies you make will not appear in the main story mode. This is due to the fact that it would make story progression and immersion very difficult if we have laser beam shooting traps, attacking 18 eyed aliens =D. Your traps and enemies will, however, show up in the other game modes for everyone to see. (We are also considering adding a 'parallel universe' version of the story mode. In which everything is exactly the same, except you are allowed to ruin the story with your custom traps =P).

Become a priest:
If you selected to be a priest then all you have to do is email us an image of yourself or a drawing of the facial features you want the priest to have (appropriate material only) and it will be drawn up in the style of the game.

 

Technical info

As this is the first game being developed with our in-house engine, we will only be supporting PC's that are running DirectX11 capable operating systems. This means it will only run on Windows Vista SP2 and Windows 7 machines.

 

Visit our website at: www.immortalGames.com.au

Jump on the forum and leave comments about the game, good, bad, useful or just random.

story:
IMAGINATION & CREATIVITY ‘THINKING OUTSIDE THE BOX’



The Lock Sphere is a living Sphere Mind Game/Brain Teaser - which literally forces you to think outside the box!

Measuring just three inches in diameter, the Lock Sphere contains multiple high sensitivity sensors that can feel the slightest vibrations to knowing the color of the sky. 

The Lock Sphere empowers you to see things in a new and unique way while you have fun! It will give you the impulse to explore creative and imaginative everyday and abstract problems.



What is Lock Sphere?
Our journey started when we were looking for a smarter game, a game that would force us to think outside the box both mentally and physically. We wanted mind games and puzzles that incorporated today's advanced technology. That’s what Lock Sphere is,
A New Game with No Obvious Solution.


How Does The Sphere Work ?

The Sphere is shipped locked and ready to be used. It is marked by symbols, which you will use to find the solution that will force the Sphere to unlock and split.

Every Sphere has its own solution. You may need to move it to a specific place, specific conditions, certain angles, wait a certain amount of time or any other variety of factors. The Sphere will sense everything around you, so every step counts.



Are you up for the Challenge?

The Lock Sphere is the result of precision wood tooling on two precise hemispheres combined with a 4mm center disc that holds the core of the Sphere, a variety of delicate sensors and pulsating LED’s. The LED's are designed to provide beautiful ambient lightning & feedback to user about Game Progress, Stages Completed and Charging status. 



Paired with Soft Optic Fiber Lighting Rods that Stretches from the Center of the Sphere's to the Outer Shell - The Sphere looks like a work of art on any desk. It starts conversations, and completes a room all by itself.




The Sphere Futures:



Open Source Hardware

The EX1 Sphere is designed to have Arduino based OS. You will be able to reprogram the system, meaning once you succeed in opening the Sphere - You can create endless new challenging games for friends & family.


360° Sensing Abilities  

The Sphere contains multiple high sensitivity sensors that provides full 360 Degrees Sensing Abilities. The Sphere’s top breather holes are precisely angled and aimed to the core of the sphere in order for the sensors to collect info in real time.


Wireless Charging

Powered by a 3.7 Lipo battery, providing 12 Continuous Hours of Play Time and has Wireless Charging Capability with the Supplied Charging Base. Charging the Sphere is done simply by placing the Sphere in its base


Two Difficulty Levels


The SP Spheres have many sensors installed- but each sphere is marked with a different single symbol that represents a hint about how to get started. There are total of 5 SP Single Symbol Spheres - five different and very challenging spheres to solve!

Expert mode EX1 - For the more hardcore seasoned player in us all, the EX1 is packed with even more electronics and is fine tuned to absolute sensing of the environment as well as location.  It has features and sensing abilities that the SP sphere does not have.


Suitable for all ages




We Need Your Help

Although Lock Sphere is designed and ready for distribution, we still need funds to put into promotion and marketing so we can build an audience. We’d like to offer as many incentives as possible for those who are able to donate the money we will need to make this happen. The funds gathered from this campaign will produce our first batch of Spheres in our US factory and go towards letting the world know that this solution exists. The more we can produce in a single run, the cheaper the price per unit will be! Take advantage of the special low prices we are offering during this campaign, because you won’t always be able to get Lock Sphere this cheap. 


Tell Your Friends

You should already see the enormous value of Lock Sphere. We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations to the world through the crowdfunding model. We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world. Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.

Indiegogo backers will be the world's first to have Lock Sphere. You will be a big part of bringing a fresh new product to the market. You can help us evolve the Sphere! We are open to fresh ideas & looking forward to work with our backers in the future! The sphere’s possibilities are endless.




Prototyping 

We have been Working on the Sphere for the Past Year and have Come a Long Way. We Invested a lot of Time in Building the Lock Sphere to Perfection and Performing Extensive Testing of the Spheres with Various Combinations of Sensors.  We can Honestly say that we're Truly Amazed by the Final Result! 



Timeline

We are marking July 2015 as our deadline for our delivery date and we intend to keep it at that deadline for our backers.  


Rewards

Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose when you support us, 


Stretch Goals

We thought about what could be the next step for the sphere, besides constantly updating sensor combinations and sphere operations, We will offer different wood options and colors for our $25,000 Stretch Goal! 

But what excites us the most is to introduce the All Aluminum EX1a for our $50,000 Stretch Goal; 



Our Referral Program is now LIVE !



    Other Ways You Can Help ?

    Just spread the word!

    By Sharing the Link to Our Campaign on your favorite Social Network

    ~ Facebook ~

    ~ Twitter ~

story:
IMAGINE. CREATE. PLAY.

EnGeniux is proud to introduce our new next generation game console - OTON X. OTON X will be the first smart autonomous game console. What does this mean? OTON X will be able to self-create games instantly within minutes without human input. No drag or drop requirements. Do you want to play a new 2D or 3D action game instantly? OTON X has you covered! How about a new racing game? Or a new 3D alien shooter game? No problem, OTON X can do it!  The best thing about OTON X is that all OTON X games are 100% free. Imagine a world where every single day you could play a new exclusive EnGeniux OTON X game free of charge. 

EXPLORE OPEN SOURCE FROM A NEW VERTICAL

Mod the OTON X games you play from our network or resell games with your own custom user content levels, characters and power-ups. Developing games for OTON X does not require any special programming skills. Create new worlds, new challenges and new characters then share the entire experience with your friends on OTON X. Need more games? Don’t worry. The OTON X console will support Linux, Android and 3rd party games. The EnGeniux team will also produce new first party games with OTON X game update modules.

OTON X BETA

This is a first for a crowdfunding project. When you back the OTON X project you become eligible to become an OTON X beta tester to test the user interface, game creation and new updates. With this incentive backers are helping with feedback and providing suggestions as we develop the final hardware and software builds. We feel that while you wait on us to complete the project you should have the ability to login to our beta server and provide vital input to make this project a success.

WHERE YOU COME IN

We have sourced a leading contract manufacturer to develop, assemble and package the units to our exact specifications. However, we need your help to go from a working prototype to a full scale production and to get volume discounts so we can offer OTON X units for the lowest retail pricing possible. Your pledge will go towards hardware production and other related testing requirements. What really makes OTON X special is our custom operating system which goes hand-in-hand with the specialized PCB quad-core chipset. Our ten years of experience in game development and manufacturing will help us successfully deliver this amazing platform to our backers. 


*Donate today! The OTON console will retail for $179, $379 and $479 in 2014. Plus, all supporters get an upgraded package which includes more cloud storage, physics and game enhancements for the life of their console!!!

**Unfortunately we have to ask all our international supporters to add $30 for shipping outside the U.S. for all systems and all supporters must add $30 for extra game controllers if not listed with package.)

MEDIA

Blackmannrobin.com

Ubergizmo.com

OTON  X SPECIFICATIONS:

*Specifications can change before release.

  • OTON Operating System (Ubuntu Linux)
  • Quad-core (4 + 1 power-saving core) Four CPU cores are built in the ARM Cortex-A9 micro-architecture, and are clocked at 1.2 GHz
  • 1-HDMI 1.4a display output supporting digital resolutions up to 1920 x 1200 pixels
  • 3-USB 2.0 (Two Standard A, one micro-USB)
  • 1-Ethernet port
  • Stereo analog and multi-channel digital (SPDIF)(3 port channel)
  • MULTIPLAYER GAMING EXPERIENCE Optimized by GamerPeer
OPTICAL DRIVE
  • No optical disc drive
STORAGE
  • OTON Cloud Storage (2 GB storage free)
  • USB storage device
  • 16 GB Flash Storage
OTON FRONT PORTS
  • 2-SD card slots (Front)
DIMENSIONS
  • 205 mm or 8.07 inches (8in x 8in) (L x W)
  • 53 mm or 2.08 inches high
CONNECTIVITY
  • Wifi 802.11a/b/g/n
  • 2.4 GHz wireless
SYNC
  • Sync with certified OTON tablet, mobile, PC and console devices
STAND
  • System can be position vertically or horizontal
  • Rear Projection Camera and 2 built-in front microphones /camera for voice and motion gameplay. (Not in all models)
*Specifications can change without notice.
* Default colors for consoles are matte Black and Two tone gray.

Risks and Challenges

The biggest challenge with OTON X was producing its next generation software and a functional prototype. We have a proven concept, that went through three years of iterations and we are currently finalizing the board design. The final product may slightly differ in size (may be bigger) and performance (may be faster). 

The boards are pre-examined and verified with hardware specialist at a New Jersey based manufacturing company, where we decided to produce the boards. Our funding goals cover a minimal batch of systems, programming, FCC/UL testing and packaging.

We plan to finish the production of the basic OTON X in July 2014; we left enough time until the release to solve any unexpected problems.Our current team has over 10 years of manufacturing and developing history. If needed, our talented team with a diverse set of skills will do a great job in problem solving. Our goal is to have units ready in 2014 for backers.

manufacturing will help us successfully deliver this amazing platform to our backers.  

*Donate today! The OTON console will retail for $179, $379 and $479 in 2014. Plus, all supporters get an upgraded package which includes more cloud storage, physics and game enhancements for the life of their console!!!
**Unfortunately we have to ask all our international supporters to add $30 for shipping outside the U.S. for all systems and all supporters must add $30 for extra game controllers if not listed with package.)
MEDIA
Blackmannrobin.com
Ubergizmo.com
 OTON  X SPECIFICATIONS: 

*Specifications can change before release.

OTON Operating System (Ubuntu Linux) 
Quad-core (4 + 1 power-saving core) Four CPU cores are built in the ARM Cortex-A9 micro-architecture, and are clocked at 1.2 GHz
1-HDMI 1.4a display output supporting digital resolutions up to 1920 x 1200 pixels
3-USB 2.0 (Two Standard A, one micro-USB)
1-Ethernet port
Stereo analog and multi-channel digital (SPDIF)(3 port channel)

MULTIPLAYER GAMING EXPERIENCE Optimized by GamerPeer

 OPTICAL DRIVE 
        No optical disc drive STORAGE 
        
OTON Cloud Storage (2 GB storage free)
USB storage device
16 GB Flash Storage
 OTON FRONT PORTS 
        2-SD card slots (Front) DIMENSIONS 
        
205 mm or 8.07 inches (8in x 8in) (L x W)
53 mm or 2.08 inches high
 CONNECTIVITY 
        
Wifi 802.11a/b/g/n
2.4 GHz wireless
 SYNC 
        Sync with certified OTON tablet, mobile, PC and console devices STAND 
        System can be position vertically or horizontal
Rear Projection Camera and 2 built-in front microphones /camera for voice and motion gameplay. (Not in all models)
*Specifications can change without notice.* Default colors for consoles are matte Black and Two tone gray. Risks and ChallengesThe biggest challenge with OTON X was producing its next generation software and a functional prototype. We have a proven concept, that went through three years of iterations and we are currently finalizing the board design. The final product may slightly differ in size (may be bigger) and performance (may be faster). The boards are pre-examined and verified with hardware specialist at a New Jersey based manufacturing company, where we decided to produce the boards. Our funding goals cover a minimal batch of systems, programming, FCC/UL testing and packaging.We plan to finish the production of the basic OTON X in July 2014; we left enough time until the release to solve any unexpected problems.Our current team has over 10 years of manufacturing and developing history. If needed, our talented team with a diverse set of skills will do a great job in problem solving. Our goal is to have units ready in 2014 for backers.

story:
NEW CAMPAIGN IS UP NOW! CLICK HERE!

 

 The Ultimate Retro Old School Computer Fantasy Roleplaying Game in Development For More Than 17 Years Is Now Approaching Completion!!!

FULL FLEDGED DEMO IN NEW RESOLUTION WITH CHARACTER CREATION WILL BE RELEASED TO PUBLIC VERY SOON!!

COMPLETION NOT SUBJECT TO FUNDING!! THIS GAME WILL SHIP IN MAY 2013 WITH OR WITHOUT ENHANCEMENT!! A PLEDGE HERE WILL BE FULFILLED. THIS CAMPAIGN IS NOT A FUNDING FOR COMPLETION, IT IS A FUNDING FOR ENHANCEMENT!!! COMPLETION IS GUARANTEED HERE! SEE VIDEO FOR DETAILS.

Review Of Grimoire Gameplay On YouTube

Update #1 : Sooper Seekret Teknologee Review

Having self-funded the entire development of the game over the past 17 years out of our own pockets we are now turning to crowdfunding to put the final polish on the game before delivering it to fans worldwide who have been waiting on the game for more than a decade. A pledge to the game will secure you a one-of-a-kind collector's edition of the resulting masterpiece and a guarantee that the completed product will be artistically perfect. Only pledges will get DRM-free copies of Grimoire once it is completed.

Grimoire is a turn-based, 3D, first person perspective roleplaying adventure in 1024x768 256 Color graphics. The 3D step-based engine is pixel perfect and smooth scrolling with zero distortion handcrafted images.

The style of play is very similar to that of CRPGS during the golden age of computer roleplaying before 1992 like Eye of the Beholder, Bane of the Cosmic Forge, Crusaders of the Dark Savant, Might & Magic, The Bard's Tale, Stonekeep and other classic games.

The emphasis in the game is on the story, exploration, discovery, character advancement, puzzle solving, strategic phased combat, treasure hunting, inventory management and interaction with the non-player characters encountered during play.

Noteworthy Features:

  • 600 hours of play possible in a single game
  • 244+ Maps in the game to explore!
  • Turn-Based strategic combat
  • 144 context sensitive magic spells
  • 14 races, 15 professions, 50 skills
  • 64 intelligent NPCs with 8000+ Words in Vocabulary
  • Full Sentence Communication with NPCs
  • 240+ monsters each with special powers and defenses
  • 1000+ items, Carry Containers, Global Party Inventory
  • 30 conditions, from Confusion to Disease & Lycanthropy
  • Automapping, Autowalking, Autohealing
  • Global Map Atlas With Position Marker
  • Quest Journal, Hint Prompting, Help Facility, Mini-Quests
  • Complex LockPicking Interfaces for Doors & Chests
  • Challenging Puzzles and Rich Interactive Dungeons
  • Browsable Character Library for up to 100 characters
  • Up to 12 Commented Postage Stamped Savegames
  • Multi-themed GUI and customizable screen layouts

Enhancements Planned During Next Six Months :

  1. Increase screen resolution to 1024x768 and viewport size to 720x600 (*Done!*)
  2. All new title screen with animated logo
  3. New animated intro, cutscenes and in-game animation sequences
  4. Integration of additional monster and magic spell animations
  5. Improvements to animation engine and transitions
  6. Detailed improvements to user interface and icon presentation

Achievement of Funding Goals :

  1. New music score & sound effects
  2. Additional animation sequences to enhance all aspects of gameplay
  3. Possible ports to IOS, Linux, IPad and Android platforms
  4. Work begins immediately on sequel after release

The Story

The game is set in a world called Hyperborea, which in the early part of its history endured a savage period of unbridled warfare that nearly razed the continent.

There is a reason this state of war existed, a prime mover as it were, a force that promulgated hatred, fear and hostility. We don't find out what it is until much later in the game at the climax, but this force once threatened to destroy all relationships between living creatures in the distant past.

The guardian of the world of Hyperborea, a minor divinity known as the White Owl and also the Winged Exemplar, knew that he had to do something to counteract the unceasing carnage before there was nothing left worth defending. He came up with a solution ... he approached the Goddess of the Moon and asked her to sacrifice the Moon Clock, also called the "Metronome Mysterium," the clock that kept time for the various lunar phases. This clock would juxtapose the balance of chaos and entropy in Hyperborea with a generous measure of order, law and harmony.

After the goddess of the moon showed the White Owl how to wind the clock, he returned to the land below with it and concealed it deep within the earth, far from the eyes of mortals. Almost as soon as the clock began to keep time, the bloody wars of succession began to recede and were replaced by a loose set of peaceful alliances and territorial restrictions amongst the many races that inhabited the land. Even the martial Naga, the snake people, retreated to a distant tower across the waters and initiated no further wars on the mainland.

The White Owl knew that he had not solved the basic problem, merely thwarted it with a sort of cosmic counterweight. He knew that if the Clock of Fate ever wound down, the wars and violence would return. Being a wise old bird but absentminded, he decided to write the secret of the Clock's location on nine stone tablets and then scatter these tablets throughout the land so that no unworthy spirit would ever find them but he could recover them when he needed them again.

The problem that developed is that the Winged Exemplar was even more absentminded than he realized - after a thousand years, he forgot where he put the tablets. Kind of like putting a string on your finger - then forgetting to look at the finger!

When we begin the game, the Clock of Fate is winding down, the harrowing shadow of war hangs over the continent and the many races have cut off contact with one another or begun engaging in skirmishes over territory and resources. There are cutthroats abroad, sinister conspiracies afoot and bizarre religious cults gaining in numbers.

The only hope for Hyperborea of course, is for us to find the nine tablets, discover the secret hiding place of the Metronome Mysterium and wind it once again. The problem is that we are not the only ones seeking the tablets. We are competing with thieves, assassins, spies and well-intentioned busybodies who are also looking for the tablets. If they get the tablets first, we may have to fight everybody and their brother to get them back.

Along the way we'll discover an enormous number of subplots, lessons in Hyperborean history, the underground kingdom of Samhain, demons from another plane of reality, alien bounty hunters, Shelach the Spider Queen and her one-eyed master the Psychopomp, The Ghost City of Gideon, the Soul-Eater Grendel, The Tower of Bahomet and probably have to kill several discount local gods to succeed, as well as a wide array of mythical beasts native to the continent.

 

What was the original design philosophy behind the game?

"CORE PRINCIPLES"

We wrote these down in January 1995 and have referred back to them constantly as the bible in creating the Grimoire universe ...
 
The point of this game is to have fun inside a huge, sprawling fantasy adventure that is so immersive it serves as a completely shameless escape from the real world that lasts a long, long time. It should not try to be an action game, an FPS shooter, a puzzle game or a hidden object game. It should stick to being a turn-based 1st person fantasy roleplaying game. Nothing should be calculated for its appeal, rather the acid test is does it make the game more fun and more interesting. Everything else must go.
 
The game must never look like it was under adult supervision at any point. The world of Grimoire will contain many incongruous elements from different aspects of sci-fi, fantasy and even horror. The purpose of this fantasy is to be fantastic in Grimoire. Nothing should be judged worthwhile because of what people say or whether it conforms to any genre. The only requirement is for this world to be true to itself and to the vision of it's author. Whether or not anybody finds it appealing will be determined by the reaction to the game when it is released.

There must never be anything that can be done at any time during gameplay or anything that can occur that can mess up game logic so badly that the game cannot be completed.

Do not construct linear frames of reference that assume the player has proceeded along one narrow path of events before they arrive at a given cell or generate a particular event. Avoid constructing rails that the player has to follow to advance in the game.

Never enforce solutions of any one puzzle in a predefined way. All puzzles and challenges should have at least one alternative way of being solved. The obstacles to further progression that have only one solution should be in the minority.

The scenario must permit almost any avenue of exploration to be chosen at any time. No challenge should frustrate the player to where they feel obliged to give up. It should be easy to return to any area or puzzle whenever the player desires.

Moral or reasonable behaviour should be encouraged according to the same incentives present in real life but no penalties should ever apply for immoral or destructive behaviour. Each and any style of play should be open and unfettered, restricted only by the natural hazards the player creates for themselves.

A large part of the gameplay and scenario is to be reserved purely for discovery and delight. It should be possible to play the game many times without finding some of the very best treasures, encounters and areas.

The items are to be protected by a lock that forbids their sale if they are critical. An optional configuration should notify the player if they attempt to drop a critical item. Likewise, an item once used for it's intended purpose in a critical regard to completion of the game, if it does not vanish, should then become marked as uncritical and be available to sell for profit or discard at will.

Non-Player opposition characters should not gain access to critical areas and items until the player has opened these routes by exploring those venues. This will keep tensions riding high and make advantages either way seem very marginal. Non-Player characters should not behave in any fashion that indicates that they have any more information than the player about locations, items and solutions to puzzles. The Non-Player AI should operate within the same limitations as the players themselves.

Maps must always be designed with spaces in mind, not merely collections of corridors or tunnels interrupted by rooms. This is the first principle of all good architecture. Think of the way the various spaces relate to each other and what common factors make them all part of the same place.


 

If you're wondering why we claim Grimoire is one of the greatest classic style fantasy roleplaying games ever created, look at this comparison with other classic RPGs and decide for yourself if Grimoire really is the largest, richest, most detailed and complex computer roleplaying game ever made.

CRPG Total Hours Of Play Classes Races Spells NPCs Max Party Size Character Library Combat Recruit NPCs into Party Automap Autoheal Autowalk
Grimoire 600+ 15 14 144 65 8 Yes Turn Based Yes (30+) Y,Y,Y
WizardryVII: Crusaders of the Dark Savant 400+ 14 11 96 30+ 6 Yes Turn Based No Y?,N,N
WizardryVI: Bane of the Cosmic Forge 80+ 14 11 96 30+ 6 Yes Turn Based No N,N,N
Arena 100+ 18 8 N/A N/A 1 No Real Time No Y,N,N
Blade of Destiny 50+ 16 16 100? 30+ 8 Yes Turn Based Yes, Limited Y,N,N
Ultima Underworld 50+ 8 8 25 20+ 1 No Real Time No Y,N,N
World of Xeen 300+ 10 5 76 20+ 6 Yes Turn Based No Y,N,N
Eye of the Beholder 80+ 6 6 82 N/A 6 No Real Time Yes N,N,N
Lands of Lore 40+ 4 4 7 N/A 4 No Real Time Yes Y,Y?,N
Menzobarranzan 60+ 6 6 100+ 16+ 4 No Real Time Yes Y,N,N

There are too many features in Grimoire not found in any previous roleplaying game to list them all in this chart. Grimoire is the product of over 17 years of work and it would be impossible to describe all of the special details which are found in the game.

story:
Welcome to the Dimiria Indiegogo Fund Raising Campaign

Firstly, allow us to humbly introduce ourselves, we are Softnetix Entertainment, a small indie game development team.  We are  very passionate about games and having played numerous online/offline fantasy games, we decided to come together to develop our own game. The Dimiria Project is our pioneer project and we started it because we wanted to create a game that is not only enjoyable and exciting to play, but also somewhat unique than the rest of similar titles. 

WHAT IS DIMIRIA ALL ABOUT?

Dimiria: The Agrarian Falls is a single player 3D action packed RPG (role playing game) based an original story written by Dylan Tan (that’s me!) and David McCrae. Dimiria uses a dark medieval fantasy theme and it’s based on an adventure story about the rise of a group of heroes who, together, set out to save the kingdom.  


Feature of Dimiria:

  • DRM-Free, and available on PC and Mac

  • Not another generic fantasy RPG. The world of Dimiria is anything but boring. We have spent countless hours in studying, planning and revising the world of Dimiria with one goal in mind, and that is to make Dimiria interesting, different and importantly exciting to play.

  • Awesome Fast pace action oriented combat with companions! There are three classes of heroes that player could choose from (the Fighter, Mage and Rogue). Each of these heroes has their own set of specialties and abilities, leading to unique gameplay. The player will encounter a total of eight companions throughout the course of the game. These companions will during all subsequent quests, fight alongside the player.

  • Travel across various and carefully crafted landscapes. Explore the widely varied terrain of Dimiria, rugged mountains, scorching deserts and hazardous jungles. Embark on an epic quest to save Dimiria from the havoc and destruction that besets the kingdom of Andhere Terrae. With a group of loyal friends fend off the invasion of the Hiristian army.

  • Emphasis on story. Dimiria is a thrilling dark fantasy story with danger lurking round every corner. Rampant with magic and incredible creatures, we promise an interesting plot and unique gameplay.

If you interested to find a little more about our game, we have a lots more information published at our official website (www.dimiria.com).   Please feel free to visit us there :)


Carefully Crafted Landscape


Never give up, never surrender!

Taste of my wrath!

WHAT ARE THE FUNDS BEING SPENT ON?

Since the inception of this project thus far, the project has been almost 100% self funded, and while we do have sufficient funds to see us through to the final stages of development, additional funds would be required to put in the finishing touches and also to launch the game itself. At the time of this writing, Dimiria is already at Pre-Alpha stage and  we estimate that by the end of this campaign (next 30 days), we will reach late Alpha stage and possibly reaching to an early Beta.  We have put a lot of effort into making this game and we are still working hard to make this a better game. The main plot, storyboard and design are all complete, however there is still work to be done to further fix bugs, polishing, and optimization and this also adding additional features into the game.

In the next coming months (after the funds being raised), we will start looking into further enhancing and polishing the world maps/landscape even further, improving the character motion (i.e. animation), adding more special effects (i.e. particle effects for spells, and as such), unique sounds (i.e. sound FX), character voices (to give life to the characters), and of course impactful music. The fund would also be used to purchase additional arts and digital assets, and additional technology for the game. The more funds we have, the better polish the game would be and we hope to create an outstanding game both in term of graphics and gameplay.



We will provide weekly updates exclusively to indiegogo backers. We are committed to total transparency, ensuring that backers get accurate information regarding game development. There will also be a private online community set up for the backers to discuss the project and air their thoughts regarding the game's content and direction. Backers will also have access to help test the game once a beta is available. Once the game is finished, backers will receive the completed version.

REWARDS FOR OUR CONTRIBUTORS

This whole experience is being offered for a backer contribution of at least $15. For anyone who wants to contribute above and beyond this amount, we have a selection of premium rewards ranging from Premium/Special Edition Box, Unique Posters, T-Shirts and original Hard Cover Concept Art (which include summary of each chapters), and all will be signed by us. These items are EXCLUSIVE only for the campaign and won't be made available after the game is launched. We are going with digital distribution via games distribution portal when the game is ready for launch.



We would have to charge an additional fee for all international addresses wishing to receive the perks for the $30 and above. For those levels, please add a $15 flat shipping fee to your pledge. We are so sorry for the inconvenience…

FREQUENT ASKED QUESTION (FAQ)

Q: So how the gameplay going to be like?
A: There three main elements to Dimiria’s gameplay, which is sound familiar to any RPG fan: exploration, combat, and questing. While exploring, you’ll control a single hero (in third person, over-the-shoulder view which can be rotated around the active character) who explores various unique lands, caverns, dungeons and castles while fighting large numbers of enemies and collecting equipments, gold, and other items. The player assumes the role of a warrior, mage or rogue.   

Q: Where do I join the discussion community?
A: Right over http://dimiria.com/index.php/component/users/?v.... Just make sure to use the same email account associated with your indiegogo account.

Q: What happens if you go over the goal?
A: The extra money will be put back into the game. The higher it goes, the better we could make the game!

Q: When can I expect the game to be finished?
A: We were aiming to finish in November of 2012, but if in light of the increased budget, we're planning on expanding production to ensure we make the best game possible.

Q: What are the system requirements for Dimira?
A: While we don't yet know the exact numbers (and we're still actively optimizing the game). We'll give you specifics as soon as we know ourselves.

Q: What are the guidelines for Naming NPC, Weapon, Location or Quest?
A: To keep it simple we'd like to keep it to three (3) simple guidelines:

  • No sexual content (sorry). That means no genitals, innuendo or implied phallus hidden in the negative space.
  • No trademarked or otherwise plagiarized name for character names, location.
  • Try to keep things in a vaguely appropriate theme and “Non-modern” theme. For mini quest, it should be parallel with the main story medieval fantasy theme. We could not and will not make unrealistic quest such as “fly a plane” but as long it is doable, we will figure out a way to do them.

THANK YOU

We consider ourselves extremely fortunate to have this opportunity to be able to share our project with you. Rest assure, we'll do everything we can to create a game that we all can be proud of, a one of its kind unique RPG, and most importantly, one that is enjoyable and meaningful to you. After a year of development, we are very proud of what we’ve accomplished, but we still have a long journey ahead of us to complete the game. We want to share that journey with you, and we’re glad to have you along for the ride.

Feel free to contact us at dimiria.com or just shoot me an e-mail at dylantan (at) softnetix (dot) com if you have any questions or just want to say hi! You can also find us on Twitter: @dimiriaworld


Do get your friends involved by sharing this campaign on Twitter and Facebook. Thank you!

story:
www.nocturion.com

It sounds like the usual Indie game story. A few friends start chatting about what they think would make a great game, then someone says Why not? Lets do it!

What makes our story more interesting is that we actually did it!

In 2012, Universe Online (UO) was officially launched and has evolved into an exceptional online space strategy game with an active and vocal (which is why we love you!) game community. It took MANY years and lots of trial and error, but we think we finally got the game formula right.

Now we want to start all over again with a new lore and medieval theme... but this time, instead of taking years to create, we're asking for your help through this campaign.

Nocturion is a medieval world that resembles our own - with a darker twist. You, as an inhabitant of Nocturion, will build strongholds and populate them with buildings and armies to defend themselves as you grow your influence over the world.

But of course, you are not alone.

You will encounter necromancers and their armies, conclaves of ghosts, vampire lairs, haunted towers, undead wizards and, well, dragons. Some of these beings may be hostile, while others can be subjugated into serving as a supernatural army.

And this is just the beginning.

Surrounding Nocturion are the Elemental Planes. The rulers of these planes are hostile, raging war with one another, which is why they are leaving Nocturion alone... for now.

When you play, you become part of a game community where there is no hierarchy between developers and players. Every opinion matters because making an exceptional strategy game is the goal over everything else

UO player testimonials:

"I am looking forward to this game very much. I have played Universe Online and not only is it an outstanding game, the developers are always looking for ways to improve their game and I expect Nocturion will be no different. Keep up the good work guys!" - SirBartox

“Kudos to the devs... I cannot believe how responsive you folks have been to player suggestions. I am looking forward to all future expansions! Again you guys KUDOS!!!!!!!!” - Otodus obliquus

“...the devs of this game are a whole lot better than 80% of the games out there. They are kind, let a lot slide that others would crack down on and restrict making the game bad, are quick to answer any concerns u have, and generally care about people of this game and not just making half the game for only money people.” - Aqwia1

“This game has been developed carefully (and I can see, sometimes painfully) by one of the most CUSTOMER FRIENDLY and RESPONSIVE team of Developers. It has evolved and will continue to do so!

Those true to the game, and often pushed to side when offering guidance to newer players, learned long ago how much work the Devs have gone through; and though we and the Devs may not always agree, they have ALWAYS had an open ear to our issues (complaints, whines, moans and groans) and most importantly... OUR suggestions for game improvement!!!

To the Devs...I lower my staff! Well done my friends!” - ICT_Ranger

“Absolutely spot on! Most members of our allicance have been around for more than 3 years. We have seen players come and go, we were there while the game developed its “story”, and we will probably be here for the next “surprises” that the developers-story tellers have in mind. We all must consider that this game doesn't end!!! There are no alt servers, no seasons. The story goes on. Let's enjoy playing.” - khatzi

“[Another feature is> the forum, as there are great players in this game who are willing to help new & older players alike. The Dev Team is 2nd to none! Overall a very good game which is working on getting better & responds to player issues.” - Johnny Reb

 

Nocturion is a massive, multiplayer strategy game, played in a browser, and aimed at a mature audience. Players will assume the roles of heroes who build their empires by commanding armies, improving their skills, and forging alliances. Your success will be determined by your ability to plan and execute tactical strategies and your attention to detail.

At the beginning, you will focus on creating a productive stronghold capable of mining the countryside for valuable resources and producing armies to help you raid the dungeons around your area for crafting materials and hidden treasures.

At the same time, using your alchemists, you will try to unlock new technologies that will in turn allow you to build bigger and stronger armies.

The game supports any kind of game style you want. We aim for casual (PvE), which means that you can choose to play it at your own pace, facing only the game's villains, completing missions, and following a very exciting campaign/scenario. If on the other hand you feel that you are up to it, you can engage in PvP (Player vs Player) combat trying to prove yourself versus your opponents. It is always your own choice!

Original story: Nocturion's lore spans hundreds of years with original geography, history, noble houses and politics, warring factions and influences, supernatural enemies, dragons and more.

Strategy combined with role-playing: Players must be tactical in building their cities to help the weakened emperor survive the day. As the game progresses, players uncover clues, and soon become entangled in the epic clashes that shape the world.

Technology Research: Use your alchemists and blacksmiths to unlock the mysteries of the arcane powers and gain access to stronger units and pets.

Crafting: Players discover recipes and craft items to enhance their game actions.

Influences: Battle your opponents in the political arena increasing your influences in areas such as Research, Finance, Trade and Construction.

Reputations: Karma comes after everyone eventually. Player actions affect their reputation with various factions (such as noble houses or the emperor), which alters their skills accordingly.

Pets (Companions): Players may collect companions, which enhance their skills. Companions may be trained to become stronger and compete in the Pet Arena.

PvP: Nocturion is built for strategic, casual play. Aggressive players, however, may attack others to steal resources and conquer cities. Less direct players may attempt to claim bounties issued by the emperor against renegades. It is your choice whether you activate the PvP mode or not! You can play our game without ever engaging in PvP battles.

Guilds (Alliances): You can create your own alliance or join alliances created by other players. Once inside an alliance you gain access to powerful special talents that will help you defeat your enemies. Every alliance has it's own Chat Room and Forum to make communication between it's members easier. Furthermore you have your own "Bank" where you can store resources and help each other out. Last but not least, there are special parts of the game that are only accessible if you are a member of an Alliance.

If you've been following Nocturion's progress (via Facebook, Twitter, blog), you may have seen that we've been slowly creating graphics, writing lore, and planning... lots and lots of planning! We would love to have the game ready this Summer, but covering the cost ourselves is challenging.

Through this campaign we hope to cover the initial costs of the game. This includes graphics and servers - not salaries and marketing.

We have come up with some perks that we hope will entice you to contribute and become part of Nocturion.

The Goblin

A very powerful pet that will accompany you from your first steps in the game until you reach levels as high as 50(!)

It's attributes make it a formiddable opponent in the arena and a highly valuable companion in your quests.

The "Goblin" is available only through this IndieGoGo campaign!


The Battle Armour

This special armour will grant you with high attribute bonuses comparable to bonuses provided by high level armours available in the game!

The "Battle Armour" is available only through this IndieGoGo campaign!


Millions of CPs

Purchase the "Coin Master" perk and you will have enough Character Points (CPs) to enjoy the game at your own pace!

The actual value of the CPs will be $150 when the game launches, so you do get more than 30% discount if you help our campaign!


Be part of Nocturion

If you want to play a significant role in shaping the game itself, you can become a Story Teller, writing your own story inside the game!

Meet our great develoment team and become part of our upcoming "Behind the Scenes" game promo video!


Konstantinos Manos (a.k.a. Kevorque) leads the way in design, development, and just about anything else you can think of. He is a huge strategy and adventure game fan. From the moment he discovered table top Role Playing Adventure games as a child, he delved into the world of fantasy RP games and hasn't quite found his way out yet!

Dimitris Xanthakis (a.k.a. Archmage) creates the world, the game lore, the storyline quests, NPCs, items, pets and helps with game design.

Thanasis Manos (a.k.a. Strahdvonzar) has taken on the role of Community Director and is responsible for the development of the chat engine and the composing of the game's music and sound effects.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a contribution at this time, you can still be part of the Nocturion game community. In the past, we've found that our players are the best publicists. Please share this campaign with your friends and follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Nocturion's blog for updates and game secrets!

Through this campaign we hope to cover the initial costs of the game. This
includes graphics and servers - not salaries and marketing.
We have come up with some perks that we hope will entice you to contribute and become part of Nocturion.








The Goblin
A very powerful pet that will accompany you from your first steps in the game until you reach levels as high as 50(!)
It's attributes make it a formiddable opponent in the arena and a highly valuable companion in your quests.
The "Goblin" is available only through this IndieGoGo campaign!










The Battle Armour
This special armour will grant you with high attribute bonuses comparable to bonuses provided by high level armours available in the game!
The "Battle Armour" is available only through this IndieGoGo campaign!










Millions of CPs
Purchase the "Coin Master" perk and you will have enough Character Points (CPs) to enjoy the game at your own pace!
The actual value of the CPs will be $150 when the game launches, so you do get more than 30% discount if you help our campaign!










Be part of Nocturion
If you want to play a significant role in shaping the game itself, you can become a Story Teller, writing your own story inside the game!
Meet our great develoment team and become part of our upcoming "Behind the Scenes" game promo video!





Konstantinos Manos (a.k.a. Kevorque) leads the way in design, development, and just about anything else you can think of. He is a huge strategy and
adventure game fan. From the moment he discovered table top Role Playing Adventure games as a child, he delved into the world of
fantasy RP games and hasn't quite found his way out yet!
Dimitris Xanthakis (a.k.a. Archmage) creates the world, the game lore, the storyline quests, NPCs, items, pets and helps with game design.
Thanasis Manos (a.k.a. Strahdvonzar) has taken on the role of Community Director and is
responsible for the development of the chat engine and the composing of the game's music and sound effects.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't make a contribution at this time, you can still be part of the Nocturion game community. In the past, we've found that our
players are the best publicists. Please share this campaign with your friends and follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Nocturion's blog for
updates and game secrets!

story:
Short Summary

Gethsemane Games is a small company consisting of husband and wife team Bryan and Marie Irving and the cat, Gethsemane, whom we named the company after. Together we bring indi RPGs to the gaming public and this year we would like very much to release a wide range of adventures, modules and supplements for our horror RPG “Haunts and Horrors (H+H).

 

Haunts and Horrors has been a labour of love for us, we are both very big fans of good horror and grew up on the likes of Hammer Horror, Universal Studios horror films and so on. In H+H we have brought this love of horror, and our love of the Victorian an Georgian period of history to the table top in a game designed to let players create horror adventures in any historical period that they please.

 

This year, we would like to release a range of products for the game including (but not limited to);-

 

“Blood Money”, an adventure set in England durring the early years of Queen Victoria's reign. The old coaching inn “The little drummer boy” has seen better days, the advent of the railways has hit the inn's custom, but perhaps not so much as the tales of a strange phantom horseman that plagues the highways around the inn.

 

“The Curse of Amon Menetnashti” A Victorian period mini campaign set in Ottoman ruled Egypt in which the party are part of an archaeological expedition which seems to have found a long forgotten Egyptian Priest. Whoever this priest was, his Ka does not seem to care for the expedition as things take a dark and mysterious twist.

 

“The Drowning Pool” Takes us to England during the regency period. Romney Marsh is plagued with smugglers and something far, far more sinister, a thing from the Celtic myths that has returned to menace the living.

 

“Suffer Little Children”. Something is plaguing the dreams of children in a small English village, visiting terrible nightmares upon them. Already 3 have been driven mad, and others may suffer the same fate unless the party and the local asylum can get to the bottom of the mystery and face the horror that lurks in the sleepy community. Both an adventure and a setting with a fully detailed town and Asylum and extensive notes on mental health in England after the Asylum reform act.

 

“The Sins of The Fathers”. A strange ghost dog stalks the moors, but what has brought it back?

What We Need & What You Get

Our funding goal is fairly modest, given the scale of our project. This is because we are a small independent company with minimal outlay (we don't have staff to pay, we work from an office in our home and so on).

 

We would very much like to be able to outsource the editing and layout of the products to other independent professionals in the industry, freeing us up to spend more time writing. We would also like to purchase some custom artwork for the products in order to free us up to write rather than draw and to minimise the amount of stock art we use in the products.

 

Our supporters will be able to choose form a wide range of perks, from a credit in the products, to a product of their choice, PDFs of all our H+H line, personalised products, unique material and so on.

The Impact

Your contribution will help us to bring this exiting range of RPG material to the tabletops of players around the world. If we exceed our goal it will also help to fund Gethsemane Games appearing at an increased range of games conventions with demonstration games and will help us to fund an even wider range of H+H material.

 

Haunts and Horrors has been popular with our customers to date, and we would very much like to bring it to an ever expanding audience as well as giving current fans a range of supporting material for their games.

 

Even if we do not reach our modest funding target, we are committed to the release of this range and will release it, all be it at a slower rate than we will be able to achieve with a successfully fully funded indiegogo campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are aware that not everyone who would like to see us succeed can contribute financially, but there other ways you can help if you would like to.

 

Spread the word! - The more people you tell about the indiegogo campaign, the greater the chances of us hitting our goal.

 

Play H+H! - The more people who play the game, the wider the games name spreads and the more fans it gathers. Play it, have fun with it, and pass your love for it on to other players.


Join the Gethsemane Games Face Book page.  Larger FB pages attract more attention, which gets more people looking at this campaign.

Join the Gethsemane Games Face Book page.  Larger FB pages attract more attention, which gets more people looking at this campaign.

story:
Who we are

We are players who are not satisfied by playing games that you can finish in 6 hours and you switch on the multiplayer when you have really nothing else to do. We have an 8 year experience in game industry, modelling, animating and programming that we want to show in a new game we call Face 2 Face (F2F). It´s an FPS simulator which is concentrated on quality of playing and the game´s design is secondary (not vice versa). We will be very happy if you help us to make it real.

 

About Face 2 Face

F2F is a first-person online multiplayer game which takes place in different parts of the world. Great effects, details of weapons, vehicles, sophisticated functions and real hitboxes make this game a brilliant experience. The game itself does not have a story, although the stories will be different in online tournaments. We can release the first playable version of our game in the first quarter of 2014.

These are the main systems of the game:

Deathmatch – public: Everyone plays for himself and everyone is an enemy

Capture the flag : Steal your enemy´s flag and get it safely to your area

Search & Destroy : You have to conquer your enemy and destroy his area

TT : This system is used only in tournaments. It is a system where you have limited numbers of vehicles and ammo during the whole tournament.

 

Some in-game functions:

Your vehicles can be out of fuel – you can fill it in the gas station

Reward system – rewards that open new weapons and enhancements

Clan system – creating, editing and searching for teams according to your criteria

You can throw your enemy´s grenades back

The skins of your characters can be edited in your team colors

And another two special functions that will be published in the test version.

There are much more functions in this game of course, but it will be better if you play it yourself. The game is not classic, it is not from that kind of games the market is oversaturated with. The screenshots from the game can prove that. All in-game screenshots are published only for Indiegogo campaign.

 

The campain´s goal

The campain´s goal is to obtain resources for these purposes:

3500€ - for buying software licenses

5800€ - server for running of our game

700€ - Fees

 Please take note that we are a team that like to play great games. We are not a company that can afford to invest 200,000€ -1,000,000€ to create a game. Despite of financial difficulties we are making an effort to develop a game that will not be ashamed for its results.

 

Rewards

Choose some Perk and you will gain attractive rewards. If we will reach our goal we will surprise you with some additional gifts. We will start to deliver perks 2 weeks after the end of Indiegogo campaign.

UPDATE: 1# special skin for your in-game weapon

Other way to help us

The other way you can help us is to share this campaign with your friends. If you have any questions, feedback or ideas that cannot miss in our game, we will be happy if you contact us on this email: f2f@battlesearch.com. Thank you for reading this.
