story:
What are we Doing ?

Scottish Highland Games are the traditional sports of Scotland.  Here in the San Francisco Bay Area, we have our own running of the Games with events through the Spring, Summer and Fall. Our season opener is on April 18th, 2015.  Stones, Hammers, Weights and Cabers will fly!  We want to bring Team Scotland to Fremont, California to compete against the best that California has to offer.

Who is Team Scotland?
Garry Hagan,   from Bathgate, Scotland ... Champion at Taynuilt Highland Games, 2014 
Kyle Robert Randalls, from Grangemouth, Scotland... 2014 World Amateur Scottish Hammer Champion!
Jamie Gunn, from Halkirk Scotland... 2014 Glenfiddich Juniors  Champion!

Who  is Team California?
Robert Krieger, from Hayward California... 2014 Ardenwood  Highland Games and 2014 Woodland  Highland Games Champion
Christopher Hurts, from Hayward California... 2014 Ardenwood Highland Games Athlete of the Day.
Chance Allard,  from Pleasanton... 2014 Dixon Highland Games Champion

    With your help, we can bring three outstanding athletes from Scotland here to the Bay Area for the best in Highland Games competition. 

    What We Need

    We need to fly three athletes here from Scotland, then house and feed them for a week.   Round-trip flights from Scotland to the San Francisco  Bay Area are running about $1,000 per person.  The hotel will cost about  another $1,000.  We have $1,000 in other fundraising planned already. So to make this happen, we need $3,000 in help from you.

    Can We Really Do This?

    Absolutely, yes.  Tartan Day at Ardenwood has been running for over a decade, put on by the East Bay  Scottish Association.  We've successfully held sanctioned Highland Athletics for four years, now.  We have the experience, the equipment and the safety record to put on a first class event. Because of his nearly decade-long tenure in this sport, our  Athletic Director is personally acquainted with the members of Team Scotland.    Your help makes it possible for us to take this event to the next level by bringing in Team Scotland! 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    The simplest thing you can do, if you live in California, is come to Tartan Day at Ardenwood.  The Games are held  at the Ardenwood Historic Farm, in Fremont, California.  The 2015 date is Saturday  April 18th. However, there are other ways you can participate.

    • Go visit our Facebook page and "like" us!  Look for the East Bay Scottish Association Tartan Day page.
    • Volunteer to make the Games even better. We need people to do all sorts of things from helping with traffic and parking to setting up/breaking down clan tents.
    • Do you own a Celtic-themed business?  Have a booth at Tartan Day and hawk your wares!
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools and let people  know that you like us!

story:
UPDATE! HUGE PERKS AT MASSIVE DISCOUNTS! FINAL DAY SALE!As art of our final day sale we are offering two incredible perks at ridiculously low prices!

De-vour Lunch with Shaq! 
Exclusive final day perk! One available! Bring a guest and have lunch with Shaq at his location. This is serious face time with the man himself! Don't miss this incredible opportunity. Chance of a lifetime! Travel not included.

will also receive a copy of the game, T-Shirt, poster, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

- Only $3000!

Ballin' at Shaq's Shaq 2!
One available! Massive discount! Have lunch and a game of pickup basketball in Shaq's gym at his home in Florida! Hang out with the big man himself! To be broadcast online. Travel not included. 

Guests will also receive exclusive signed memorabilia, a copy of the game, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

- Only $4000!


UPDATE! NEW PERK! Grab a limited edition, Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn, golden SNES cartridge, signed by Shaquille O'Neal. $100 and only 200 available!


This is a highly exclusive, limited run product that will certainly become a collectors item. Grab one now before they sell out!

This perk does not include the game or other items. This means that if you have already contributed, you can purchase this perk without doubling up on other items you already own. If you do want the game, however, then be sure to purchase one of the other perks that includes it.

MAJOR UPDATE!! -- SHAQ FU GOES CONSOLE!!
If we hit our base goal of $450k we will be releasing Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn on PS4, Wii U, PS3, Xbox One, and Xbox 360, in addition to the PC version!!

Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn Tournament
A contribution of $20 will guarantee entry into an international tournament which will culminate in Los Angeles, CA where the winner will face off against Shaq with the winner taking home $25,000. The tournament will only happen if the $450,000 goal is met. If the goal isn’t met all funders who contributed can elect to have their money refunded. 

Shaq Fu Facebook Page
Be sure to like us on Facebook, and stay connected to what's happening with Shaq Fu. We'll be posting updates and launching competitions as we go! 


UPDATES...

VOICEMAIL PERK PRICE SLASHED!!! You can now get your own personalised 15 second voicemail, recorded by Shaq himself, for only $250!! Only 10 available!!

SPECIAL UPDATE! In the next week we will be announcing a major perk that will only be available to those who contribute to the campaign.  Anyone who participates at the $5 level or higher will get a chance to meet Shaq personally! Stay tuned for details!

All categories of perks will now get their names in the special credits for Shaq Fu!

Brand new perk! Get your likeness turned into  Shaq Fu character artwork  that will be signed by Shaquille O'Neal!! It will also appear in the game as an unlockable item! ONLY 10 Available!

Brand new perk! Grab yourself a Signed Shaq Fu SXSW Exclusive Shirt for only $100! Plus copy of the game, lifetime DLC, and a limited edition character and weapon! ONLY 30 SHIRTS AVAILABLE!

We have dropped the price of the 'Mocap Your Signature Move' perk. Was $350, now only $150!! See your own personal move put into the game! Name the move and see it on screen whenever the player uses it! 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


We are Big Deez Productions, a team of video game industry professionals that comes from legendary projects like HALO, Street Fighter, Final Fantasy, Alan Wake, Spec Ops: The Line, Battlefield, Killzone, Max Payne, Duke Nukem, and many other huge franchises. 

We are in partnership with the man, Shaquille O’Neal, an avid gamer himself. We got tired of bowing to the monolithic men with the money and wanted to work with people who care about the quality of the product. We are people with passion that intend to make solid, addictive, kick ass games, without a whiff of BS. And who are our big executive partners in this effort…? YOU! Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn, is where it all begins.

In 1994, a well-known publisher released a fighting game starring a then 22-year old basketball superstar by the name of Shaquille O’ Neal.  Capitalizing on his immense popularity, the publisher allowed the game to be released with numerous shortcomings.  In many circles, the game has become a cult-classic, attaining the status of “so bad its good” and even prompting one fan to dedicate a website, ShaqFu.com to the destruction of all remaining copies of the game.



No! Definitely not! There are two, and only two, similarities between our Shaq Fu, and the abomination that was born in the nineties: The name, and the starring character.

We are gamers, not executives. We know what’s good and we know what stinks. This isn’t about trying to make a quick buck, it’s about creating something that both we and Shaq can be proud of. We want to make a slick, fun, rock-solid game.

We’ve assembled a team of creative people who have this vision at the heart of what they do and we’re really excited about this. We want you to be a part of that excitement and a part of this awesome project.

Most celebrity games take a well known face and build a crappy game around it, knowing it will sell. We want to build a game that would kick ass even without Shaq. As the main character, however, Shaq, really wants to be a part of this and we love that he’s onboard. He's going to have a huge involvement in this and he is not about to let the same mistake happen twice, and neither are we.


He is the best center ever to play the game.  Of course he's got money, and yes he will be investing a lot of his own time and money in this project.  We will be investing considerably more of our own money in the game than we are asking for.

The purpose of bringing the game to the public is to see how much interest there is in becoming Shaq’s partner and in seeing the game happen.  In exchange for your help, Shaq, is offering unprecedented access to his life with incredible perks.  Here are some highlights:

  • Bag a signed original size 22 Shaq Attack sneaker!

  • Play basketball with Shaq, on his own court, at his house!

  • Have Shaq, become your personal secretary by recording your voicemail!

  • Have lunch or dinner with the big man for you and your friends!

  • Be part of the taping of a TNT show at an NBA game!

This isn’t about a celebrity giving away a trinkets for cash, this is a true partnership.  We think it is unprecedented.  Shaq is ready and willing to work for your support and you can bet that he’ll be grateful for every cent and every plug he gets. He loves his fans and to be able to collaborate with them on something like this has him (and us!) really excited.

We’re not asking for any more than we need. We are all about appreciation for the fact that you’re putting your hard earned cash on the table so that we can make this a reality and we hold that at the core of this campaign. Shaq and the rest of us at Big Deez want partners who share our passion for excellent games. If you really want to help us make something unforgettable - in the good way this time - then help us go even further and reach our stretch goals.

Upon decree of the Big Diesel:  5% of all profits from the game go to the Boys and Girls Clubs of America!



Shaq Fu is what the original game should have been – an instant classic.  We're talking Streets of Rage meets Street Fighter meets Devil May Cry. It’s a modern day take on the classic beat ‘em up.  Play as Shaquille O’Neal – learn hundreds of moves and battle techniques, take on thousands of enemies with dozens of cool melee weapons, battle bosses in dynamic arenas, master cool finishing moves and play with your buddies in COOP mode or against each other in player vs player combat.

In Shaq Fu, dozens of unique and varied enemies await which require careful use of tactics.  The game also features destructive environments, awesome power ups  and a series of well-designed, beautiful levels with interesting progression.  This is all tied together by what very well might be the story of the century, a performance worthy of an Oscar, by the Big Diesel, in his battle against a villain for the ages – the mysterious Black Star Ninja.

  • Play as Shaq as he kicks ass and takes no prisoners

  • Intricately designed combo system that leaves room for a variety of fighting tactics.  Learn the moves and let Shaq rip against his enemies

  • Pimp your character with new moves and abilities.  Select from different fighting styles or combine styles and create your own new discipline (Shaq FU is what you make it)

  • Challenges for even the best players.

  • Adaptive AI keeps the game exciting

  • Battles against hordes of enemies in the tradition of the lost art of the beat ‘em up.  I mean, who could take Shaq one on one?

  • Take the challenge up to an entirely new level in unforgettable smack downs against awesome bosses.

  • Once you beat a boss you unlock him and can play as him in the game.

  • Fight through the slums of Asian cities, on the rooftops of skyscrapers. Battle it out inside buildings, seedy night clubs, and cause mayhem in the markets.

  • Smash an enemy through the floor and leap down to a lower level.  Barge through walls and forge your own path.  Smash furniture, toss enemies through windows, even collapse structures – when you are the Shaqbreaker everything is possible

  • A wide variety of melee and projectile weapons as well as various everyday objects that can be used as weapons – katanas, shurikens, baseball bats, the occasional basketball filled with the wrong type of gas, bottles, knives and dozens more.  Don’t see a weapon you like?  What about that manhole cover or that car door?  You are Shaq after all, so maybe you want to hurl that motorcycle on a bunch of enemies at once.  The world is your projectile.

  • Wipe out huge numbers of enemies at once.  Bowl down enemies with balls of steel, create earthquakes of unprecedented power, slam dunk baddies with ease.

  • Modifiers that change your appearance and enhance your skills.  Transform into the monstrous Big Daddy O and crush your enemies.  Twirl into the Big Baryshnikov and pirouette your enemies like a tornado tearing through Kansas.  Power up into the Big Diesel and steamroll your enemies into Kobe-Patties.  A power-up for every nickname Shaq has ever had, and a few new ones for good measure.

  • Co-op Gameplay.  Grab a friend and battle it out in tandem.  Play as Shaq’s identical twin (no he doesn’t sell insurance) or select from a host of other playable characters with different skills and power-ups. Split screen action available, baby!

  • Co-op’s not your bag?  Build up your character and fighting style and duke it out online or on the same machine against another player.

  • Once you have played through the main game revisit it to discover secret environments that you might have missed.

  • Think its over once the Black Star Ninja, is unmasked?  Think again.  Hosts of challenges await that pit you against the best Shaq Fu’s in the world.



Digital copy of base game on PC (retail price planned at $29.99). If stretch goals hit for mobile platforms, that’s free too!

Digital copy of base game on PC. plus all future downloadable content for free for life including all characters, weapons and customization options. This is over $200 of value.

All of the above plus an exclusive, limited edition character and weapon that is only available to Indiegogo funders!

All of the above plus early beta access! Play Shaq Fu before anyone else!

All of the above plus a free digital download of the video game soundtrack, to be created using the music of Shaq, entirely remixed and re-envisioned by Steve Molitz, keyboardist and producer extraordinaire.

Steve Molitz is a world-renowned musician and composer who has toured with Rich Robinson, Phil Lesh and Robby Krieger and has jammed with the Allman Brothers Band, Little Feat and dozens of others. 


As the founding member and leader of the pioneering jamband Particle, Steve has fused modern electronic music, classic rock and hip hop into a kind of music that defies categorization.  He will be creating a soundtrack that remixes and modernizes classic Shaq songs from his collection of Platinum and Gold albums including the remake of Don’t Stop the Reign.  Some people have brazenly compared Molitz to god.

All of the above plus a single-run, unique Shaq-Fu “DON'T FU IT UP” T-Shirt.

                           (Front)                                                      (Back)

Shaq Fu SXSW Exclusive Shirt, signed by Shaq Fu himself, Shaquille O’Neal! 

ONLY 30 SHIRTS AVAILABLE!

Cannot guarantee size but we don’t think you’ll be wearing these fantastic shirts! Plus a copy of the game, DLC for life, and limited edition character and weapon.


All of the above plus you will get to record a special line and have your voice over integrated into the game, as well as receiving a credit as a voice actor, shown in the end titles! Could be the start of your new career?

One of our motion capture artists will create a custom animation based on a recorded signature move that you submit. Get a friend (or tripod) to record your short sweet signature move. Send it to us and we'll have our motion capture artist perform the move and then we'll put it in the game. Give it a good name, maybe something with your name in! - and see it listed in Shaq's move tree, in game (provided you stay away from explicit words!). 


See your unique fighting move in the game! Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.


All of the above plus a Shaq-Fu poster signed by Shaquille O’Neal and the artist. This will be a unique piece of game art created in limited quantities.  Each piece will be numbered as part of a limited series. 

All of the above plus a copy of the music score of the game signed by Shaq and Steve Molitz.

Steve Molitz has graciously decided to offer in-person or Skype lessons on the keys. Learn from a man who plays on stage next to the Allman Brothers Band, and jams with Phil Lesh and members of the Doors.


Plus a copy of the game, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

Get your likeness turned into an awesome Shaq Fu character sketch that will be signed by Shaquille O'Neal! Based on images you send us, our amazing artist will transform you into a bad ass video game character! Your artwork will actually appear in the game as an unlockable bonus item!

Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.



Get an exclusive, limited edition Shaq Fu model, made in a short run for Indiegogo supporters only. Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.


A personalised signed basketball with letter of authenticity. Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

A personalized signed Shaq jersey from your favorite Shaq team with letter of authenticity. Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

Shaq will record you a personalized 15 second voice mail message! To be supplied in high quality digital format. Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

Shaq will record you a personalized 20 second video message! To be supplied in high quality digital format. Wait till your buddies see this one! Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

Shaq will follow you on twitter for one year, starting with an initial shout out to all his 8 million followers, thanking you for supporting the campaign! Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

The big man will follow you on Instagram and will "like" and comment on your beautiful pics.  Who knows, you might even become friends?

Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

Collaborate with Steve and Shaq on making music for the game.  Submit your beats, samples, song ideas and vocals to the game.   Get a credit as a game composer.  

Plus a copy of the game, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

Impress your friends with you big shoe size! 10 winners get one SIZE 22 original Vintage Reebok Shaqnosis sneaker from Shaquille O’Neal with letter of authenticity. This sneaker can be signed and personalized at your request. Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.  

This is one of Complex Magazines 50 Best Sneakers of All Time.

Complex.com Top-50-Basketball-Sneakers-of-All-Time - Reebok Shaqnosis

Get your likeness in the game! Based on photographs taken of your face, an artist will model your head and face and capitate one of our characters with it! You can decide to either be a hero or a villain.

Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.


One winner gets 2 floor seats to a Sacramento Kings game of your choice. Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

<


Work as a concept artist for Shaq-Fu! Join us at the Big Deez offices, or work remotely and collaborate with our artists to create concepts that we will use for the game.   We'll put you to work drawing and designing actual elements of the project! Plus, you'll get a credit as a concept artist in the game! And, if you can handle it, we might even have an opening for you at Big Deez! Plus a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.


5 fans get to bring a guest to Shaq's Florida home for lunch and a game of pickup basketball in Shaq's gym to be broadcast online. Travel not included. Guests will also receive exclusive signed memorabilia, a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

One lucky fan will get to bring 6 friends to an Orlando or Atlanta area restaurant to have a meal with Shaq. If Shaq will be near your hometown we can work out a dinner there as well. The meal is on us - travel is on you. If you have six friends with $3600 each then you can group together to get this awesome perk! Guests will also receive exclusive signed memorabilia, a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.


The slam dunk perk of all time. One fan gets to bring two friends to TNT studios for a meet and greet, to watch the taping of NBA on TNT and to have lunch with Shaq at the studio*!!! Travel not included.

Guests will also receive exclusive signed memorabilia, a copy of the game on PC, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.

*Location and game to be decided in collaboration with fan and Shaq.

You will never forget the night that Shaquille O'Neal DJ'd your party. It sounds like a dream but this is for real. Grab this perk and Shaq will travel to your party* and play a DJ set while you and your guests dance the night away. Only one available. Don't let this incredible once in a lifetime experience escape you.

*Party must be in the US. Date to be arranged with Shaq.

You will also receive exclusive signed memorabilia, a copy of the game on PC, poster, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.


Shaq has assembled his own all-star team for the creation of Shaq-Fu.  The game will be created by Big Deez Productions  - a new development studio with team members that have worked for publishers ranging from Ubisoft, Namco, EA, Sega, Atari and Microsoft and with a select group of developers who have been involved in games such as The Madden series, Mortal Kombat, Street Fighter, Perfect Dark, the Halo franchise, Final Fantasy and dozens of others.  The goal of the team is to create games that fans want to see made.  Indiegogo serves as our "green light".  If fans want to see the game happen we can make it a reality.
story_txt:
UPDATE! HUGE PERKS AT MASSIVE DISCOUNTS! FINAL DAY SALE!As art of our final day sale we are offering two incredible perks at ridiculously low prices!De-vour Lunch with Shaq! Exclusive final day perk! One available! Bring a guest and have lunch with Shaq at his location. This is serious face time with the man himself! Don't miss this incredible opportunity. Chance of a lifetime! Travel not included.will also receive a copy of the game, T-Shirt, poster, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.- Only $3000!Ballin' at Shaq's Shaq 2!One available! Massive discount! Have lunch and a game of pickup basketball in Shaq's gym at his home in Florida! Hang out with the big man himself! To be broadcast online. Travel not included. Guests will also receive exclusive signed memorabilia, a copy of the game, T-Shirt, free lifetime DLC and limited edition character and weapon.- Only $4000!UPDATE! NEW PERK! Grab a limited edition, Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn, golden SNES cartridge, signed by Shaquille O'Neal. $100 and only 200 available!This is a highly exclusive, limited run product that will certainly become a collectors item. Grab one now before they sell out!This perk does not include the game or other items. This means that if you have already contributed, you can purchase this perk without doubling up on other items you already own. If you do want the game, however, then be sure to purchase one of the other perks that includes it.MAJOR UPDATE!! -- SHAQ FU GOES CONSOLE!!If we hit our base goal of $450k we will be releasing Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn on PS4, Wii U, PS3, Xbox One, and Xbox 360, in addition to the PC version!!
Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn Tournament
A contribution of $20 will guarantee entry into an international tournament which will culminate in Los Angeles, CA where the winner will face off against Shaq with the winner taking home $25,000. The tournament will only happen if the $450,000 goal is met. If the goal isn’t met all funders who contributed can elect to have their money refunded. Shaq Fu Facebook PageBe sure to like us on Facebook, and stay connected to what's happening with Shaq Fu. We'll be posting updates and launching competitions as we go! UPDATES...VOICEMAIL PERK PRICE SLASHED!!! You can now get your own personalised 15 second voicemail, recorded by Shaq himself, for only $250!! Only 10 available!!SPECIAL UPDATE! In the next week we will be announcing a major perk that will only be available to those who contribute to the campaign.  Anyone who participates at the $5 level or higher will get a chance to meet Shaq personally! Stay tuned for details!All categories of perks will now get their names in the special credits for Shaq Fu!Brand new perk! Get your likeness turned into  Shaq Fu character artwork  that will be signed by Shaquille O'Neal!! It will also appear in the game as an unlockable item! ONLY 10 Available!Brand new perk! Grab yourself a Signed Shaq Fu SXSW Exclusive Shirt for only $100! Plus copy of the game, lifetime DLC, and a limited edition character and weapon! ONLY 30 SHIRTS AVAILABLE!We have dropped the price of the 'Mocap Your Signature Move' perk. Was $350, now only $150!! See your own personal move put into the game! Name the move and see it on screen whenever the player uses it! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------We are Big Deez Productions, a team of video game industry professionals that comes from legendary projects like HALO, Street Fighter, Final Fantasy, Alan Wake, Spec Ops: The Line, Battlefield, Killzone, Max Payne, Duke Nukem, and many other huge franchises. We are in partnership with the man, Shaquille O’Neal, an avid gamer himself. We got tired of bowing to the monolithic men with the money and wanted to work with people who care about the quality of the product. We are people with passion that intend to make solid, addictive, kick ass games, without a whiff of BS. And who are our big executive partners in this effort…? YOU! Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn, is where it all begins.In 1994, a well-known publisher released a fighting game starring a then 22-year old basketball superstar by the name of Shaquille O’ Neal.  Capitalizing on his immense popularity, the publisher allowed the game to be released with numerous shortcomings.  In many circles, the game has become a cult-classic, attaining the status of “so bad its good” and even prompting one fan to dedicate a website, ShaqFu.com to the destruction of all remaining copies of the game.No! Definitely not! There are two, and only two, similarities between our Shaq Fu, and the abomination that was born in the nineties: The name, and the starring character.We are gamers, not executives. We know what’s good and we know what stinks. This isn’t about trying to make a quick buck, it’s about creating something that both we and Shaq can be proud of. We want to make a slick, fun, rock-solid game.We’ve assembled a team of creative people who have this vision at the heart of what they do and we’re really excited about this. We want you to be a part of that excitement and a part of this awesome project.Most celebrity games take a well known face and build a crappy game around it, knowing it will sell. We want to build a game that would kick ass even without Shaq. As the main character, however, Shaq, really wants to be a part of this and we love that he’s onboard. He's going to have a huge involvement in this and he is not about to let the same mistake happen twice, and neither are we.He is the best center ever to play the game.  Of course he's got money, and yes he will be investing a lot of his own time and money in this project.  We will be investing considerably more of our own money in the game than we are asking for.The purpose of bringing the game to the public is to see how much interest there is in becoming Shaq’s partner and in seeing the game happen.  In exchange for your help, Shaq, is offering unprecedented access to his life with incredible perks.  Here are some highlights:
Bag a signed original size 22 Shaq Attack sneaker!
Play basketball with Shaq, on his own court, at his house!
Have Shaq, become your personal secretary by recording your voicemail!
Have lunch or dinner with the big man for you and your friends!
Be part of the taping of a TNT show at an NBA game!
This isn’t about a celebrity giving away a trinkets for cash, this is a true partnership.  We think it is unprecedented.  Shaq is ready and willing to work for your support and you can bet that he’ll be grateful for every cent and every plug he gets. He loves his fans and to be able to collaborate with them on something like this has him (and us!) really excited.We’re not asking for any more than we need. We are all about appreciation for the fact that you’re putting your hard earned cash on the table so that we can make this a reality and we hold that at the core of this campaign. Shaq and the rest of us at Big Deez want partners who share our passion for excellent games. If you really want to help us make something unforgettable - in the good way this time - then help us go even further and reach our stretch goals.Upon decree of the Big Diesel:  5% of all profits from the game go to the Boys and Girls Clubs of America!Shaq Fu is what the original game should have been – an instant classic.  We're talking Streets of Rage meets Street Fighter meets Devil May Cry. It’s a modern day take on the classic beat ‘em up.  Play as Shaquille O’Neal – learn hundreds of moves and battle techniques, take on thousands of enemies with dozens of cool melee weapons, battle bosses in dynamic arenas, master cool finishing moves and play with your buddies in COOP mode or against each other in player vs player combat.In Shaq Fu, dozens of unique and varied enemies await which require careful use of tactics.  The game also features destructive environments, awesome power ups  and a series of well-designed, beautiful levels with interesting progression.  This is all tied together by what very well might be the story of the century, a performance worthy of an Oscar, by the Big Diesel, in his battle against a villain for the ages – the mysterious Black Star Ninja.
Play as Shaq as he kicks ass and takes no prisoners
Intricately designed combo system that leaves room for a variety of fighting tactics.  Learn the moves and let Shaq rip against his enemies
Pimp your character with new moves and abilities.  Select from different fighting styles or combine styles and create your own new discipline (Shaq FU is what you make it)
Challenges for even the best players.
Adaptive AI keeps the game exciting
Battles against hordes of enemies in the tradition of the lost art of the beat ‘em up.  I mean, who could take Shaq one on one?
Take the challenge up to an entirely new level in unforgettable smack downs against awesome bosses.
Once you beat a boss you unlock him and can play as him in the game.
Fight through the slums of Asian cities, on the rooftops of skyscrapers. Battle it out inside buildings, seedy night clubs, and cause mayhem in the markets.
Smash an enemy through the floor and leap down to a lower level.  Barge through walls and forge your own path.  Smash furniture, toss enemies through windows, even collapse structures – when you are the Shaqbreaker everything is possible
A wide variety of melee and projectile weapons as well as various everyday objects that can be used as weapons – katanas, shurikens, baseball bats, the occasional basketball filled with the wrong type of gas, bottles, knives and dozens more.  Don’t see a weapon you like?  What about that manhole cover or that car door?  You are Shaq after all, so maybe you want to hurl that motorcycle on a bunch of enemies at once.  The world is your projectile.
Wipe out huge numbers of enemies at once.  Bowl down enemies with balls of steel, create earthquakes of unprecedented power, slam dunk baddies with ease.
Modifiers that change your appearance and enhance your skills.  Transform into the monstrous Big Daddy O and crush your enemies.  Twirl into the Big Baryshnikov and pirouette your enemies like a tornado tearing through Kansas.  Power up into the Big Diesel and steamroll your enemies into Kobe-Patties.  A power-up for every nickname Shaq has ever had, and a few new ones for good measure.
Co-op Gameplay.  Grab a friend and battle it out in tandem.  Play as Shaq’s identical twin (no he doesn’t sell insurance) or select from a host of other playable characters with different skills and power-ups. Split screen action available, baby!
Co-op’s not your bag?  Build up your character and fighting style and duke it out online or on the same machine against another player.
Once you have played through the main game revisit it to discover secret environments that you might have missed.
Think its over once the Black Star Ninja, is unmasked?  Think again.  Hosts of challenges await that pit you against the best Shaq Fu’s in the world.

story:
Who Are We?

The PWNAGE Project™ is a global group of developers who think that it’s time to change the world of gaming. We want to create a friendly environment for gamers and developers alike, to build a new world where anyone can make something new and innovative. Where there are no boundaries, corporate agendas, or lines in the sand, and your only limit is your own imagination… 


The purpose of The PWNAGE Project™ is to design, develop, manufacture, and market the Ultimate Video Game System. The PWNAGE Li™ Game System is the next generation in video gaming. A hand-held and a console system in one! Built with the latest technologies, Free & Open Source software solutions, and powered by the the rock solid Android OS. This platform will give you a gaming experience that will leave you in awe…

The PWNAGE Project™ Is Pleased to Announce, Unveil, and Maybe Even Brag About, the PWNAGE Li™ Game System!

For the first time, consumers have a device made with the newest technology, showcasing all that Free and Open Source Software has to offer. Don’t worry, we never limit what software you can use on the PWNAGE Li™, and anyone would still have access to Google Play if they choose. A Gaming Tablet PC sporting a 1.6 GHz quad-core RockChip RK3188 Processor, a full 2 Gigs of RAM and a ton of other hardware and software updates, the PWNAGE Li™ is more than a match for any other hand-held on the market. Then add in our TRUE 1080p HDMI & Wireless HDMI support, and 3G wireless (3G network support provided separately through your mobile service provider) and now we’re competing with the big dogs…


Our Plan  

After researching attempts by other groups to do similar projects, we realized that many of them over-promised and under-delivered in key areas like customer service, support, and staying on schedule. We decided early in the process that we were going to wait until we had something concrete to show before launching a crowdfunding campaign.

Our custom ROM is currently in the final stages of the 'beta' testing phase. The PWNAGE Plaza™ MarketPlace and Community will launch in February 2014 with the first shipment of our PWNAGE Li™ Gaming Tablets. We have the platform developed, the next step is securing hosting for our worldwide network of servers necessary to bring it all together.

We already have a contract in place with our manufacturer, and our first small run of PWNAGE Li™ devices will go into production on September 25, 2013. As soon as we acquire the funds from a successful Indiegogo campaign, we can begin our large-scale production. We anticipate shipping the PWNAGE Li™ to our backers by February of 2014, but higher level backers will have earlier access to the device.

We plan to retail the PWNAGE Li™ on web based virtual stores like Amazon.com, in addition to brick and mortar stores. We are also currently finalizing a deal with a logistics management firm to ensure prompt and effective distribution of our product through a streamlined and efficient supply-chain.

We have the plan in place, we just need to put some gas in the tank! Your support through this Indiegogo campaign will give us the capital we need to complete these important tasks. We are building an amazing team of IT professionals, operations specialists, network administrators, community liaisons, and translators in order to ensure that the PWNAGE Li™ and PWNAGE Plaza™ MarketPlace Community deliver an exceptional user experience.  If you are interested in becoming part of our team, please visit our Join the PWNAGE Project page to apply, and thanks for your support!

***IMPORTANT NOTE: We're using flexible funding for this campaign because we WILL be manufacturing and delivering the PWNAGE Li™ to our backers by February 2014, regardless of whether we make the goal or not. This project is going forward, no matter what! By supporting our campaign at the $200 EARLY BIRD PACKAGE level, you will receive a PWNAGE Li™ gaming tablet one full month before the general public will have access to this device, and for $50 off MSRP.  We are doing this to help raise capital for infrastructure upgrades and additional staff hiring, and as an effort to give hardcore gamers, hackers, and developers the first chance to test out our new system.

Why Do We Need a New Platform?

The gaming industry is in a state of complacency. 

It's not that the big companies don’t have the resources to create new advances. It's that they make more money selling you the same system and games, just repackaged with minor improvements and maybe a little more power, over and over again. Basically they think it just doesn’t pay to be innovative and on the cutting edge.  

The major players in gaming have made it next to impossible for newcomers to create games. The major console and, even to some degree, PC gaming publishers have made it extremely difficult for the person in his or her living room to publish games. Years ago anyone could create a great game and publish it. But now they’re at the top and want to stay there. They do this by making SDKs and development kits unreachable for the average new developer, and then lock off their systems as Closed Source. You don’t like their interface? Well too bad, you're stuck with it. If you change it, you void your warranty.

What makes us different from the competition? A LOT! We’re here to show the gaming industry and the world that you don’t have to be a massive or established company to create awesome games, or the consoles to play them.

Freedom & Choice

We believe that consumers should be free to choose not only the products they use, but how those products work. What works for one person may not be the answer for another. Customization is an absolute necessity to provide the best possible experience for everyone. Android has taken over most of the phone, tablet, and now, even video game markets because it has pre-built solutions that work for many, but also allows consumers to completely customize it according to their needs.

All PWNAGE Li™ Game Systems Come Rooted, With an Unlocked Bootloader

For The PWNAGE Project™, it’s all about choice. We all know how annoying it is to be stuck with preloaded programs you'll never use, or you want to change to a new ROM but are afraid of voiding your warranty or “bricking” your device. Or maybe you just like to experiment. We understand, because so do we! And now with the PWNAGE Li™ Game System, you can feel free to experiment away! And if you do “brick” your device, we have a free system restore tool, just in case.

Pre-installed Software

It couldn’t be more simple: If you don’t want it, remove it!  The PWNAGE Li™ will ship free of bloatware that you can't uninstall, running in the background and eating up your device’s valuable systems resources.   This is YOUR tablet, you control the software!

Pure Unadulterated Android

We hate the thought of having to reinvent the wheel. That’s why we’re giving the community something that is truly awesome; Android OS. No weird little interfaces that are going to limit what you can do in your own system. Just an already great OS, that’s been optimized for gaming, and has everything you need to get the Full PWNAGE Project™ experience. Oh… and just in case you haven't heard, The Official PWNAGE Project™ ROM is being made in cooperation with FreakTab.com! 

The World As We See It…

We are supporters of all things Open Source. More heads are simply better than one. We know it, and the Open Source community knows it too. That’s what makes us different. Our platform is just that, a platform. Hardware and infrastructure. A medium to create on, and a way to get your product to the masses.

The PWNAGE Project™ is more than just a platform, its a whole new way of doing business…

The Goal of the PWNAGE Project™

Our goal is to take this ideology, and transform it into reality. To give everyone the ability to create, modify, and use our system the way they want. To bring back the days when anyone can create anywhere. To put the home user developing at his or her kitchen table, and the massive multi-national company on the same footing. To create new ideas and products that are truly innovative. And, to give consumers the freedom of choice…

The PWNAGE Li™ will also feature The PWNAGE Plaza™ MarketPlace Community, a one-stop-shop to download free and paid games, apps, mods, etc. But it's more than just a simple Market, it's also a Community site as well. Here are some of the great features you’ll see:

  • We’re building an immersive online community experience and have separate profiles, mini-sites, and stores for Members, Groups (clans, clubs, guilds for gamers, etc.), and Developers.
  • Members have their own profiles, wall, cloud storage, friends, and internal email, along with a ton of other cool features that we will be unveiling soon.
  • Groups also have their own profile/mini-site, with forums, group chat, group storage, and a whole lot more.
  • Developers have all the same access as the Members and Groups, and in addition have a mini-store built into their page that is linked directly to the main Market. 

All Members, Groups, and Developers have the following features as well:

  • Built in petition and voting systems. Petitions can be put on Group or Developer pages, the main site, or a combination of sites. 
  • Communication system that includes chat, VoIP, and video. And that’s just what we can tell you so far!

The PWNAGE Project™ Is About So Much More Than Just Games!

Gaming is in our blood, and is part of the PWNAGE Project™ core credo. But it's not the only thing you can do with the PWNAGE Li™. Please remember that first and foremost this is a fully functioning Tablet PC, not just a simple gaming device. Also keep in mind that the PWNAGE Plaza™ MarketPlace Community isn’t just about gaming either. Any program or app you can run on other Android devices can run on the PWNAGE Li™.

The PWNAGE Li™ is built on Android OS so that anyone from hobbyists to developers, and from one-person operations to multinational companies can participate. With our system, you're not just limited to creating games, you can create anything! Apps, Mods, ROMs, and anything else you can dream up. So come join the The PWNAGE Project™, and join the Open Source Revolution!

Who We Are, How We Got Here, and Why We Are Asking for Your Support

My name is Matt Leandro, and I am the founder of the PWNAGE Project™. When I started this project earlier this year, I honestly had no idea that it would have grown so quickly. I have been a gamer my whole life, and recently I became frustrated with what was currently available on the market. Thinking back on my own (extensive) years of gaming, the more I remembered all the things that I would change if I had the power to do so.  I decided to create The PWNAGE Project™ to finally do things right, and deliver the best possible experience for gamers. I wanted to make a system that was Open Source, so that it was always improving.  I understand the power of the crowd, and how collaboration with likeminded people can lead to amazing advances in technology and software.

During my research, I met Open Source developer Piotr Damek. I discussed my idea with him, and we went on to talk about all the other problems with proprietary software and hardware, and what we could do to give the user a better experience. The worst are the proprietary software licenses and that the warrantees are voided if you change or modify the software. After this first conversation, we decided to team up to create the first Tablet PC and Gaming Device that comes rooted, with an unlocked bootloader, and that has a license and warranty that allows you to actually own your device. 

If we're gonna make a device then we need a ROM, right? The first thing hackers (advanced users) do when getting a new device is to root it, and most install a new, custom ROM. From my own experience in rooting and installing custom ROMs on my devices, I already knew that FreakTab.com's team of developers was the best place to go, and offers the best community support! So I approached them and FreakTabs.com's co-founder Ray 'neomode' Trunk responded. He agreed to develop our "Official ROM" and was so impressed by the idea that he officially joined our team a week later.  Ray is a core member of our team, and will be continually upgrading our ROM to make sure you have the best experience possible.

Now, we are on our way! We have a fully-functional production unit and a global team of professionals building our system and the support solutions to go with it.

I want to make sure that when people learn about us they don't miss the main point of what we're all about. Yes, the PWNAGE Li™ model has a lot of new features and great concepts behind it, but the main point is freedom. Freedom to actually OWN your device, and to use it the way you want! Please join our project as a backer, and become part of the Free and Open Source revolution!

Matt Leandro - PWNAGE Project™ Founder

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand not everyone can help fund, but there are still things you can do to help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign any way you can!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools found near the top of this page!
  • Join our REFERRAL CONTEST and win a free PWNAGE Li!

TAKE YOUR GAME ANYWHERE!

TAKE YOUR GAME ANYWHERE!

story:
Hi, we are Sam Mattox, Zacc Wells and Carlton Cotten!

Ever since Sam's dream of becoming an NBA player and Zacc's dream of becoming an NFL player fell short due to injuries, we spend most of our time playing video games and downloading addictive apps to play even more video games!

As some of you may know Mambo is the main character to our game that consists of wild monkeys and ton of angry gorillas. Mambo is a game about how one little monkey named "Mambo" battles a ton of angry gorillas to take back control of his jungle. He goes throughout each level and fights these gorillas with no fear all by himself because he is totally awesome!! 

We Are Making The Most Coolest Game (With Your Help)!

Once upon a time in Sweetgum Jungle, a bunch of wild monkeys lived very peacefully. Until one day, a troop of angry gorillas invaded the jungle. These angry gorillas kicked all of the monkeys out of the jungle, stole all of their precious jewels, and most importantly, they ate all of the monkeys bananas. OH NO!!!!! THEY ATE ALL OF THE MONKEYS BANANAS!!!!! After kicking all of the monkeys out of the jungle, there was one brave little monkey who refused to be pushed around any longer and was determined to take back control of the Sweetgum Jungle. That one brave little monkey marched his butt right back to Sweetgum Jungle and he plans to not only battle the angry gorillas, but defeat them as well. By doing so, he must go throughout a ton of levels and defeat the angry gorillas in every level to take back control of the jungle! This is the story of the chosen one. The one that they call "Mambo". 

This game features fun and challenging game mechanics, as well as cut-scenes animated in the style of Mambo. Mambo even has his own special theme song! That instantly makes him the most awesome and coolest monkey ever!!!! 


 

 



We have a few games we would like to make in the Mambo series, we're starting with a game that we feel is both fun and can be produced and launched relatively quickly. If we can raise the money, this game should only take about 4 months of dedicated development to get into everyone's hands! 

If Mambo does well, we will immediately begin to work on a few other really exciting game ideas and follow ups to the series. The goal is to always have a game in development FOREVER, so there's always something new and awesome to look forward to! 

We have always wanted to make a game. A game that will not just be a "simple game" but a game that will grow into the next household game! We love the animated show, and if we could partner with a real game studio to make a game around Mambo, I believe we could make something that's both fun and funny!

We get bored really easily, so trust us, this game is gonna have to be AWESOME!

 

It takes more than just an idea to create something as epic as a Mambo video game! There are the game developers, graphic artists, animators, voice over talent, editors....and that's just to name a few.

We Need Your Help!

Every penny donated (after covering the awesome donation perks, etc) will go toward the production of this, and FUTURE games. Game production will begin as soon as funds start coming in. If we're able to surpass our goal, we can start production on the next game and more Mambo episodes!

Wanna Help??

WOW!! OH BOY, YOU ARE AMAZING!

Every pledge will help make this vision become a reality. Contribute today and receive the EXCLUSIVE REWARDS available ONLY to those pledging through this IndieGogo campaign. 

In addition, we are also donating a percentage of our profits (If Funded) from Mambo to St. Jude. Like Mambo, St. Jude kids are also battling a battle, a much bigger battle cancer. We believe we can not only create the next big game, but also save lives while doing so!   




The best part about making a contribution (other than being part of a movement that completely changes everything we've ever known about gaming forever because it has a theme song and a monkey slaying angry gorillas. Some of that might be an embellishment) are the rewards of course! All of our give backs are EXCLUSIVE to this IndieGogo campaign. These are all things "Mambo" that you've never seen before and our swag was created specifically with our contributors in mind. Check out the tiers on the right for some of the cool stuff you can get if you donate!

EARLY BIRD MAMBO T-SHIRT!!!!!

EXCLUSIVE TEAM MAMBO DOG TAGS!!!!!

LIMITED EDITION MAMBO IPHONE 3/ IPHONE 4/ IPHONE 5 CASE!!!!!

BECOME A MEMBER OF THE AKUNAMATADA TRIBE AND HAVE YOUR OWN PERSONAL NAME ON OUR "WALL OF FAME" IN OUR GAME CREDITS THAT WILL BE LOCATED INSIDE OUR GAME!!!! HOW AWESOME IS THAT!?!?

GET MORE COOL STUFF...SPREAD THE WORD!!!!!!

All you have to do is share using the "Share This Campaign" link above!

During the course of the campaign, we'll be running some ongoing challenges to get your community involved.

Use the "Share This Campaign" link above and post it EVERYWHERE so your friends can check out the project and get in on the action. The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your odds are for getting the special prizes! 

  • The top three referral sources (by dollars raised) will be offered a chance to have an animated character designed around them and will appear in a few levels of Mambo! 
  • The top three referral sources by total donors referred (i.e. individuals that donate through your unique referral link) will earn themselves an exclusive mystery basket bundle! 

So, that's the deal! We're excited and we hope you are too. Thank you in advance for your support and for helping us make this vision an awesome cool reality!

Bless your face. If you sneezed during this campaign, bless you. Peace Off Mambo Nation!!!!!

JOIN US AND BECOME A TEAMMATE ON "TEAM MAMBO"

THEY ATE ALL OF THE MONKEYS BANANAS!!!!! After kicking all of the monkeys out of the jungle, there was one brave little monkey who refused to be pushed around any longer and was determined to take back control of the Sweetgum Jungle. That one brave little monkey marched his butt right back to Sweetgum Jungle and he plans to not only battle the angry gorillas, but defeat them as well. By doing so, he must go throughout a ton of levels and defeat the angry gorillas in every level to take back control of the jungle! This is the story of the chosen one. The one that they call "Mambo". 
This game features fun and challenging game mechanics, as well as cut-scenes animated in the style of Mambo. Mambo even has his own special theme song! That instantly makes him the most awesome and coolest monkey ever!!!! 
 

 












We have a few games we would like to make in the Mambo series, we're starting with a game that we feel is both fun and can be produced and launched relatively quickly. If we can raise the money, this game should only take about 4 months of dedicated development to get into everyone's hands! 






If Mambo does well, we will immediately begin to work on a few other really exciting game ideas and follow ups to the series. The goal is to always have a game in development FOREVER, so there's always something new and awesome to look forward to! 
We have always wanted to make a game. A game that will not just be a "simple game" but a game that will grow into the next household game! We love the animated show, and if we could partner with a real game studio to make a game around Mambo, I believe we could make something that's both fun and funny!
We get bored really easily, so trust us, this game is gonna have to be AWESOME!



 
It takes more than just an idea to create something as epic as a Mambo video game! There are the game developers, graphic artists, animators, voice over talent, editors....and that's just to name a few.

We Need Your Help!

Every penny donated (after covering the awesome donation perks, etc) will go toward the production of this, and FUTURE games. Game production will begin as soon as funds start coming in. If we're able to surpass our goal, we can start production on the next game and more Mambo episodes!
Wanna Help??
WOW!! OH BOY, YOU ARE AMAZING!
Every pledge will help make this vision become a reality. Contribute today and receive the EXCLUSIVE REWARDS available ONLY to those pledging through this IndieGogo campaign. 

In addition, we are also donating a percentage of our profits (If Funded) from Mambo to St. Jude. Like Mambo, St. Jude kids are also battling a battle, a much bigger battle cancer. We believe we can not only create the next big game, but also save lives while doing so!   


































The best part about making a contribution (other than being part of a movement that completely changes everything we've ever known about gaming forever because it has a theme song and a monkey slaying angry gorillas. Some of that might be an embellishment) are the rewards of course! All of our give backs are EXCLUSIVE to this IndieGogo campaign. These are all things "Mambo" that you've never seen before and our swag was created specifically with our contributors in mind. Check out the tiers on the right for some of the cool stuff you can get if you donate!
EARLY BIRD MAMBO T-SHIRT!!!!!


EXCLUSIVE TEAM MAMBO DOG TAGS!!!!!


LIMITED EDITION MAMBO IPHONE 3/ IPHONE 4/ IPHONE 5 CASE!!!!!


BECOME A MEMBER OF THE AKUNAMATADA TRIBE AND HAVE YOUR OWN PERSONAL NAME ON OUR "WALL OF FAME" IN OUR GAME CREDITS THAT WILL BE LOCATED INSIDE OUR GAME!!!! HOW AWESOME IS THAT!?!?



GET MORE COOL STUFF...SPREAD THE WORD!!!!!!
All you have to do is share using the "Share This Campaign" link above!
During the course of the campaign, we'll be running some ongoing challenges to get your community involved.
Use the "Share This Campaign" link above and post it EVERYWHERE so your friends can check out the project and get in on the action. The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your odds are for getting the special prizes! 



The top three referral sources (by dollars raised) will be offered a chance to have an animated character designed around them and will appear in a few levels of Mambo! 

The top three referral sources by total donors referred (i.e. individuals that donate through your unique referral link) will earn themselves an exclusive mystery basket bundle! 


So, that's the deal! We're excited and we hope you are too. Thank you in advance for your support and for helping us make this vision an awesome cool reality!
Bless your face. If you sneezed during this campaign, bless you. Peace Off Mambo Nation!!!!!
JOIN US AND BECOME A TEAMMATE ON "TEAM MAMBO"

story:
The 4th Horse,  "Master It If You Dare!"

Hi I’m Jim O’Connor the inventor of “The 4th Horse” an exciting, aggressive and highly strategic card game. The best way to describe this amazing game is The 4th Horse is where, poker meets chess in a cage fight." Two to four players enter a game but only one player comes out the winner or alive for that matter.

There has been a lot of development go into the 4th Horse site, cards, rules, mobile platform etc and it has been a great journey.   But now me and my team need help to take it to the next level. That's where you come in I hope.  I would like to ask for your help raising the funds needed to complete the journey.  I would also like to invite you along for the ride as well.  It is going to be a great ride and I wont quit until we get there. 

Help us grow the experience and you will pick up some seriously cool exclusive stuff.   

If you would like to get on board this campaign you can be a part of history and help grow the 4th Horse experience.  You will be rewarded generously for participating, with heaps of really great value things like memberships, card sets, limited edition T-Shirts. 

Simply have a look at the perks to the right of this screen and if you would like grab one.  For as little as $25.00 you can get a heaps of really cool stuff.  I have made the perks as generous as I possibly can so you wont be unhappy.  What's more many of the perks below are exclusive to this campaign only, which means you will never be able to get them again.   When the 4th Horse does go global they will be worth something.

If you want to know more about the 4th Horse and where it is going read on.  But don't forget to have a look at the perks they're great. 

Anyone who contributes to this campaign will have their name and photo (optional) listed in The 4th Horse Hall of Fame.

Go Check Out The Perks Now.  They're listed on the right of this page. For more detailed explanations and to have a look at some of the stuff you will be getting go to the bottom of this page.

The Vision, A total experience

My vision for the 4th Horse goes beyond just creating an amazing game. I want to give my members a total experience on a global scale. Have no doubts The 4th Horse already is a seriously compelling, aggressive, strategy game that tests you from the moment you start playing. We intend to make the 4th Horse a global game, with online and live tournaments around the world and much more.

The 4th Horse Picture Cards

The 4th Horse Number Cards


Intense fun and connecting with players around the world.

The 4th Horse total experience is about connecting people from all around the world online and or face to face through The 4th Horse Live Global tournaments. Players will be able to have huge amounts of fun holding challenge matches or participating in local and global tournaments both live and online.  The 4th Horse experience will be entertaining to watch as much as it is to play.  The 4th Horse Experience is also about finding those very special and talented people who could rise to the top and become 4th Horse Legends and a whole bunch more.  What about you do you think you have got what it takes to become a Legend of The Game!

Become the first ever 4th Horse World Champion

Once were set up we will quickly begin searching for the first Grand Masters and ultimately the First World Champion.  Imagine your name being placed in The 4th Horse Hall of Fame as first ever Grand Master or international Grand Master or the worlds first ever World Champion.  It is going to be someone it might as well be you.

The total 4th Horse experience will also include everything a player needs,  to learn how to become a Master Player.  They will be able to enter tournaments all around the world and to become a Master Player or an International Grand Master.  The 4th Horse Total Experience includes experienced players coaching new players, forums, social experiences and simple visual entertainment.  They will even be able to charge for their coaching if they want to.

Business Builders and Affiliate Memberships

I want members to benefit from being a part of the 4th Horse community by playing and/or by building their own businesses using The 4th Horse Business Builder memberships. I want to do this without the gambling associated with other card games.

I also want local members to be able to run their own live tournaments under our licence in which they will be able to keep the lions share of the profits.  This could be very lucrative for any hard working person.

Me and my team know how to do this and I completely believe that when it is done The 4th Horse will be a global game up there with all the great games of all time.  But we need your help.

We'd really appreciate the support and want to thank you in advance 

We need help to raise the money to finish the development of the technology and to hire staff to fund the marketing campaign to pay the legals and so much more.  I also need your input to make The 4th Horse total experience as good as it can be.  For now however I am only asking for enough funds to finish the development of the technology and some basic admin and marketing. 

Thank you perks you can use straight away.

If you would like to help me raise funds I would greatly appreciated and I thank you in advance.

To raise the funds I have put together a whole bunch of super cool, exclusive, great value perks at super discounted prices. Because me and my team have completed a lot of the work already many of the perks are available right away. Which means that when you contribute to this campaign not only will you be getting them at massive discounts you can access a lot of them now.  No waiting to start playing. Some of the perks are still in development but we will get them to you asap.  Some of the perks you will have to wait a short time for.  

Just take a look at the perks to the right of this page, or below (for more detail) and pick any or all of those that suit you the most.

Help us grow the experience

If you want to participate more closely in helping take The 4th Horse global write to me with your ideas. Me and my team will be reading every single suggestion. If we use your ideas you will be rewarded by becoming part of our global ideas team.  Send them to info@the4thhorse.com

Join in the discussion.

If you want to join in the discussion and find out more about The 4th Horse Goes Global project follow this link to The Crowd Funding Forum and find out more. 

http://crowdfundingforum.com/showthread.php/8192-(Indiegogo)-The-4th-Horse-The-Next-Global-Card-Game-Phenomenon

We're still developing the mobile platforms. 

We've begun work on the Mobile platforms.  This is a mock up of how the game will be displayed on Iphone.  Once we get this completed we will move on to Android and Windows platforms.

The Back Story or the Perks

If you want to know about the background behind the 4th Horse have a look at the story below.

Or if you would like to just go straight to the perks and see what you can get, just have a look at the perks listed on the right hand side of this page.  For more details, scroll down to where it says The Perks to see what's on offer. on the bottom of this page.

I was 19 and as savvy as a brick

I invented The 4th Horse when I was 19 because I was bored and I would do anything to avoid studying for my exams.  In those days the internet wasn't even a thought in someones head and I was about as business savvy as a brick; so I did what most 19 year olds would do with a good idea.  I stuck the rules in a drawer and decided to do something with them later.

A little While Later

Well some 28 years later when I was cleaning out my garage I found those rules in a box and I remember thinking its funny how they have traveled around with me for so long and they surface now.  Now that we have the internet and super fast computers.

I decided this must be a good omen, I remember thinking because we have all this technology now I have to take The 4th Horse from an idea in my head and go totally global with it.  With that in mind I revamped the rules, I made them edgy,  aggressive, with a medieval look and feel.  I found an IT company to help build the site (Medma Infomatix.  they're great), programs and apps the graphic design and all the rest.

The 4th Horse is Where Poker, Meets Chess in a Cage Fight.

The 4th Horse is based around the idea of four Royal families going to war each trying to dominate or destroy the other as they fight for supremacy. As I said the best way to describe The 4th Horse is it is a game where the tension of poker meets the strategy of chess in an aggressive no holds bared cage fight battle for supremacy.

To win you have to be strategic and aggressive or very, very, subtle, because if you aren't you will get smashed. You have to be smart, focused and determined or you don't have a chance.  You have to be clever because brute force isn't enough. It's a game where only the hardest, toughest and smartest win.  

Your job is to battle to capture a Royal House, or knock your opponents out of the game. You can assassinate a whole House, force your opponents to give up there hard won gains and a hole lot more.  You have to do this all while they are trying to do the same to you. If you don't follow the action you're dead. 

If all this isn't enough action for you their is also the Devastation Play, the Siege Play and the the Sudden Death rule.  In The 4th Horse you aren't safe and the tension never stops until you are the only player left.  There are no draws only winners and what ever is left of everyone else at the end.  Harsh I know, but heaps of fun.

Why am I doing this? 

In that moment when I found those rules in a box in my garage I said to myself this is an opportunity to take an idea I had all those years ago and bring it to the world.  

As ridiculous as it may sound, I made a commitment to myself that I am not allowed to give up until I make the 4th horse go global.  Besides I want to prove that a little bloke can succeed if he is persistent, thoughtful enough and gathers the right team and also asks for a bunch of help from a whole bunch or really nice people. 

I hope you can help or I am going to have to live for a very long time if I try to pay for all of this on my own.  Besides it's no fun doing the whole global phenomenon thing all on your own.

I totally believe in The 4th Horse and so do others, The Beta Testing Event

The 4th Horse is an awesome game. In November 2012 I ran a beta testing event.  At that event which was held in Sydney Australia I showed a bunch people how to play, I demonstrated the website and then we let people play.  At the end of the night I collected feedback which we have used to improve The 4th Horse experience.  The feedback I received was unanimous and positive. The 4th Horse is a fantastic game with broad appeal to a wide range of players. It has the potential to be a "World Game".

We're Nearly There But we Need Your Help to Finish

So far I've funded the development of everything from the website, the programs, the mobile platforms, the cards the graphics, the legals all out of my own pocket. I've gone as far as I can on a seriously tight budget. That's where you guys come in I hope.   I'd like to ask for your help to get the 4th Horse completed ready to launch hopefully early in 2014 assuming I can get everything done in time.

So if you would like to get on board please have a look at the perks to the right of this page and choose which ever one / ones you would like.  As soon as I can I will get it to you asap.

Here's what I have to get done before Launch

Me and my team have completed almost all of the website the game program, the facebook site and back end Content Management System.  We are currently doing the user testing.  The basic system is already really good.  It just needs tweaking.

Site Update and Mobile App Development Costs : ($19000)

We will need a bunch of people to join and start running the site and game through their paces, and sending in feedback so we can make them the best experience possible. That's why everyone who joins the campaign gets a diamond membership.  We want you to start playing now.  When the information comes in we'll make changes based on the feed back.  Please be kind though.  This is the beta version we know we have a lot of development to do before it's perfect.  Having said that I am budgeting 

  1. Website Updates ($1000)
  2. Game Engine Updates for Artificial Intelligence, 3 and 4 player modes ($5000)
  3. How to play, interactive, Learning Program ($4000)
  4. Mobile Platform Development (iOS,Android,WP8) ($9000)

Merchandise: ($1000)

The physical cards and the rule books are almost complete.  We need to organize the final artwork and we need to organize suppliers, and then pay for merchandise and set up the distribution system.

  1. Stock on hand ($1000)

Marketing Materials ($3000)

A business rises and falls on the strength of its marketing.  

  1. Marketing video ($2000)
  2. Merchandise and branding materials ($1000)

Advertising ($1000) up until the Launch

We will need to get the buzz out.  Mostly we will be doing our best to get PR but paid advertising will still need to be done.  Here's what we estimate will be the minimum spend.  

  1. Advertisements (Facebook Ads, Banners) ($500)
  2. Google Advertising ($500)

Running Costs and Support : ($4000) for 12 months

  1. Hosting Servers ($1500 PA)
  2. IT Support ($1500)
  3. Website Help Desk ($1000 P/A)

At the moment the how to play videos on the site are really basic and are really only there as place holders.  They will be replaced with an interactive how to play learning program.

An interactive how to play course needs to be built so people can learn and develop their game.  The three and four player AI system has to be developed. There is a lot of work to be done to complete.

I have to complete the business builders system in which members can build their own 4th Horse businesses using our technology.  Think of this as building your own group within The 4th Horse framework and we will pay you generously to do so.  I completely believe in sharing the success of a business with the members.  This is one example of how I intend to do that. 

The mobile apps for iPhone and Android have to be completed.  This includes the 2, 3 and 4 player versions. At present we are half way through completing the free version in which you put yourself against the computer.  You could try to beat it now.

We also need to hire animators, a marketing manager, and an assistant , complete my marketing plan and then role out the marketing plan. I am hoping to get enough from this campaign to pay for staff and a dedicated marketing person for 12 months.  We have a lot in store for the first 12 months, so if you could help make this campaign as successful as possible me and my team would be eternally grateful. 

I have to pay for merchandise and marketing materials, events, advertising, prizes, legals, and a lot more.  I need to pay for the Indiegogo campaign.  This will of course depend on how much will be raised.  

Once that is all complete we need to then take it to the world by organizing real world live events where people get to play and experience the the 4th Horse. 

Once we get enough members we then have to organize the worlds first 4th Horse World Championship Tournament. Hopefully by the end of 2014 we will be running the first ever 4th Horse Grand Master tournament.  In early 2015 we intend to crown the worlds first ever World Champion.  

I estimate that in order to get The 4th Horse ready for launch this will all cost a minimum of $28000.00.  But enough of my prattle.  Have a look at the perks to the right of this page and choose any you like and I will get them to you asap. They are packed full of exclusive stuff.  

Thanks for taking the time to have a look at my campaign. 

Cheers

Jim

 

The Perks

My Eternal Gratitude, Cool Stuff and One Time Only Exclusive Perks

If you help me complete everything I need to get done by contributing to this campaign, not only will I be seriously grateful and your name will be placed in the 4th Horse Hall of fame forever, I will also give you a bunch of cool stuff, exclusive stuff and one time only stuff.

GET MORE COOL STUFF ... SPREAD THE WORD!!!

If you want a chance to get a whole bunch of additional cool stuff use the  "Share This Campaign" link above and let people know about the 4th Horse campaign.  

Click on the "Share This Campaign" link above and post it every where so your friends can check out the project and get in on the action.  The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your odds are for getting the special prizes!

  • The top three referral sources (by dollars raised) will be offered a chance to have an animation designed by them (with the help of our design team).  It will become part of the Game Play Interval Entertainment that will automatically pop up on a game table when something awesome happens.  You will also get an invite to the 4th Horse's launch party! 
  • The top three referral sources by total donors referred (i.e. individuals that donate through your unique referral link) will earn themselves an invite to our launch party and the perks that go with it! 

So get on board, the 4th Horse Train.  This trip is going to be awesome. Thank you in advance for your support and for helping us make this vision a reality. 

Cheers

Jim

What's really exciting is you will be able to use most of the features immediately as they are already operating.  Some still need work but we will iron those out as soon as we have the funds.  As everything gets upgraded you will receive the benefits automatically.

You will also receive the Hall of Fame Founding Members entry and a Diamond Membership, the mobile app when it becomes available and the news letter.

Remember you will need to give us your T size.  Either small, medium, large, Xtra Large.  T's will be made to order so you'll need to give us about 6 weeks to get it to you.

Remeber to tell us which T you want.  Also remember you will need to give us your T size.  Either small, medium, large, Xtra Large.  T's will be made to order so you'll need toive us about 6 weeks to get it to you.
