If you contribute $500.00 you will receive heaps of stuff plus an exclusive VIP invitation to The 4th Horse Launch party in Sydney Australia as well as a VIP pass for all official 4th Horse Live events for your life time.  

At the party I will be personally teaching people how to Master The 4th Horse, answering any questions, making an announcement about the first Work Titles as well as signing books.  You'll get to meet the team give us feedback on how were doing.

You will also go down in The 4th Horse Hall of Immortals as part of an elite group of members who were there at the official Launch.  

Remember you will need to give us your T size.  Either small, medium, large, Xtra Large.  T's will be made to order so you'll need to give us about 6 weeks to get it to you. 

 

Remember If you use the "Share This Campaign Link" above you are in the running for more exclusive stuff.

 

FAQ

Q: Will the game be free or paid?

A: Their will be a free version and a paid version.  The free version gives you access to the game and many of the sites features..  The paid version ( one of several subscription packages) gives you access to all the cool stuff the site offers, like video chat,  recording games and more. 

Q. When do we get the perks?

A: That depends on the perk and where in the world you are. For items that require physical shipment please give us 6 - 10 weeks beyond the end of the campaign. You may receive your perk earlier if circumstances permit.

Q. How do I tell you my t-shirt size?

A: Just put your tee shirt size in with your order. Small, Medium, Large, Xtra Large. 

Q. What if I left out the shipping costs by mistake?

A. Just send us an email and make the additional payment for the shipping and when we have confirmation we will send your stuff. 

Q. Why don't I see my comment anymore?

A. We will need to review comments before they go live.  This is to prevent silliness.  With that in mind, once we review your comments and if it is not deemed to be unacceptable it will go live. 

Q. Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?

A. Yes that's fine.  But you will need to make it clear that you are upgrading or  you may end up having to pay for two orders.  Just let us know when you're upgrading.  

 Thanks for taking the time to look at my campaign.  Me and the team really appreciate it.

 All the best

 

Jim
story_txt:
The 4th Horse,  "Master It If You Dare!"

Hi I’m Jim O’Connor the inventor of “The 4th Horse” an exciting, aggressive and highly strategic card game. The best way to describe this amazing game is The 4th Horse is where, poker meets chess in a cage fight." Two to four players enter a game but only one player comes out the winner or alive for that matter.
There has been a lot of development go into the 4th Horse site, cards, rules, mobile platform etc and it has been a great journey.   But now me and my team need help to take it to the next level. That's where you come in I hope.  I would like to ask for your help raising the funds needed to complete the journey.  I would also like to invite you along for the ride as well.  It is going to be a great ride and I wont quit until we get there. 
Help us grow the experience and you will pick up some seriously cool exclusive stuff.   


If you would like to get on board this campaign you can be a part of history and help grow the 4th Horse experience.  You will be rewarded generously for participating, with heaps of really great value things like memberships, card sets, limited edition T-Shirts. 
Simply have a look at the perks to the right of this screen and if you would like grab one.  For as little as $25.00 you can get a heaps of really cool stuff.  I have made the perks as generous as I possibly can so you wont be unhappy.  What's more many of the perks below are exclusive to this campaign only, which means you will never be able to get them again.   When the 4th Horse does go global they will be worth something.
If you want to know more about the 4th Horse and where it is going read on.  But don't forget to have a look at the perks they're great. 
Anyone who contributes to this campaign will have their name and photo (optional) listed in The 4th Horse Hall of Fame.
Go Check Out The Perks Now.  They're listed on the right of this page. For more detailed explanations and to have a look at some of the stuff you will be getting go to the bottom of this page.



The Vision, A total experience







My vision for the 4th Horse goes beyond just creating an amazing game. I want to give my members a total experience on a global scale. Have no doubts The 4th Horse already is a seriously compelling, aggressive, strategy game that tests you from the moment you start playing. We intend to make the 4th Horse a global game, with online and live tournaments around the world and much more.
The 4th Horse Picture Cards


The 4th Horse Number Cards


Intense fun and connecting with players around the world.



The 4th Horse total experience is about connecting people from all around the world online and or face to face through The 4th Horse Live Global tournaments. Players will be able to have huge amounts of fun holding challenge matches or participating in local and global tournaments both live and online.  The 4th Horse experience will be entertaining to watch as much as it is to play.  The 4th Horse Experience is also about finding those very special and talented people who could rise to the top and become 4th Horse Legends and a whole bunch more.  What about you do you think you have got what it takes to become a Legend of The Game!
Become the first ever 4th Horse World Champion


Once were set up we will quickly begin searching for the first Grand Masters and ultimately the First World Champion.  Imagine your name being placed in The 4th Horse Hall of Fame as first ever Grand Master or international Grand Master or the worlds first ever World Champion.  It is going to be someone it might as well be you.
The total 4th Horse experience will also include everything a player needs,  to learn how to become a Master Player.  They will be able to enter tournaments all around the world and to become a Master Player or an International Grand Master.  The 4th Horse Total Experience includes experienced players coaching new players, forums, social experiences and simple visual entertainment.  They will even be able to charge for their coaching if they want to.

Business Builders and Affiliate Memberships



I want members to benefit from being a part of the 4th Horse community by playing and/or by building their own businesses using The 4th Horse Business Builder memberships. I want to do this without the gambling associated with other card games.
I also want local members to be able to run their own live tournaments under our licence in which they will be able to keep the lions share of the profits.  This could be very lucrative for any hard working person.
Me and my team know how to do this and I completely believe that when it is done The 4th Horse will be a global game up there with all the great games of all time.  But we need your help.
We'd really appreciate the support and want to thank you in advance 
We need help to raise the money to finish the development of the technology and to hire staff to fund the marketing campaign to pay the legals and so much more.  I also need your input to make The 4th Horse total experience as good as it can be.  For now however I am only asking for enough funds to finish the development of the technology and some basic admin and marketing. 
Thank you perks you can use straight away.



If you would like to help me raise funds I would greatly appreciated and I thank you in advance.
To raise the funds I have put together a whole bunch of super cool, exclusive, great value perks at super discounted prices. Because me and my team have completed a lot of the work already many of the perks are available right away. Which means that when you contribute to this campaign not only will you be getting them at massive discounts you can access a lot of them now.  No waiting to start playing. Some of the perks are still in development but we will get them to you asap.  Some of the perks you will have to wait a short time for.  
Just take a look at the perks to the right of this page, or below (for more detail) and pick any or all of those that suit you the most.
Help us grow the experience


If you want to participate more closely in helping take The 4th Horse global write to me with your ideas. Me and my team will be reading every single suggestion. If we use your ideas you will be rewarded by becoming part of our global ideas team.  Send them to info@the4thhorse.com
Join in the discussion.
If you want to join in the discussion and find out more about The 4th Horse Goes Global project follow this link to The Crowd Funding Forum and find out more. 
http://crowdfundingforum.com/showthread.php/8192-(Indiegogo)-The-4th-Horse-The-Next-Global-Card-Game-Phenomenon
We're still developing the mobile platforms. 

We've begun work on the Mobile platforms.  This is a mock up of how the game will be displayed on Iphone.  Once we get this completed we will move on to Android and Windows platforms.
The Back Story or the Perks



If you want to know about the background behind the 4th Horse have a look at the story below.
Or if you would like to just go straight to the perks and see what you can get, just have a look at the perks listed on the right hand side of this page.  For more details, scroll down to where it says The Perks to see what's on offer. on the bottom of this page.
I was 19 and as savvy as a brick
I invented The 4th Horse when I was 19 because I was bored and I would do anything to avoid studying for my exams.  In those days the internet wasn't even a thought in someones head and I was about as business savvy as a brick; so I did what most 19 year olds would do with a good idea.  I stuck the rules in a drawer and decided to do something with them later.
A little While Later
Well some 28 years later when I was cleaning out my garage I found those rules in a box and I remember thinking its funny how they have traveled around with me for so long and they surface now.  Now that we have the internet and super fast computers.
I decided this must be a good omen, I remember thinking because we have all this technology now I have to take The 4th Horse from an idea in my head and go totally global with it.  With that in mind I revamped the rules, I made them edgy,  aggressive, with a medieval look and feel.  I found an IT company to help build the site (Medma Infomatix.  they're great), programs and apps the graphic design and all the rest.
The 4th Horse is Where Poker, Meets Chess in a Cage Fight.







The 4th Horse is based around the idea of four Royal families going to war each trying to dominate or destroy the other as they fight for supremacy. As I said the best way to describe The 4th Horse is it is a game where the tension of poker meets the strategy of chess in an aggressive no holds bared cage fight battle for supremacy.
To win you have to be strategic and aggressive or very, very, subtle, because if you aren't you will get smashed. You have to be smart, focused and determined or you don't have a chance.  You have to be clever because brute force isn't enough. It's a game where only the hardest, toughest and smartest win.  
Your job is to battle to capture a Royal House, or knock your opponents out of the game. You can assassinate a whole House, force your opponents to give up there hard won gains and a hole lot more.  You have to do this all while they are trying to do the same to you. If you don't follow the action you're dead. 
If all this isn't enough action for you their is also the Devastation Play, the Siege Play and the the Sudden Death rule.  In The 4th Horse you aren't safe and the tension never stops until you are the only player left.  There are no draws only winners and what ever is left of everyone else at the end.  Harsh I know, but heaps of fun.
Why am I doing this? 
In that moment when I found those rules in a box in my garage I said to myself this is an opportunity to take an idea I had all those years ago and bring it to the world.  
As ridiculous as it may sound, I made a commitment to myself that I am not allowed to give up until I make the 4th horse go global.  Besides I want to prove that a little bloke can succeed if he is persistent, thoughtful enough and gathers the right team and also asks for a bunch of help from a whole bunch or really nice people. 
I hope you can help or I am going to have to live for a very long time if I try to pay for all of this on my own.  Besides it's no fun doing the whole global phenomenon thing all on your own.
I totally believe in The 4th Horse and so do others, The Beta Testing Event
The 4th Horse is an awesome game. In November 2012 I ran a beta testing event.  At that event which was held in Sydney Australia I showed a bunch people how to play, I demonstrated the website and then we let people play.  At the end of the night I collected feedback which we have used to improve The 4th Horse experience.  The feedback I received was unanimous and positive. The 4th Horse is a fantastic game with broad appeal to a wide range of players. It has the potential to be a "World Game".
We're Nearly There But we Need Your Help to Finish
So far I've funded the development of everything from the website, the programs, the mobile platforms, the cards the graphics, the legals all out of my own pocket. I've gone as far as I can on a seriously tight budget. That's where you guys come in I hope.   I'd like to ask for your help to get the 4th Horse completed ready to launch hopefully early in 2014 assuming I can get everything done in time.
So if you would like to get on board please have a look at the perks to the right of this page and choose which ever one / ones you would like.  As soon as I can I will get it to you asap.
Here's what I have to get done before Launch



Me and my team have completed almost all of the website the game program, the facebook site and back end Content Management System.  We are currently doing the user testing.  The basic system is already really good.  It just needs tweaking.

Site Update and Mobile App Development Costs : ($19000)
We will need a bunch of people to join and start running the site and game through their paces, and sending in feedback so we can make them the best experience possible. That's why everyone who joins the campaign gets a diamond membership.  We want you to start playing now.  When the information comes in we'll make changes based on the feed back.  Please be kind though.  This is the beta version we know we have a lot of development to do before it's perfect.  Having said that I am budgeting 



Website Updates ($1000)


Game Engine Updates for Artificial Intelligence, 3 and 4 player modes ($5000)


How to play, interactive, Learning Program ($4000)

Mobile Platform Development (iOS,Android,WP8) ($9000)



Merchandise: ($1000)
The physical cards and the rule books are almost complete.  We need to organize the final artwork and we need to organize suppliers, and then pay for merchandise and set up the distribution system.

Stock on hand ($1000)


Marketing Materials ($3000)
A business rises and falls on the strength of its marketing.  


Marketing video ($2000)
Merchandise and branding materials ($1000)

Advertising ($1000) up until the Launch
We will need to get the buzz out.  Mostly we will be doing our best to get PR but paid advertising will still need to be done.  Here's what we estimate will be the minimum spend.  

Advertisements (Facebook Ads, Banners) ($500)

Google Advertising ($500)



Running Costs and Support : ($4000) for 12 months



Hosting Servers ($1500 PA)


IT Support ($1500)

Website Help Desk ($1000 P/A)



At the moment the how to play videos on the site are really basic and are really only there as place holders.  They will be replaced with an interactive how to play learning program.
An interactive how to play course needs to be built so people can learn and develop their game.  The three and four player AI system has to be developed. There is a lot of work to be done to complete.
I have to complete the business builders system in which members can build their own 4th Horse businesses using our technology.  Think of this as building your own group within The 4th Horse framework and we will pay you generously to do so.  I completely believe in sharing the success of a business with the members.  This is one example of how I intend to do that. 
The mobile apps for iPhone and Android have to be completed.  This includes the 2, 3 and 4 player versions. At present we are half way through completing the free version in which you put yourself against the computer.  You could try to beat it now.
We also need to hire animators, a marketing manager, and an assistant , complete my marketing plan and then role out the marketing plan. I am hoping to get enough from this campaign to pay for staff and a dedicated marketing person for 12 months.  We have a lot in store for the first 12 months, so if you could help make this campaign as successful as possible me and my team would be eternally grateful. 
I have to pay for merchandise and marketing materials, events, advertising, prizes, legals, and a lot more.  I need to pay for the Indiegogo campaign.  This will of course depend on how much will be raised.  
Once that is all complete we need to then take it to the world by organizing real world live events where people get to play and experience the the 4th Horse. 
Once we get enough members we then have to organize the worlds first 4th Horse World Championship Tournament. Hopefully by the end of 2014 we will be running the first ever 4th Horse Grand Master tournament.  In early 2015 we intend to crown the worlds first ever World Champion.  
I estimate that in order to get The 4th Horse ready for launch this will all cost a minimum of $28000.00.  But enough of my prattle.  Have a look at the perks to the right of this page and choose any you like and I will get them to you asap. They are packed full of exclusive stuff.  
Thanks for taking the time to have a look at my campaign. 
Cheers
Jim
 
The Perks



My Eternal Gratitude, Cool Stuff and One Time Only Exclusive Perks
If you help me complete everything I need to get done by contributing to this campaign, not only will I be seriously grateful and your name will be placed in the 4th Horse Hall of fame forever, I will also give you a bunch of cool stuff, exclusive stuff and one time only stuff.
GET MORE COOL STUFF ... SPREAD THE WORD!!!
If you want a chance to get a whole bunch of additional cool stuff use the  "Share This Campaign" link above and let people know about the 4th Horse campaign.  
Click on the "Share This Campaign" link above and post it every where so your friends can check out the project and get in on the action.  The more people that use your link to donate to the campaign, the better your odds are for getting the special prizes!


The top three referral sources (by dollars raised) will be offered a chance to have an animation designed by them (with the help of our design team).  It will become part of the Game Play Interval Entertainment that will automatically pop up on a game table when something awesome happens.  You will also get an invite to the 4th Horse's launch party! 



The top three referral sources by total donors referred (i.e. individuals that donate through your unique referral link) will earn themselves an invite to our launch party and the perks that go with it! 

So get on board, the 4th Horse Train.  This trip is going to be awesome. Thank you in advance for your support and for helping us make this vision a reality. 
Cheers
Jim

Remeber to tell us which T you want.  Also remember you will need to give us your T size.  Either small, medium, large, Xtra Large.  T's will be made to order so you'll need toive us about 6 weeks to get it to you.

Name and Photo in the Founding Member Hall of Fame forever (Priceless)
The Highest Tier Diamond Membership. (RRP $49.00pa)
Plus the Mobile app (when available. ( RRP $1-$5)

Plus the New Official 4th Horse Rule Book, Signed and Dated, (RRP $25.00)
Plus the 4th Horse Master It If You Dare! official Company T-Shirt (Standard T)
Plus your photo and name in the Hall of Immortals (Limited to 200 for this campaign. RRP Priceless)
Plus an invitation to the official 4th Horse Launch Party in Sydney Australia
Plus one of 100 VIP 4th Horse Passes for all official 4th Horse Live Events for 5 years.

If you contribute $500.00 you will receive heaps of stuff plus an exclusive VIP invitation to The 4th Horse Launch party in Sydney Australia as well as a VIP pass for all official 4th Horse Live events for your life time.  
At the party I will be personally teaching people how to Master The 4th Horse, answering any questions, making an announcement about the first Work Titles as well as signing books.  You'll get to meet the team give us feedback on how were doing.
You will also go down in The 4th Horse Hall of Immortals as part of an elite group of members who were there at the official Launch.  
Remember you will need to give us your T size.  Either small, medium, large, Xtra Large.  T's will be made to order so you'll need to give us about 6 weeks to get it to you. 
 
Remember If you use the "Share This Campaign Link" above you are in the running for more exclusive stuff.
 
FAQ
Q: Will the game be free or paid?
A: Their will be a free version and a paid version.  The free version gives you access to the game and many of the sites features..  The paid version ( one of several subscription packages) gives you access to all the cool stuff the site offers, like video chat,  recording games and more. 
Q. When do we get the perks?
A: That depends on the perk and where in the world you are. For items that require physical shipment please give us 6 - 10 weeks beyond the end of the campaign. You may receive your perk earlier if circumstances permit.
Q. How do I tell you my t-shirt size?
A: Just put your tee shirt size in with your order. Small, Medium, Large, Xtra Large. 
Q. What if I left out the shipping costs by mistake?
A. Just send us an email and make the additional payment for the shipping and when we have confirmation we will send your stuff. 
Q. Why don't I see my comment anymore?
A. We will need to review comments before they go live.  This is to prevent silliness.  With that in mind, once we review your comments and if it is not deemed to be unacceptable it will go live. 
Q. Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?
A. Yes that's fine.  But you will need to make it clear that you are upgrading or  you may end up having to pay for two orders.  Just let us know when you're upgrading.  
 Thanks for taking the time to look at my campaign.  Me and the team really appreciate it.
 All the best
 
Jim

story:
Check out our Perk layout!

 

AeternoBlade is 3D side scrolling action platform game. The player follows Freyja on her epic quest for vengeance through countless dimensions. You also get to beat up bad guys along the way! Lots of bad guys! Yeah! Everyone loves to beat down bad guys!

  

Freyja has a special ability: she can manipulate time. Do you ever wonder how regretful it is when you make a huge mistake? Well? You can now REWIND! Yes! Rewind! Travel back to your mistake and fix it! When you master the power of time itself, you are unstoppable!

 

 

 

Cool, isn’t it? Not only will it be crucial in every battle, it will be an important tool needed to solve certain puzzles!

 

What else? This game also has an incredible battle system. It collaborates so well with our time manipulating system. Using the time reverse, the player is able to extend their combo beyond the limit. Players who have learned to maximize the use of these two skills will enjoy their gaming experience with great satisfaction.

 

 

 

 

 

Upgrade and Relics

On her epic adventure Freyja will encounter powerful enemies, each one stronger than the one before. In order to defeat them, Freyja too must become stronger. We will explain the how the upgrade systems work in AeternoBlade.

 

 

Toughen up! Status upgrade!

 

This is the most basic upgrade for Freyja. In exchange for yellow orbs, the player can enhance Freyja basic stat. They can upgrade her Health, Mana, Attack damage or increase her Mind (which increased the speed her ultimate gauge fill up).

 

 

 

 

Master your art! The Move list

 

A power’s hidden deep within all of us. We only have to unlock it with yellow orbs! Freyja can upgrade her basic attack into a more deadly attack. Each move can be upgrade twice until it was max out.

Each upgraded move will not only provide more damaging attack but it open an alternate option to extended combo that wasn’t available before. 

 

Skill maps

Over 40 moves to master!

 

 

 

The other way to increase Freyja’s strength is by equipping relics

As Freyja ventured and defeating evil minion of Beladim, she will acquire several relics. She can find it by either slaying enemies (who have chances of dropping the relics) or finding hidden treasure chests.

Each relic will have unique abilities. Some will only gave status upgrade, while other will give the player certain skill.

 

These relics can further more be upgrade with a power up relic. There are over 80 relics to be found!

 

 

 

 

Will Freyja be able to use these skills to her advantage on her quest of vengeance? It is up to you now…

 

More screen shots

 

Some of our concept Arts 

 

 

Braid, Castlevania, Prince of Persia,Oboro Muramasa Youtouden. If you like these games, you most likely will like our game too!

 

As a matter of fact, we are at approximately 90% on the 3DS version(for japanese market) and will soon be ready for release. What we are doing now is mostly polishing the game, fixing the language, and fining the art asset. We want this to be our best game ever, and it is not far off. 

 

We intend to release the game on multiple platforms (and on every market that is available!) but we don’t have enough budget for that. We are so close to the finish line! Yet, we are in need of that one final push! We have faith in our friends, yourself, of course. Help us deliver that final push!

 

 

Here is a chart explaining what most of our money would be spent on if we reaches our goal.

 

Our company can produce cartridge for EU by ourselves but we will need to complete the EUROPEAN WARRIOR PERKS otherwise we won't have enough fund to release them. If that is the case, then we will only release it on Nintendo E shop.

For the US Cartridge, we need a US publisher to make cartridge for us. If we couldn't find any, then it will only be release on E shop as well.

The AeternoBlade T Shirt Mock Up

Corecell Technology Co.,Ltd. We are a small team based in Bangkok, Thailand. You might not know that we have been in the gaming industry for almost 10 years. We started with ambition to make high quality games, but our dream has been delayed by the business industry. The fact is that it is hard to convince the publishers that company from Thailand like us are capable of making a highest quality video game.

However,

We have now put all our efforts, time, and money into completing AeternoBlade. For us, this is a do or die situation, and we are grateful that Indiegogo is giving us an opportunity. Our product quality lies with your contribution. Please help us finish this game together.

 

AeternoBlade Art Book (Digital/ Physical)

 

CORECELL PREVIOUS WORK.

 

 

Crazy Strike Bowling

"The lively graphics and authentic controls make Crazy Strike Bowling appealing and fun. If you’re longing for a game of bowling without having to leave your living room, then you should have a “crazy” time with this PSN title." 

http://videogamerrob.wordpress.com

 

"I have been one of those here at Family Friendly Gaming very down on the PS Move and PS Eye combination. It's not that its just a clone of the Wii Remote that is barely better. It's not that the Kinect leap frogs it in so many ways. I have not been impressed with games on this peripheral. Crazy Strike Bowling impresses me."

http://www.familyfriendlygaming.com

 

Wicked Monster Blast!

"Cute cartoon creatures; simplistic shooting; a mixture of mini-games. Wicked Monsters Blast is a kids game by-the-numbers, but its charm and heavy nods towards arcade classics such as Point Blank could have youngsters going crackers for these animals!"

http://www.nintendolife.com

 "it’s by far the most inviting light gun game for casual and younger gamers that I’ve played in years and the fact you can have up to four players shooting away at once is both a literal and figurative blast."

http://diehardgamefan.com  (Alex Lucard)

story:
**IMPORTANT**

AFTER DONATING, PLEASE LEAVE YOUR INGAME NAME AND PREFERRED GUN IF APPLICABLE IN THE COMMENTS TAB!!! WE CAN NOT PUT GUNS OR ANY OTHER ITEMS IN BACKPACKS!

DO NOT REQUEST ANY PERK CHANGES HERE. ANY PERK CHANGE REQUESTS WILL BE IGNORED. PERKS CAN NOT BE CHANGED. YOU CAN DECIDE WHAT WEAPON YOU SPAWN WITH ONCE WHEN YOU DONATE. SO MAKE IT A GOOD ONE ;).

you can NOT spawn with any of the following:

1. items in BAGS

2. repair equipment (tyres, fuel etc)

3. rpgs, satchel charges, grenades or smoke grenades

4. radio

5. bags any larger than Alice size

IF YOU DONATE, the procedure for spawning with weapons is as such:

step 1; create a new character

step 2; once logged in, log out within 25 minutes of creating the character, and wait at the lobby for 1 minute

step 3; log back in, once logged in, you will have your weapons and will spawn at your vehicle location (if you have that perk)

step 4; if this does not work, repeat. if it still does not work, contact krauterz or mancow ingame or by email at krauterz@live.com.

step 5; DONATORS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR PERKS ONCE THE ORIGINAL REQUEST HAS BEEN PROCESSED!

**DONATION PERK RULES**

*1 DO NOT TELL ANYONE THE LOCATION OF VEHICLES!

*2 no deliberate trolling, or exploiting. this includes using vehicles that you have not got the perk access to use

*3 NO SPAWN CAMPING. it is ok to sit in capitals and murder innocents, but give them a change to get out of the city first..

*4 NO WASTING VEHICLES. dont crash one helicopter into 8 others..


*5 TRY NOT TO ADD TOO MANY VEHICLES TO THE GAME! take a chopper to a capital, but HIDE IT WELL. OR imobilize it.

*6 AND FINALLY, DONT DEATHMATCH OR SHOOT OTHERS AT PERK LOCATIONS!!! it takes up to 10 minutes to respawn there each time. please dont do it! DOING IT WILL RESULT IN A ONE DAY BAN, second warning is removal of perks for 2 days, third warning is permenant removal of perks.

*7 WE OFFER FULL REFUNDS FOR DONATIONS FOR ONLY 24 HOURS. AND ONLY IF PLAYER GIVES A RELIABLE REASON FOR THEIR REFUND REQUEST! THIS IS A DONATION SYSTEM! NOT A PAY TO RECEIVE SYSTEM!

**DONATING ACCEPTS THESE RULES. BREAKING RULES MAY RESULT IN SUSPENSION OF PERKS, REMOVAL OF PERKS AND DEPENDING ON THE MAGNITUDE OF THE INCIDENT, BANS MAY BE APPLIED**



Short Summary

ZUST is the most popular Day-Z sanctuary (private hive) server currently running. However, the owner has run into an unexpected problem which means he cannot pay for the next month of server hosting service. it is up to us to keep it going until the owner can once again run the show!

we just upgraded our server! its now an 8 core with HT (meaning 16 virtual cores!) 8gb of ram and almost 1gbps connection!


What We Need & What You Get
Realisticly, all we need is one months worth of funding, which is $360. ($169 for the server and $200 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag


QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, the owner of the server can give you weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even give you a helicopter permenantly!
If we do not reach our goal of $260, the funds will be allocated to the next possible server restart stage. if its a few months away, this will aid in helping the server come back to life as much as possible.


The Impact
If ZUST gets shut down, players all across the world will lose their progress, vehicles and weapons. WE CANT LET THIS HAPPEN!
Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Krauterz, the owner of the server, assures us that with proper funding, and with a goal that is met, not only could the server stay up indefinitly, but he could double the slot count. increase performance and add more perks to the game.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!

story:
About us:

We are independent game coders for ARMA (Armed Assault) game engine. We are looking for commonthoughts and ARMA game fans to help us provide new and better ARMA 3: ALPHA - WASTELAND MOD. Honestly, we need 5000$ to pay for server rent in advance for 1 year. When game server will be working we will be able to do more testing and scripting to improve this mod. ARMA is for life.

Website: soon

Game Description:
MMORPG Survival sandbox.

FETURES:

You will be able to:

  • hunt, gather, grow food and other materials (steel, sand, coal...).
  • Ground, air and sea vehicles will be available.
  • Save/Load your account and play as RPG.
  • Trade with other players.
  • Organize ambush for other players
  • Kill other players and take their items for free.
  • and many more...



EVERYTHING WHAT YOU NEED IS TO SURVIVE!


ATTENTION: ARMA 3:ALPHA creators are Bohemia Interactive. http://www.bistudio.com/

story:
SimAnt Overview

SimAnt was a popular PC game released by Maxis in 1994. It was one of my personal favorites, and developed a cult following in the gaming world.  

From Wikipedia:

"The game is essentially a simulation of an ant colony. Wright was inspired by E.O. Wilson's study of ant colonies. The game consists of three modes: a Quick Game, a Full Game, and an Experimental Game. 

In SimAnt, the player plays the role of an ant in a colony of black ants in the back yard of a suburban home. The ant colony must battle against enemy red ants. The ultimate goal is to spread throughout the garden, into the house, and finally to drive out the red ants and human owners. 

In the Quick Game, the player establishes a black ant colony in a small patch of yard, shown in top-down perspective. The computer opponent establishes a competing red ant colony in the same patch. Underground ant colonies are depicted in a side view. The player has direct control of a single ant at a time, indicated by a yellow color, and may switch control to a different ant at any time by either double-clicking the desired ant or choosing Exchange from the Yellow Ant menu and clicking on it. A little known fact is that the spider in the game can also be controlled by using the Exchange method. The player's yellow ant may influence the behavior of other black ants by leaving pheromone trails to destinations such as food and enemy ant colonies and can control the other ants in a limited way (by ordering a certain number to follow it, for instance). The quick game is won or lost when either the red or black colony in said patch is defeated.

The player's yellow ant may pick up food and pebbles, engage in trophallaxis (by receiving regurgitated food from friendly ants), and attack enemy ants. Groups of ants (or yellow ant with his recruits) may attack and kill bigger enemies like spiders, caterpillars, and antlions. Natural hazards include human footsteps, electrical outlets, bugspray, spiders, antlions, lawnmowers, and rain, which washes away pheromone trails and can flood the bottom of ant nests.

In the Full Game, the player begins with an ant colony in an overhead view, much like the Quick Game. The region of this overhead view is a single square of a map containing a yard and house. The player spreads to other areas by producing young queens and drones to mate with each other. The full game is lost when the black colonies are eliminated and won when the red colonies are eliminated and the humans are driven out of the house.

The Experimental Game is similar to the Quick Game, except the player can also control red ants, spiders and has access to a set of experimental tools. These tools allow the player to place pheromone trails, maze walls, rocks, ants, pesticides and food."

Unfortunately the graphics are extremely out-dated and the game itself requires a DOS emulator to run properly.  I wanted to bring SimAnt up to date, with all new sprites and graphics, while keeping the core functionality.

Current Progress

I have been working on this rebuild project for the past seven months, and here is what I have so far:   

  • All 2d sprites, backgrounds, and textures re-created. 
  • Animations have been added for walking ants, as well as moving antennae while idle.
  • Code for Above-Ground Terrain Generation
  • A.I. Developed for Ants, allowing them to forage, dig, or fight.
  • Player-controlled underground digging functionality.
  • Health, food and foraging system developed and functional.
  • Pheremone-based trail functionality for both food and combat.

All of the above mentioned items have been compiled into a very basic executable prototype, with limited functionality.  

My Funding Goal - $2,000

My funding goal of $2,000 will be used to finalize and launch the game.  I have been financing this project with my personal savings, and with less than a month of work left, my funds are running dry.  I don't want to see all this hard work get shelved and collect dust, so I would greatly appreciate the support of any SimAnt fans.  

A portion of the funds will go towards creating high-quality boxes and game manuals, for those who donate over $50.

Depending upon it's popularity, I may also need to pay for the hosting and bandwidth required for digital distribution. 

Level 2 Goal - $5,000 - New Playable Race - Termites 

If we manage to raise $5,000 or more, then I will create and add a new playable race - Termites.  They will function like the ants, but their nest will be located within a tree stump or log, with a wooden cross-section, rather than dirt.  Unlike ants, termites will be able to use wood as a food source, and termite soldiers will have an additional short-range spray attack which does damage-over-time.  A campaign against the more powerful termites will be unlocked after defeating the red ants.

Level 3 Goal - $7,500 - Multiplayer Gameplay

If we manage to raise $7,500, I will incorporate multiplayer functionality, along with a port to iPhone and Android smartphones.  In my opinion, multiplayer game play was the only thing SimAnt was missing.  

I always envisioned two types of multiplayer scenarios:

A quick game session, where players can compete against each other or the computer.  These games would be relatively short and fast-paced. 

A campaign session, where players can create and manage multiple colonies.  This game would take much longer and involve more strategy. 

What Do Contributors Get?

$20 - Free Copy of Game

A contribution of $20 or more entitles you to a free copy of the completed game, via digital download.

$50 - Collector's Edition Game Box

A contribution of $50 or more entitles you to a collectors' edition game box, including a high quality collectible manual.

$200 - New Content - Insects 

If anyone contributes $200 or more, then I will add a new NPC insect enemy of their choosing to the game.  The A.I. from an existing insect will be used. (The game currently has brown spiders, green caterpillars, grey pillbugs and antlions).  I'd like to see crickets, ticks, and beetles added to the game.

story:
The Players:

Primetime:

  • A Horde guild on World of Warcraft’s number one server.

  • 30,000 characters call Illidan home and battles the monsters of Azeroth.

  • Primetime has over 300 characters that make up the community.

The Leader:

Guild Master aka Craig aka SgtDeath

 

Co Guild Master-aka Violenfoxx aka his Mom:

 

 

Co-Guild Master aka Grimslaughtr aka Best Friend Jon

 

The Project:

 

Craig wants to set up a streaming studio for Primetime raids twice weekly. For this he will need a computer capable of streaming the HD content of World of Warcraft. Also it will require a high quality microphone and editing software for Youtube publishing. The guild will also need a website and ventrilo server capable of accomodating the community. 

Come join the exictiment of Primetime!! An adventure in the land of Azeroth. Fighting dragons, slaying evil demons, and bringing glory to the Horde !!

This family run guild is looking to take their guild family to the next level and who knows maybe you will turn to the dark side and join the fun with Primetime.

story:
Company History

Massive Breakthroughs is the vision of co-founders John Keller and Steven Moher.  These technology geeks and avid gamers have spent the past decade evaluating the video game industry especially MMOs.  They understand the vast array of problems that impact developers, gamers, and parents. As a result, Massive Breakthroughs will provide cost effective video game development that is profitable and affordable without sacrificing quality. 

Now we need your help.   Why are we asking for such a large amount?  We would prefer to avoid the restrictions associated with traditional investment funding for the following reasons:  

Instead of focusing on investor returns we would rather pay developers higher royalties and reduce their development costs. 

Instead of meeting analyst earnings estimates we prefer to charge lower monthly subscriptions.

Instead of stifling innovation and creativity because it is considered too risky we want it to flow throughout our organization.

Instead of answering to a Board of Directors we prefer to listen to our developers and subscribers.

Instead of reducing payroll to boast profits we want to hire more employees and provide better service / support to our developers, subscribers, and other business partners.

 

Founders Bios

John Keller - Chief Technical Officer

Mr. Keller has worked over 25 years as a Firmware, Hardware, and Software Engineer.  He has extensive experience successfully managing product development teams.  John is proficient in numerous computer languages, databases, and networks.   

Mr. Keller has held the positions of Regional Manager for Tandy Corporation, Chief Executive Officer for Fort Worth C/Fe, and  Vice President for Friends and Neighbors.  He was a Senior Engineer / Product Designer for the following telecom leaders:  NEC America, Phillips Semiconductors, and Holley Communications.  Educationally, John attended the University  of Texas at Arlington where he studied Computer Science Engineering.

Steven Moher - Chief Executive Officer

Mr. Moher has over 12 years of experience in Sales; 20 years in Accounting / Finance; and 15 years in Management.  His academic history includes a BBA from the University of Texas at Arlington; a Masters in Computer Information Systems from the University of Phoenix; and dual Master degrees from the Keller Graduate School of Management.  One is in Accounting and Financial Management; the other in Business Administration.

Mr. Moher has held the positions of Regional Sales Manager / Sales Trainer for CMC Electronics; Chief Financial Officer for Fort Worth C/Fe, and President for Friends and Neighbors.

 

What We Need / What You Get

We are seeking $20 million in crowd funding.  This will enable us to:

  • Complete development of our Interactive Content Delivery System.
  • Complete development of our first five games.
  • Cover initial marketing efforts. 
  • Establish the necessary infrastructure to support our developers, employees, and subscribers.

With your support, we can truly change the MMO industry for the better.  

MB Use of Funds - $20 million            
           
    Year 1 Year 2 Overall Percentage
Payroll   $6,791,950 $6,214,608 $13,006,558 65.03%
Funding   $2,000,000 $0 $2,000,000 10.00%
Unallocated WC   $692,611 $671,288 $1,363,899 6.82%
Rent   $660,000 $686,400 $1,346,400 6.73%
Capital Expenditures   $702,000 $92,000 $794,000 3.97%
Software   $234,000 $213,000 $447,000 2.24%
Marketing   $0 $400,000 $400,000 2.00%
Insurance   $81,919 $92,112 $174,031 0.87%
Legal   $48,000 $49,920 $97,920 0.49%
Travel   $48,000 $49,920 $97,920 0.49%
Telecommunications   $40,800 $42,432 $83,232 0.42%
Accounting   $24,000 $24,960 $48,960 0.24%
Recruiting   $33,000 $12,480 $45,480 0.23%
Miscellaneous   $14,360 $17,640 $32,000 0.16%
Office Supplies   $14,360 $17,640 $32,000 0.16%
Dues / Subscriptions   $6,000 $6,240 $12,240 0.06%
Medical Supplies   $6,000 $6,240 $12,240 0.06%
Hosting   $3,000 $3,120 $6,120 0.03%
           
Annual Total   $11,400,000 $8,600,000 $20,000,000 100.00%

 

  
 

Interactive Content Delivery System

This system consists of the following modules:

Streaming and Encryption Technology (SET) - This piracy resistant online distribution system is the core of the Interactive Content Delivery System.  

Graphical Environment Manipulation System (GEMS) Language –  An enhancement to SET, this high level scripting language enables a single programmer to do the work of ten programmers.  

Foundation Library – This provides developers with a starting point when using GEMS.       

AI Library –A prepackaged system for directing the behavior of non-player characters.    

Demo – Demonstrates the capabilities of SET and its’ subsequent add-ons.      

GEMS PC Browsers – Initial versions will cover Linux, Mac, and Windows. 

GEMS Mobile Browsers – Initial versions will cover Android, iOS, and Windows Mobile. 

GEMS Leveling Author – This enables developers to create large environments under SET. 

GEMS Modeling Author –Object-oriented modeling software.  It has huge compression advantages which allow large, highly detailed environments to be downloaded in seconds.  This enables a single commercial artist to do the work of seven commercial artists.          

3D Rendering Engine –A restriction and royalty-free 3D engine optimized for the Interactive Content Delivery System.  

Games Under Development 

Free For All Racing

Game Classification: Sports

Game Rating(s): E, T

Start paying your dues in Kart Racing.  Learn how to manage your budget, gain mechanical experience, win races, and earn the support of sponsors.  When you are ready make the big decision: Advance to NASCAR or Formula 1?

Enjoy realistic graphics / sounds; selecting / customizing your vehicles; and racing against your fellow competitors.  Standings will be based upon real Kart, NASCAR, and Formula 1 organizational standards.  Leaders will be awarded actual cash prizes and other gifts, which will be disbursed on a periodic basis. 

Kingpin 

Game Classification: Role Playing

Game Rating(s): T, M

Become the ultimate crime boss.  Commit crimes such as arson, assault, blackmail, bribery, drug trafficking, extortion, murder, robbery, and theft.  Start out as a solider and work your way up.  Form alliances.  But trust no one.  Betrayal is everywhere.

Want to play “Johnny Law” instead?   No problem.  Start out as a beat cop and work your way up.   Stop crimes in action.  Infiltrate gangs.  Help gather evidence for the prosecution.

Actual cash prizes and other gifts will be randomly awarded to players.  They will be disbursed on a periodic basis.    The more you play, the greater the chance you win.

Military Mayhem

Game Classification: First Person Shooter

Game Rating(s): T, M

Work alone or as part of a team to complete military missions:  Rescue hostages.  Stop a terrorist threat.  Regain control of a strategic location.   Protect your resources and other assets.

Enjoy realistic graphics / language / sounds.  Use actual military armor, technology, and weapons.  Select the country of your choice.  Choose to be either on the offensive or defensive side of the conflict. 

Actual cash prizes and other gifts will be randomly awarded to players.  They will be disbursed on a periodic basis.  The more you play, the greater the chance you win. 

Supreme Space

Game Classification: Real Time Strategy

Game Rating(s): E, T

Build your galactic empire.  Travel the universe.  Mine the various resources of the planets.  Trade them for money and other valuable goods.  Grow your wealth.

Establish a strategic foothold and protect your assets.  Other players may try to steal them.  And you may attempt to steal theirs.   

Actual cash prizes and other gifts will be awarded to players with the highest wealth.  They will be distributed on a periodic basis.  The more you play, the greater the chance you win.

Tactical Trading

Game Classification: Simulation

Game Rating(s): E, T

This game is designed to teach financial investing.  Starting with $5,000, each player will invest in various financial assets (bonds, commodities, currency, and stocks).   The goal is to make money with prudent investments.

Players with the greatest net profits (gains minus fees and taxes) will win actual cash prizes and other gifts.  These will be awarded on a monthly, quarterly, and annual basis.  The more you play, the greater the chance you win.

Perks

Donations of any amount are sincerely appreciated.  Perks begin at the $25 level. 
 
 "Game Tester" - $25 Donation
You will receive a lifetime four percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015. 
 
"Commercial Artist" - $50 Donation
You will receive a lifetime eight percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.  Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
 "Programmer" - $100 Donation
You will receive a lifetime 12 percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015. 
 
"Sound Engineer" - $250 Donation
You will receive a lifetime 16 percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.  Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
"Technical Writer" - $500 Donation
You will receive a lifetime 20 percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.    Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015. 
 
"Level Designer" - $1,000 Donation  (Number available: 20,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.  Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
"Senior Programmer" - $2,500 Donation  (Number available: 8,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
"Story Author" - $5,000 Donation (Number available: 4,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
Furthermore, donors at this level will receive early access to new games.  
 
"Creative Director" - $10,000 Donation (Number available: 2,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
Furthermore, donors at this level will receive early access to new games and the ability to tour our production facility.
 
"Publisher" - $20,000 Donation (Number available: 1,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
Furthermore, donors at this level will receive early access to new games, the ability to tour our production facility, and a invitation (+1) to our launching party.
 

The Impact

Benefits for Developers

Imagine having the freedom to concentrate solely on the development of great MMOs.  As your publisher, Massive Breakthroughs will take care of all the hosting, marketing, and support for your creations.

Bottom Line: Focus on what you do best and let Massive Breakthroughs take care of the rest. 

Our proprietary Interactive Content Delivery System will be made available free of charge to any developer who selects Massive Breakthroughs as their publisher.  With these development tools, developers can create top-notch games at a fraction of traditional costs and times, without sacrificing quality. 

Developers can earn significant royalties month after month.  As long as subscribers play your games, you will continue to get paid.  The more they play, you more you earn.

Developers can create a small portion of their game, and get feedback from consumers prior to investing massive resources into their efforts.  If the game is favorably received, they can start generating revenue immediately while simultaneously developing new levels.  On the other hand, if feedback is unfavorable, they have the ability to make modifications early in the development process. 

Cross-platform compatibility enables a developer to create a game once and have it be accessible across many different platforms.  Since they are developing for the Massive Breakthroughs system instead of specific platforms (consoles, PC, and wireless), new platform specifications and release dates are no longer concerns.  As new platforms are introduced, Massive Breakthroughs will create browsers for them. This significantly increases your potential market, without requiring additional work from you.

Massive Breakthroughs’ multi-tracking capability allows developers to edit parts of their games to cater to a specific audience.  Parents can select the appropriate level of graphic detail and language, allowing foul language or intense violence to be replaced with content that is more appropriate for younger players.  Subsequently, developers possess the ability to create a single game that could be played and enjoyed by virtually every member of the family. 

Benefits for Gamers

No long term commitment required.  Pay month to month.  Stay a subscriber and your subscription price never goes up.   Refer your friends and earn residual commissions.  

For only $25 per month, subscribers will have full access to all of our MMOs.  No hardcopies or expansion packs.  No advertising.  Just great game play!!!

Our gaming website will launch with five games and additional MMOs will be added on a quarterly basis.

MMO Game Classifications

  • First Person Shooter – A MMO centered on gun and ranged weapon-based combat through a first person perspective
  • Real Time Strategy – A time-based MMO centered on using resources and strategy to build units and defeat an opponent.
  • Role Playing – A MMO in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting.
  • Simulations – A MMO that attempts to copy various activities in “real life” for the purposes of training, analysis, or prediction.
  • Sports- A MMO that simulates the practice of traditional sports.

 MMO Ratings Classifications

  • Everyone [E] - Content is generally suitable for all ages.
  • Teen [T] – Content is generally suitable for ages 13 and up.
  • Mature [M] – Content is generally suitable for ages 17 or older.

Players can play our MMOs via a PC, smartphone, or tablet.  Games can be transferred back and forth between any of these devices.   So gaming can continue on the go.

Minimum Personal Computer Requirements:

  • Hardware: 2.3 GHz processor, 2 GB RAM, and 100 MB available HD space.
  • Internet Speed: At least 1 MBPS upload / download
  • Operating System: Windows 7 or higher; Mac OSX 10.6 Snow Leopard or higher.

Minimum Smartphone Requirements:

  • Hardware: 1.6 GHz processor and 100 MB available storage space. 
  • Internet Speed: 3G or higher
  • Operating System: Android 4.2 or higher; Mac iOS 6.1.3 or higher; Windows Mobile 8 or higher. 

Minimum Tablet Requirements:

  • Hardware: 1 GHz processor and 100 MB available storage space.
  • Internet Speed: At least 1 MBPS upload / download.
  • Operating System:  Android 4.2 or higher; Mac iOS 6.1.3 or higher; Windows Mobile 8 or higher.

Play at your convenience. To assist subscribers with any problems or answer any questions, we provide customer service on a 24/7/52 basis.    

Benefits for Parents

As parents, Massive Breakthroughs co-founders John Keller and Steven Moher, understand the importance of being able to influence the activities of your children.  Subsequently, extensive parental controls are built into our browsers.  

Each of our MMOs is awarded a rating classification.   A synopsis of each MMO is also provided.  Armed with this knowledge and the parental controls, parents can block inappropriate MMOs from their children.       

Parents may also use the parental controls to determine how often their children can play the MMOs.  They can set a certain number of hours per month, week, or day.  They can set a time range to cover certain hours of the day.  Furthermore, different settings can be established for every member of the family.   

Low cost is another benefit for parents.  For only $25 per month, a subscriber will have access to all our MMOs (excluding the ones blocked by the parents). This is significant, especially if your children are very avid gamers.

Our gaming website will launch with five games and additional MMOs will be added on a quarterly basis. Subscribers can play our MMOs via a PC, smartphone, or tablet.  Games can be transferred back and forth between any of these devices, so gaming can continue on the go.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please blog about us, tweet about us, and like us on Facebook.  Discuss us in gaming forums.  Create and post videos singing our praises.  Whatever you can do to help us spread the word and accomplish our goals is sincerely appreciated.

Founders Bios
John Keller - Chief Technical Officer
Mr. Keller has worked over 25 years as a Firmware, Hardware, and Software Engineer.  He has extensive experience successfully managing product development teams.  John is proficient in numerous computer languages, databases, and networks.   
Mr. Keller has held the positions of Regional Manager for Tandy Corporation, Chief Executive Officer for Fort Worth C/Fe, and  Vice President for Friends and Neighbors.  He was a Senior Engineer / Product Designer for the following telecom leaders:  NEC America, Phillips Semiconductors, and Holley Communications.  Educationally, John attended the University  of Texas at Arlington where he studied Computer Science Engineering.
Steven Moher - Chief Executive Officer
Mr. Moher has over 12 years of experience in Sales; 20 years in Accounting / Finance; and 15 years in Management.  His academic history includes a BBA from the University of Texas at Arlington; a Masters in Computer Information Systems from the University of Phoenix; and dual Master degrees from the Keller Graduate School of Management.  One is in Accounting and Financial Management; the other in Business Administration.
Mr. Moher has held the positions of Regional Sales Manager / Sales Trainer for CMC Electronics; Chief Financial Officer for Fort Worth C/Fe, and President for Friends and Neighbors.
 
What We Need / What You Get
We are seeking $20 million in crowd funding.  This will enable us to:

Complete development of our Interactive Content Delivery System.
Complete development of our first five games.
Cover initial marketing efforts. 
Establish the necessary infrastructure to support our developers, employees, and subscribers.
With your support, we can truly change the MMO industry for the better.

Interactive Content Delivery System
This system consists of the following modules:
Streaming and Encryption Technology (SET) - This piracy resistant online distribution system is the core of the Interactive Content Delivery System.  
Graphical Environment Manipulation System (GEMS) Language –  An enhancement to SET, this high level scripting language enables a single programmer to do the work of ten programmers.  
Foundation Library – This provides developers with a starting point when using GEMS.       
AI Library –A prepackaged system for directing the behavior of non-player characters.    
Demo – Demonstrates the capabilities of SET and its’ subsequent add-ons.      
GEMS PC Browsers – Initial versions will cover Linux, Mac, and Windows. 
GEMS Mobile Browsers – Initial versions will cover Android, iOS, and Windows Mobile. 
GEMS Leveling Author – This enables developers to create large environments under SET. 
GEMS Modeling Author –Object-oriented modeling software.  It has huge compression advantages which allow large, highly detailed environments to be downloaded in seconds.  This enables a single commercial artist to do the work of seven commercial artists.          
3D Rendering Engine –A restriction and royalty-free 3D engine optimized for the Interactive Content Delivery System.  

Games Under Development 
Free For All Racing
Game Classification: Sports
Game Rating(s): E, T
Start paying your dues in Kart Racing.  Learn how to manage your budget, gain mechanical experience, win races, and earn the support of sponsors.  When you are ready make the big decision: Advance to NASCAR or Formula 1?
Enjoy realistic graphics / sounds; selecting / customizing your vehicles; and racing against your fellow competitors.  Standings will be based upon real Kart, NASCAR, and Formula 1 organizational standards.  Leaders will be awarded actual cash prizes and other gifts, which will be disbursed on a periodic basis. 
Kingpin  
Game Classification: Role Playing
Game Rating(s): T, M
Become the ultimate crime boss.  Commit crimes such as arson, assault, blackmail, bribery, drug trafficking, extortion, murder, robbery, and theft.  Start out as a solider and work your way up.  Form alliances.  But trust no one.  Betrayal is everywhere.
Want to play “Johnny Law” instead?   No problem.  Start out as a beat cop and work your way up.   Stop crimes in action.  Infiltrate gangs.  Help gather evidence for the prosecution.
Actual cash prizes and other gifts will be randomly awarded to players.  They will be disbursed on a periodic basis.    The more you play, the greater the chance you win.
Military Mayhem 
Game Classification: First Person Shooter
Game Rating(s): T, M
Work alone or as part of a team to complete military missions:  Rescue hostages.  Stop a terrorist threat.  Regain control of a strategic location.   Protect your resources and other assets.
Enjoy realistic graphics / language / sounds.  Use actual military armor, technology, and weapons.  Select the country of your choice.  Choose to be either on the offensive or defensive side of the conflict. 
Actual cash prizes and other gifts will be randomly awarded to players.  They will be disbursed on a periodic basis.  The more you play, the greater the chance you win. 
Supreme Space
Game Classification: Real Time Strategy
Game Rating(s): E, T
Build your galactic empire.  Travel the universe.  Mine the various resources of the planets.  Trade them for money and other valuable goods.  Grow your wealth.
Establish a strategic foothold and protect your assets.  Other players may try to steal them.  And you may attempt to steal theirs.   
Actual cash prizes and other gifts will be awarded to players with the highest wealth.  They will be distributed on a periodic basis.  The more you play, the greater the chance you win.
Tactical Trading
Game Classification: Simulation
Game Rating(s): E, T
This game is designed to teach financial investing.  Starting with $5,000, each player will invest in various financial assets (bonds, commodities, currency, and stocks).   The goal is to make money with prudent investments.
Players with the greatest net profits (gains minus fees and taxes) will win actual cash prizes and other gifts.  These will be awarded on a monthly, quarterly, and annual basis.  The more you play, the greater the chance you win.
Perks
Donations of any amount are sincerely appreciated.  Perks begin at the $25 level. 
 
 "Game Tester" - $25 Donation

You will receive a lifetime four percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015. 
 
"Commercial Artist" - $50 Donation
You will receive a lifetime eight percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.  Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
 "Programmer" - $100 Donation

You will receive a lifetime 12 percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015. 
 
"Sound Engineer" - $250 Donation
You will receive a lifetime 16 percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.  Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
"Technical Writer" - $500 Donation 
You will receive a lifetime 20 percent discount off the regular MB Gaming monthly subscription price.    Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015. 
 
"Level Designer" - $1,000 Donation  (Number available: 20,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.  Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 "Senior Programmer" - $2,500 Donation  (Number available: 8,000)

You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
"Story Author" - $5,000 Donation (Number available: 4,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
Furthermore, donors at this level will receive early access to new games.  
 
"Creative Director" - $10,000 Donation (Number available: 2,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
Furthermore, donors at this level will receive early access to new games and the ability to tour our production facility.
 
"Publisher" - $20,000 Donation (Number available: 1,000)
You will receive a free lifetime subscription to the MB Gaming subscription service.   Estimated delivery date is July 1, 2015.
 
You will also receive the following gifts: 8GB MB Flash Drive, MB Baseball Cap, MB Can Cooler, MB Drawstring Backpack, MB Mouse Pad, MB Mug, MB Polo Shirt, MB T-Shirt, and a MB Soda Can Tumbler.  Estimated delivery date is January 31, 2014.
 
Furthermore, donors at this level will receive early access to new games, the ability to tour our production facility, and a invitation (+1) to our launching party.
 

The Impact


Benefits for Developers
Imagine having the freedom to concentrate solely on the development of great MMOs.  As your publisher, Massive Breakthroughs will take care of all the hosting, marketing, and support for your creations.
Bottom Line: Focus on what you do best and let Massive Breakthroughs take care of the rest. 
Our proprietary Interactive Content Delivery System will be made available free of charge to any developer who selects Massive Breakthroughs as their publisher.  With these development tools, developers can create top-notch games at a fraction of traditional costs and times, without sacrificing quality. 
Developers can earn significant royalties month after month.  As long as subscribers play your games, you will continue to get paid.  The more they play, you more you earn.
Developers can create a small portion of their game, and get feedback from consumers prior to investing massive resources into their efforts.  If the game is favorably received, they can start generating revenue immediately while simultaneously developing new levels.  On the other hand, if feedback is unfavorable, they have the ability to make modifications early in the development process. 
Cross-platform compatibility enables a developer to create a game once and have it be accessible across many different platforms.  Since they are developing for the Massive Breakthroughs system instead of specific platforms (consoles, PC, and wireless), new platform specifications and release dates are no longer concerns.  As new platforms are introduced, Massive Breakthroughs will create browsers for them. This significantly increases your potential market, without requiring additional work from you.
Massive Breakthroughs’ multi-tracking capability allows developers to edit parts of their games to cater to a specific audience.  Parents can select the appropriate level of graphic detail and language, allowing foul language or intense violence to be replaced with content that is more appropriate for younger players.  Subsequently, developers possess the ability to create a single game that could be played and enjoyed by virtually every member of the family. 
Benefits for Gamers
No long term commitment required.  Pay month to month.  Stay a subscriber and your subscription price never goes up.   Refer your friends and earn residual commissions.  
For only $25 per month, subscribers will have full access to all of our MMOs.  No hardcopies or expansion packs.  No advertising.  Just great game play!!!
Our gaming website will launch with five games and additional MMOs will be added on a quarterly basis.
MMO Game Classifications

First Person Shooter – A MMO centered on gun and ranged weapon-based combat through a first person perspective
Real Time Strategy – A time-based MMO centered on using resources and strategy to build units and defeat an opponent.
Role Playing – A MMO in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting.
Simulations – A MMO that attempts to copy various activities in “real life” for the purposes of training, analysis, or prediction.
Sports- A MMO that simulates the practice of traditional sports.

 MMO Ratings Classifications

Everyone [E] - Content is generally suitable for all ages.
Teen [T] – Content is generally suitable for ages 13 and up.
Mature [M] – Content is generally suitable for ages 17 or older.

Players can play our MMOs via a PC, smartphone, or tablet.  Games can be transferred back and forth between any of these devices.   So gaming can continue on the go.
Minimum Personal Computer Requirements:

Hardware: 2.3 GHz processor, 2 GB RAM, and 100 MB available HD space.
Internet Speed: At least 1 MBPS upload / download
Operating System: Windows 7 or higher; Mac OSX 10.6 Snow Leopard or higher.

Minimum Smartphone Requirements:

Hardware: 1.6 GHz processor and 100 MB available storage space. 
Internet Speed: 3G or higher
Operating System: Android 4.2 or higher; Mac iOS 6.1.3 or higher; Windows Mobile 8 or higher. 

Minimum Tablet Requirements:

Hardware: 1 GHz processor and 100 MB available storage space.
Internet Speed: At least 1 MBPS upload / download.
Operating System:  Android 4.2 or higher; Mac iOS 6.1.3 or higher; Windows Mobile 8 or higher.

Play at your convenience. To assist subscribers with any problems or answer any questions, we provide customer service on a 24/7/52 basis.    
Benefits for Parents
As parents, Massive Breakthroughs co-founders John Keller and Steven Moher, understand the importance of being able to influence the activities of your children.  Subsequently, extensive parental controls are built into our browsers.  
Each of our MMOs is awarded a rating classification.   A synopsis of each MMO is also provided.  Armed with this knowledge and the parental controls, parents can block inappropriate MMOs from their children.       
Parents may also use the parental controls to determine how often their children can play the MMOs.  They can set a certain number of hours per month, week, or day.  They can set a time range to cover certain hours of the day.  Furthermore, different settings can be established for every member of the family.   
Low cost is another benefit for parents.  For only $25 per month, a subscriber will have access to all our MMOs (excluding the ones blocked by the parents). This is significant, especially if your children are very avid gamers.
Our gaming website will launch with five games and additional MMOs will be added on a quarterly basis. Subscribers can play our MMOs via a PC, smartphone, or tablet.  Games can be transferred back and forth between any of these devices, so gaming can continue on the go.
 


Other Ways You Can Help
Please blog about us, tweet about us, and like us on Facebook.  Discuss us in gaming forums.  Create and post videos singing our praises.  Whatever you can do to help us spread the word and accomplish our goals is sincerely appreciated.

story:
Psave Pseudoburger

Psave Pseudoburger is a point-and-click adventure game about a failing multinational hamburger chain and the man who pulls it back from the brink.
 
You play as an employee of Pseudoburger's corporate headquarters. What's more, you've just been promoted! Unfortunately your new position is so obscure that no one knows what you're supposed to be doing. Consequently, it falls on you to solve all of the company's largest problems and save... ehrm psave Pseudoburger.
 
I plan to release the game DRM-free for Windows and Linux.
 

What's the money for? What's the plan?

The main purpose of this campaign is to help pay for music, sound effects and other things that I can't do myself. That's what I need to handle first.
 
The secondary purpose is to offset my living costs. The concept there is simple; the less time I have to spend making money to live on, the more time I'll have to work on Pseudoburger.
 
If I meet my goal with this campaign then I'll be able to work on the game full time for at least 6 months, which will to be enough to finish the game, or get very close to it.
 

Why Flexible Funding?

I've been working on this game for the last seven months and I'm not about to stop before it's complete. No matter what happens with this Indiegogo campaign I'm going to keep at it. So there's no risk in getting less than my goal; It just means that everything's going to take a little longer.

 

Don't have any money but you still want to help?

Do you know anyone else who's interested in adventure games, indie games, or both? Or someone who isn't interested in either but is really free with their money? Let them know about this campaign!

Another thing you could do is subscribe to my youtube channel. Thumbing up my videos or leaving the odd comment is an easy way to help me promote the game.

 

What's the 'Package Access' perk all about?

Package Access gives you access to all of the nuts and bolts that make Psave Pseudoburger run. You can use that to make your own games! If you wanted to make a very similar game (a 3d point-and-click adventure game) then you'd have most of your work done before you even started.

Because I'm using something called Playmaker, you won't even need to know how to code in order to follow along.

I'm also going to write some basic documentation to explain the systems that I've made so that you can easily implement them into your own projects.

You'll get access to all of this well before the actual game is released. I'm aiming for mid-late September.

Here's what you'll need to make this work:

  1. A copy of Unity. This is free and can downloaded from their website at unity3d.com
  2. A copy of Playmaker. This isn't free, but it's cheaper than most videogames. You can grab it from their website at hutonggames.com

About us

RN estudio is a very important painting company, also we do 3D sculpt, the best

3D printings and HD resin cast.


We helped other companies to have success in their crowdfunding projects, we work in more than 14 successfully completed projects.

We have enough experience to bring you the best quality HD resin cast miniatures, for your zombie, post apocalyptic or survival boardgame, or simply for collect and paint !

Why Crowdfunding?

Our projects for expand our miniature range, Chaos Pact team  and Humans Vs Orcs, were  very successful, and we are very happy with the experience.

We only take 4 month to produce all the miniatures and do all the shippings!

All our funders are very  satisfied with the final product, also you can buy

in our new web store !

We have finish awesome models for improve your Zombie, survival or post apocalyptic boardgame, that we want you enjoy fast !, because of this, we need your help to make this reality.

If you help in this proyect, you will get the best price you can dream, and very interesting exclusives miniatures !

From Wasteland

Finest quality miniatures to upgrade your favourite Zombie, Survival or Post apocalyptic game.

High detailed, strong personality and care for each small detail.

Size: 32mm to eyes, every miniature includes 25mm round base.

With this size, the miniature fits perfect in all games. It's the perfect size for paint and display!





Check the awesome work of Antonio Peña at Facebook

If you are interested on a very special boardgame where you can use these miniatures take a look this:


If you want a game for use our miniatures we recomend Bright Future

The Kickstarter project of Bright Future is now 100% funded!
We say a GREAT thanks for the chance you've given us! We won't let you down: expect even more. We have awesome art to show and horrific stories to tell.
Thank you for your support and please spread the word!
We're happy to create a bright future for you ^^
Vermin Games team
