story:
English / Español

Acerca del Juego:

Se desarrolla en un sueño prediseñado y es un laberinto de varios niveles (pisos) del que el jugador (el soñador) debe salir. Al principio el soñador no sabe que está en un sueño. Pero luego va recordando las pistas y herramientas (brújula, radar, reloj, bombas, entre otras) que el mismo ha dejado en el sueño para que pueda resolver el laberinto. Tambien una enigmática chica le habla en ciertas ocaciones para ayudarlo. En la realidad (fuera del sueño) algo sale mal y para poder despertar y salir del sueño debe completar todo el laberinto y lanzarse desde la asotea del mismo para poder despertar.

Para resolver el laberinto debe lidiar con varios robots que lo persiguen, debe destruir ciertas porciones del laberinto (con bombas) para poder hayar las herramientas y la puerta al siguiente nivel.

About Game:

This happens in a dream that has been predesigned which is a labyrinth with multiple levels (or floors) of which the player (the dreamer) must escape. In the beginning the dreamer does not know that this is a dreaming, But then the he will remember clues and tools (compass, radar, clock, bomns, and others) that himself has established for solve the labyrinth. Also, a mysterious girl speaks to him sometimes to help him. In the reality (out of sleep) something goes wrong for
wake out of sleep. Then, must complete the entire Labyrinth and jump from the rooftop to wake

To complete the labyrinth must confront several robots that persecute him, and should destroy some sections of the labyrinth (with bombs) to find the tools and the door to the next level.



Versión Alfa / Alpha Version:



Inspiración:

El juego está inspirado en los filmes: The Inception, Vanilla Sky; y en los juegos Another World y Bomberman.

Inspiration:

The game is inspired by the films: The Inception, Vanilla Sky, and games
Another World and Bomberman.


Caracteristicas Claves:

  • El modo de juego es en primera persona.
  • Estará hecho para Windows, Mac y Linux.
  • Idiomas: Español, Ingles (Subtitulado)

Game Features:

  • The gameplay is in first person. 
  • It will be available for Windows, Mac and Linux. 
  • Languages: Spanish, English (Subtitled).


Gastos:

Ya hemos usado parte de nuestros propios recursos para desarrollar una parte importante de Labyrint Project. Sin embargo, todavía necesitamos más dinero para hacer algunas características visuales y de programación, para asegurar que el juego alcance su máximo potencial. Por esta razón, hemos llegado a Indiegogo. A continuación, puedes ver a que se destinará el dinero recaudado.

  • Programación: Ya están hechas rutinas que colocan objetos y personajes al azar en todo el laberinto para que cada partida sea distinta. También está hecha una rutina que permite a los robots enemigos recorrer todo el laberinto en busca del personaje principal. Pero aun falta mucho más.

  • Interfaz de Usuario: Menús, cuadros de dialogo, ect.

  • Animación 3D: Queremos crear animaciones realistas y todavía necesitamos seguir trabajando en ello.

  • Animación 2D: Para facilitar la animación del habla de personajes este tipo de animación sera hecha en 2D con base en imágenes 3D que serán modificadas. Asi las animaciones de habla parecerán animaciones 3D.

  • Traducción al ingles: Originalmente el juego está siendo desarrollado en español pero será traducido al ingles con subtítulos o con audio según los recursos que se alcancen en la campaña.

  • Equipo Mac: Para adaptar el juego a esta plataforma y realizar pruebas.

Expenses:

We have already used some of our own resources to develop part
important "Labyrinth Project". However, we still need more money to do some more programming and some visual features to ensure that the game reach its full potential. For this reason, we have resorted to Indiegogo. Then you can see what we will spend money on.

  • Programming: Are made routines that placed random objects and characters around the maze so that each level will be different. It is also takes a routine that enables robots walk around the Labyrinth in search of main character. But still need much more.

  • UI: Menus, dialog boxes, ect.

  • 3D Animation: We want to create realistic animations and still need keep working at it.

  • 2D Animation: For ease speaking animation of characters,we will use a special technique to make 2D animation that will seem 3D animation.

  • Translation to English: Originally the game is being developed to Spanish
    but will be translated into English with subtitles or audio according to the resources reached in this campaign.

  • Computer Mac: To adapt the game to the platform and test.


Equipo:

  • Daniel Esparza: Director, Programador. @sparzadaniel
  • Jesus Noya: Artista 3D, Animador. @jesusnoyad24
  • Carlos Quevedo: Artista 2D, Traductor. @carlos_EQ
  • Yonatan Noguera: Voz del personaje principal. http://www.facebook.com/yonathan.nogueravegas

Team:

  • Daniel Esparza: Director, Programmer. @sparzadaniel

  • Jesus Noya: 3D Artist, Animator. @jesusnoyad24

  • Carlos Quevedo: 2D Artist, Translator. @carlos_EQ

  • Yonatan Noguera: Voice of the main character. http://www.facebook.com/yonathan.nogueravegas


Sopórtenos:

Nos damos cuenta de que no todo el mundo puede ser capaz de comprometerse a aportar dinero para nuestra campaña Indiegogo, después de todo, el dinero no crece en los árboles. Pero si piensas que Labyrinth Project es un juego que debe alcanzar su meta, nos puedes ayudar en Twitter hablando acerca de nuestra campaña, dándole a me gusta y compartir en Facebook, y simplemente dejar que tus amigos sepan acerca de él.

Si eres un blogger o un miembro de alguno de los foros o sitios web de noticias de juegos, no dudes en publicar información sobre la campaña y presentar un consejo al respecto! Vamos a estar haciendo todo lo posible para correr la voz también, pero con la fecha de lanzamiento aproximándose, podemos estar un poco ocupados trabajando en el desarrollo del juego en sí.

Support Us:

We become aware of that not everyone may be able to commit to contribute money to our Indiegogo campaign, after all, money does not are found in trees. But if you think "Labyrinth Project" is a videogame that should reach your goal, you can help us on Twitter talking about our campaign, doing like and share on Facebook, and just let your friends know about it.

If you are a blogger or a member of any of the forums or news websites games, feel free to post information about the campaign and you submit a tips about the game! We will be doing everything possible to get the word too, but with the release date approaching, we can be one little busy working on game development.



Y eso es todo

And that is all

story:
Hi ,

Sorry for my bad English :-)

I'm an individual Italian developer and i make free game for passion, but writing a game alone is hard, sometimes i need help to complete my projects.

Creating games is not my primary job, but creating games and sharing with others is fantastic, and more fantastic is seeing people appreciating my works.

She Be Free is my vision of a running game with a story and action, the game is ever in movement and the gameplay changes a little bit from chapter to chapter.

At first look the game looks like a usual running game, but it's not, She Be Free is a story of DOT and of her running for freedom and discover at the end if she is really a software or something else.

The full game will be composed by six chapters, five for main story and secret one.

For now i've just developed three chapters, you can try it in the download section.

She Be Free is designed for touch control, but for pc you can use different control systems

All mouse or keyboard + mouse.

The game will available for this platforms

 but if i have your help maybe i can add more platform on delivered.

 

Try the game and proves to be up to the challenge

 

 

the game does not need installations, download the zip, unzip and play!

You can try webGL version too, but I suggest to download a desktop version for a best game details

 

 

 

DOT WakeUp and get your Freedom!!

The game starts with DOT (a program with female sembiance?) awake, the barrier vanish and  an external voice tells her to RUN!!

DOT starts her incredible adventure, the player (maybe a programmer?) drives our heroine and helps to dodge obstacle, fights enemys with power up, protects with shields and more.

In the game there are a BOSS-FIGHT! (I like boss fight) and DOT will have to face with his specific skills.

The game will test the player's reflexes and each chapter  changes a little bit the gameplay, for example in the second chapter DOT rides a vehicle called RW-BIKE (Rotor Wheels Bike).

The gameplay in any levels change in first person view for more challenge

Running levels, vehicles levels, flying levels, boss-fighting and more...

In the game DOT will have to face powerfull defence program, this is the first three foe to defeat!

 

 

There are many other enemies in the game that DOT will encounter in her escape from the system, helps DOT to conquer his freedom!

 

Try the game and proves to be up to the challenge

 

 

the game does not need installations, download the zip, unzip and play!

You can try webGL version too, but I suggest to download a desktop version for a best game details

 

Creating this game is hard, takes me a lot of hours a day, this is not my primary job, but i do it with passion,

The game is made by me only, i've created everything, graphics2D and 3D, coding, gameplay, story, characters, artworks, some musics.

Fortunately I met some very skilled people helped me, they draw some artworks and composed some musics.

For Music a special thanks to:

DJSicar  https://www.youtube.com/user/DjSicar

Nick Nuwe   https://www.youtube.com/user/ShadowblazeLU

Teknoaxe https://www.youtube.com/user/teknoaxe

 

I have been invited to various events to show my project, but I could not participate because of the costs, train, overnight, equipment, is too much for my low budget.

For example i showed the first two chapters playable of the game to the Codemotion event in Rome April 2018.

awesome experience!

I need the campaign money to finance these events, show our (mine and my supporters i hope) game and pay people for help me to finish the project:

  • buy material for perks
  • pay fee
  • buy tickets for train and overnight for events
  • buy an 10-inch android PAD ( for android version with touch system)
  • buy an 20-inch monitor to show the player's game.
  • pay some professional artist to draw an event poster and picture postcards.
  • pay professional musician for some music i want to insert in the game.


If the campaign exceeds what is required then I can also think  bringing the game on IOS or other platforms and improve the graphics with a professional team, but is my dream :-).

With extra money

  • buy a MAC for development
  • buy AppleStore license
  • buy Unity license

The backers will have unique exclusive access to the content and features created just for them.

Not many other things to tell, i'll be very happy to complete my game and i'll be more than happy if you'll enjoy playing it!

The risks are low because however the game is already in development on the fourth chapter and still some are already playing with the first three chapters.

The game is free and is playabled from all, but backers, 1 euro too, become part of project!

 

Why make a free game?

This game was born to be free, i want sharing a my game concept with other and i would like view the game played from many people.

All backers, 1 euro too become part of the project, your names write in credits and backers only have unique feature and stuff!

If i'll not be able to reach the goal, no matter, i'll try to improve my skills and provide better stuffs in the future,

i'll never give up! playing without exaggerating makes heart young

 

Perk 1 EUR (Supporter of DOT)

With this perk you become a part of the project! With only 1 Eur your name go in credits and

you get a special thanks from mazzutakegame' boss! Not bad!

 

Perk 3 EUR (Wakener of DOT)

With this perk you have stuff Supporter of DOT and a digital wallpaper for your desktop, you can select one wallpaper from this, specific me a number you like more!

select in the perk last selection and mail on mazzutakgame@gmail.com the number of the wallpaper

Oh i forgotten! the wallpaper is personalized with thank you [your name]

 

Perk 5 EUR (Defender of DOT)

Great! with this perk you get all on perk Wakener of DOT and in addiction a mp3 with my first game music Dot awakening.

 

Perk 10 EUR (Savior of DOT!)

Awesome! If you get this perk , you have all Perk Defender of DOT + a other music from game No regrets in mp3 format and a super mega cute DOT papercraft to assemble.

You have a sheet in pdf format, glue not included :-D

is not cute?

 

Perk 20 EUR (Master of DOT!)

Super awesome! If you get this perk , you have all Perk Savior of DOT + other two wallpaper and a  super mega cute COMMA papercraft to assemble.

You have a sheet in pdf format, glue not included :-D

 

Perk 50 EUR (Destroyer of Borg!)

YES!!! this perk is awesome!! with this perk you get Master of DOT! and a fantastic T-Shirt

if you want i can print a rear stamp too!!

There are more T-Shirt models, but if you want a different shirt or other contact me on mazzutakgame@gmail.com, the cost it could be a little bit more.

For backers in Italy shipping  are included in the perk, unfortunately the costs for shipping out of Italy are very high, 20 euros for union european and 40 euros for the rest of the world

you will also receive in the pack of the t-shirt the two papercraft already assembled with 120 gr paper. Very Cool!!

 

Perk 100 EUR (Conquer of the system!)

This perk is all digital, you can get all digital stuff!!

- your name in credits and in start game.

- complete game OST

- all digital wallpaper with thanks 

- all digital sketch 

- both papercraft model in pdf format

- a game version  with level all unlocked! you start where you want!

- a unlocked secret level.

Some stuff from this perk you can get immediatly after campaign, other you wait i finish the game or if you want i send you game updates when i finish a chapter.

 

Perk 250 EUR (God of Borg!)

If you get this perk you are the best and my benefactor!


This perk is for collection:
- a deluxe collector ediction box She Be Free
- a Usb credit card with game logo include all digital Perk conquer of the system
-  DOT and COMMA papercraft just assemble 120 gr paper print hq
- a CD with game OST
- a T-shirt
- your name or logo in game disclaimer
- a print wallpaper 10x15

- your name in the event poster and my site

AWESOME BRO!!!

 

Perk 3.000 euro (Master of She Be Free!!!)

My Friend ,this perk is for sponsor, 
you get all content perk God of Borg and you can set logo on the coverEar and on the suite of DOT!!!
Yes! you can set your logo in the  DOT 3d Model on the coverEar and on the back suit!!!

 

The player play with your logo, i create a exclusive start game page with powered by you!,  your logo show on poster , in credits, in the collector box, in the cd audio, in wallpapers, everywhere!!!

If you get this Perk you are my benefactor  and I'm really happy that someone believed in the project!

 

For all digital contents, i send the digital stuff to all backers email after campaign ending.

The name on credits will inserted and posted on all digital version i posted in idiexpo and itch game site.

For backers with collection box stuff (i hope) i will send game update to mail periodically.

 

 

some sketching drawing

Alessandra's sketching

GIAF's sketching

  

 

 

Other way can i help?

Sharing this campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, email, or any other social media platform. Each share helps to get our campaign out there!

I thank you for any donation you can provide, no matter the size.

You are free to comment and give me any suggest for improve the game.

With your donation become part of the game!!

remember GET DOT FREEDOM!!!

Stay indie

peace

 

  MazzutakGame CEO 

Mazzutakgame's president, even if he does not know it, he is the boss!

 

  Caligiuri Fabrizio 

all in one (programmer, graphics, musics ,game designer, story board, ecc...) and the boss's favorite human after my wife!

 

artwork designers

 

  Cardelli Alessandra

my wife and designer of some game artwork and the human favorite of the boss!

 

Tickei

a very skilled artist specialized in comics manga. tickei artist page

 

GIAF!

a friend very skilled artist in comics, very awesome artist!

The game is free and is playabled from all, but backers, 1 euro too, become part of project!
 
Why make a free game?
This game was born to be free, i want sharing a my game concept with other and i would like view the game played from many people.
All backers, 1 euro too become part of the project, your names write in credits and backers only have unique feature and stuff!
If i'll not be able to reach the goal, no matter, i'll try to improve my skills and provide better stuffs in the future,
i'll never give up! playing without exaggerating makes heart young
 

Perk 1 EUR (Supporter of DOT)
With this perk you become a part of the project! With only 1 Eur your name go in credits and
you get a special thanks from mazzutakegame' boss! Not bad!
 
Perk 3 EUR (Wakener of DOT)
With this perk you have stuff Supporter of DOT and a digital wallpaper for your desktop, you can select one wallpaper from this, specific me a number you like more!
select in the perk last selection and mail on mazzutakgame@gmail.com the number of the wallpaper
Oh i forgotten! the wallpaper is personalized with thank you [your name]

 
Perk 5 EUR (Defender of DOT)
Great! with this perk you get all on perk Wakener of DOT and in addiction a mp3 with my first game music Dot awakening.
 
Perk 10 EUR (Savior of DOT!)
Awesome! If you get this perk , you have all Perk Defender of DOT + a other music from game No regrets in mp3 format and a super mega cute DOT papercraft to assemble.
You have a sheet in pdf format, glue not included :-D

is not cute?
 
Perk 20 EUR (Master of DOT!)
Super awesome! If you get this perk , you have all Perk Savior of DOT + other two wallpaper and a  super mega cute COMMA papercraft to assemble.
You have a sheet in pdf format, glue not included :-D


 
Perk 50 EUR (Destroyer of Borg!)
YES!!! this perk is awesome!! with this perk you get Master of DOT! and a fantastic T-Shirt

if you want i can print a rear stamp too!!

There are more T-Shirt models, but if you want a different shirt or other contact me on mazzutakgame@gmail.com, the cost it could be a little bit more.
For backers in Italy shipping  are included in the perk, unfortunately the costs for shipping out of Italy are very high, 20 euros for union european and 40 euros for the rest of the world
you will also receive in the pack of the t-shirt the two papercraft already assembled with 120 gr paper. Very Cool!!
 
Perk 100 EUR (Conquer of the system!)
This perk is all digital, you can get all digital stuff!!
- your name in credits and in start game.
- complete game OST
- all digital wallpaper with thanks 
- all digital sketch 
- both papercraft model in pdf format
- a game version  with level all unlocked! you start where you want!
- a unlocked secret level.
Some stuff from this perk you can get immediatly after campaign, other you wait i finish the game or if you want i send you game updates when i finish a chapter.
 
Perk 250 EUR (God of Borg!)
If you get this perk you are the best and my benefactor!
This perk is for collection:- a deluxe collector ediction box She Be Free- a Usb credit card with game logo include all digital Perk conquer of the system-  DOT and COMMA papercraft just assemble 120 gr paper print hq- a CD with game OST- a T-shirt- your name or logo in game disclaimer- a print wallpaper 10x15
- your name in the event poster and my site



AWESOME BRO!!!
 
Perk 3.000 euro (Master of She Be Free!!!)
My Friend ,this perk is for sponsor, you get all content perk God of Borg and you can set logo on the coverEar and on the suite of DOT!!!Yes! you can set your logo in the  DOT 3d Model on the coverEar and on the back suit!!!
 


The player play with your logo, i create a exclusive start game page with powered by you!,  your logo show on poster , in credits, in the collector box, in the cd audio, in wallpapers, everywhere!!!
If you get this Perk you are my benefactor  and I'm really happy that someone believed in the project!
 
For all digital contents, i send the digital stuff to all backers email after campaign ending.
The name on credits will inserted and posted on all digital version i posted in idiexpo and itch game site.
For backers with collection box stuff (i hope) i will send game update to mail periodically.

Alessandra's sketching

GIAF's sketching



  
 

 
Other way can i help?
Sharing this campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, email, or any other social media platform. Each share helps to get our campaign out there!
I thank you for any donation you can provide, no matter the size.
You are free to comment and give me any suggest for improve the game.
With your donation become part of the game!!
remember GET DOT FREEDOM!!!
Stay indie
peace

Hi everyone!

First of all, i'm sorry for my english!
I know there're (and will be!) a lot of mistakes, but please go easy on me! XD

My name is Screamer and....and i like to make tickling doujinshi videogames, usually inspired from anime characters (All girls!)

I don't really need funds and all my games are free to download, but a little help sure is appreciated!

A Witch's Laugh - http://www.tickletheater.com/showthread.php?t=70013

Ni No Kusu - http://www.tickletheater.com/showthread.php?t=7...


Tickling may be a strange fetish, but....sure is fun!

Thanks for your visit and...CIAO!

story:
What is Swiggle?

If you like playing games, you'll love playing Swiggle, an addictive light strategy game designed for iOS and Android. Swiggle is a refreshing alternative to Words With Friends - we like to say you can play with “friends” but without the “words”. Although the game play is similar, there are no letters or words involved, making Swiggle a truly international game that's fun for all ages. In Swiggle, the players place tiles next to each other as they connect the “swiggly” wandering lines and earn points. In addition to playing with friends, you can play against the “Swiggle Bot”, the single player mode. Check out our How to Play video below.


The design and development of Swiggle 1.0 was self-funded by David, Steve and Michael, and has received many accolades. We have also received many feature requests which are going into Swiggle 2.0 and beyond, and that's why we need your help. We, and our early users, believe that Swiggle has blockbuster potential, we only need to take it to the next level - you can help us make that happen.

Reviews from iTunes and Google Play App Stores

Fun and addictive! ★★★★★ by Bantambaby

I like that you can play with friends and against the bot. Fun but there is strategy needed as well. A really great game!

Great app!!! ★★★★★ by AshleyP2002

More addicting and more fun than any other multiplayer games (ie. words with friends, dice with buddies).

Swiggle... Love it!!! ★★★★★ by Patrice, Patty

Fun for anyone in the family!!

I'm so addicted!! ★★★★★ by NermalNYC

I just started playing this recently. I was getting bored of Words with Friends and this is the perfect alternative. It's a perfect way to kill time while I'm commuting.

Five Stars ★★★★★ by Aaron Woloszyn

Great....now I'm not going to get any work done! :)

The Genesis of Swiggle by David Mair

The idea for Swiggle was born on August 27th of 2005, in the middle of the night, when all great ideas are born. How do I know it was the 27th of August? I had listened to a news story on the Scrabble championships that year, and how the Thai players, who were less than fluent in English, were among the top players in the world. They were memorizing every one of the 120,000 words that were officially acceptable. That made me think: Scrabble was more of a strategy game than a word game to these players.

I went to bed with those thoughts in mind. At some point in the night, I awoke and jotted down some words on a scrap of paper and went back to sleep. When I got up that morning, I looked at the words I had written down, “Scribble Scrabble”. I thought for a minute, and the idea of seeing number-valued tiles forming a wandering line on a Scrabble board materialized.

I produced a working prototype, and sold the board game rights to Scribble Scrabble to Hasbro, who shockingly returned the rights to us when they determined that a Scrabble brand game had to have letters associated with it. In 2006, Goliath Games bought the world rights and produced a beautifully designed game, calling it, Loopit.

Last year we decided to bring the game out as an app. A partnership was formed between me, Michael Kohner (my agent), and Steve Curtin of Shore Digital Solutions. Since then, we worked to perfect an already great game, which was launched on January 13, 2014 as Swiggle. So what literally started as a dream now needs some help from all of you. Besides downloading the app from our website, swiggleapp.com, or at Google Play, or the App Store in iTunes, we need your support in helping the dream have a happy ending.



Where would you place your 3 tiles to score the most points?

See the answer here.

How You Can Help

Our Goal of $10,000 Enables Us To:

  • Add Enhanced Play Mode

  • Make the Swiggle Bot More Challenging

  • Add a What’s New Feature

  • Add Other Enhancements (while we’re in there)

  • Submit Swiggle to Review Sites to Broaden Exposure

  • Develop an Ad Campaign

Stretch Goal #1 of $15,000 Enables Us To:

  • Add Player Leaderboards

  • Add the Beat-the-Bot Contest *

  • Add the Win-Win Contest **

  • Launch an Ad Campaign

Stretch Goal #2 of $20,000 Enables Us To:

  • Add Personalization Features

  • Add Group Tournaments (Tournies)

  • Extend Promotions

* Run in-app contest called “Beat the Bot”, where players have a chance to play the Bot, and if they “beat the Bot”, win promotional items.

** A “Win-Win” contest, where players, by winning games, can earn points toward refunds of their in-app purchases, or Swiggle Sticks, or other promotional items.

What You Will Get for Being a Part of Swiggle
Every contributor to Swiggle becomes an honorary member of the Swiggle team and the more you give the more you get. See our perk packages to the right, and the images below.

Here is the answer to our Swiggle quiz!



The Highest Possible Score for This Turn

5 + 1
+
(8 x 4) + 5
+
(8 x 5) + 5
=
88
Go Back

Who We Are
We are David, Steve and Michael, the creators of Swiggle. We have a combined track record of success in the game industry and digital technologies.  We have gotten this far through our own efforts, we have the passion and commitment to make Swiggle a success, we only need a little financial help from you to put us over the top.

David Mair After receiving his BA and MA from Montclair State University, David Mair taught art in Newark, NJ, and film-making at Montclair State College. He worked as a studio manager and set designer in New York City. In the late 70s, he began his current vocation as toy and game inventor. Since starting that career, he has invented over 600 games. With the help of his long time agent and friend, Michael Kohner, of The Michael Kohner Corporation, more than 100 items have been marketed world wide.  Besides inventing, Mr. Mair enjoys photography, painting, gardening, and travel.  David is married and has four daughters.

Steve Curtin is an interactive marketer and engineer with a history of success in Internet strategy and technologies, on-line and off-line marketing, business development and business management. His years of experience in business, marketing and engineering has culminated in the creation of Shore Digital Solutions, a startup company developing advanced Internet and mobile web sites and apps. Steve has a BS in electrical and computer engineering and an MBA from Rutgers University.  He is family man, avid mountain biker, plays guitar and absolutely loves the beach.

Michael Kohner has a BA from Farleigh Dickinson University Class of 65. VP of Kohner Brothers (Makers of Pop-o-Matic Trouble) which was sold to General Foods where he remained as VP until 1975. After GF sold the company to another toy firm, he created the internationally known new product development company, The Michael Kohner Corporation, licensing Inventors' game concepts worldwide.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you can contribute or not, everyone can help. Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our Swiggle campaign.  Send the share link to friends, share on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, email or wherever you can, and use the Indiegogo share tools! Thanks!!!

Chance to Win an iPad MIni Contest Rules OFFICIAL RULES
The “Chance to Win an iPad MIni Contest” ("Contest") is sponsored Shore Digital (“Sponsor”). This contest is governed by these official rules (“Official Rules”). By participating in the contest, each entrant agrees to abide by these Official Rules, including all eligibility requirements, and understands that the results of the contest, as determined by Sponsor and its agents, are final in all respects. The contest is subject to all federal, state and local laws and regulations and is void where prohibited by law.
ELIGIBILITY The Contest is open to legal residents of their respective countries where not prohibited by law, who are eighteen (18) years of age or older at the time of entry, have a valid email address, who have contributed $5 USD or more to the Swiggle 2.0 An Addictive Game App for All Ages Indiegogo campaign ("Campaign") and have posted an original Swiggle slogan or tagline on Twitter with the hashtag #SwiggleSlogan.
CONTEST PERIOD The Contest begins on the first day of the Campaign and ends 24 hours after the end of the Campaign. All entries (Submissions) must be posted to Twitter (tweeted) on or before the time stated during that submission period. Sponsor reserves the right to extend or shorten the contest at their sole discretion.
HOW TO ENTER You can enter the Contest by purchasing a Campaign Perk and tweeting an original written slogan or tagline for Swiggle, and include the hashtag #SwiggleSlogan in your tweet. You may enter as many times as you wish.
WINNER SELECTION All eligible entries received during the Submission Period will be gathered from Twitter at the end of the Submission Period. All entries will be reviewed by David, Steve and Michael, and they will decide on the best slogan or tagline Submission, and thereby select the winner. In the event that any entry is the same or substantially similar to another, the entry submitted first will be considered and the others will be discarded. The winner will be announced one week after the end of the Contest Period. Announcement and instructions for prize will be sent to the Twitter account of the winning entry, and announced on the Campaign page on the Indiegogo website. Each entrant is responsible for monitoring his/her Twitter account for prize notification and receipt or other communications related to this Contest. If a potential prize winner cannot be reached by the Sponsor within fifteen (15) days, using the contact information provided at the time of entry, or if the prize is returned as undeliverable, that potential prize winner shall forfeit the prize. If a potential winner fails to comply with these official rules, that potential winner will be disqualified. Prizes may not be awarded if an insufficient number of eligible entries are received.
PRIZE: A new Apple iPad Mini valued at $299.00 value.
Terms and conditions may apply. Incidental expenses and all other costs and expenses which are not specifically listed as part of a prize in these Official Rules and which may be associated with the award, acceptance, receipt and use of all or any portion of the awarded prize are solely the responsibility of the respective prize winner. ALL FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL TAXES ASSOCIATED WITH THE RECEIPT OR USE OF ANY PRIZE IS SOLELY THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE WINNER.
PUBLICITY By participating, each entrant grants Sponsor permission to use his/her name, likeness or comments for publicity purposes without payment of additional consideration, except where prohibited by law.
ADDITIONAL LIMITATIONS Prize is non-transferable. No substitution or cash equivalent of prizes is permitted. Sponsor and its respective parent, affiliate and subsidiary companies, agents, and representatives are not responsible for any typographical or other errors in the offer or administration of the Contest, including, but not limited to, errors in any printing or posting or these Official Rules, the selection and announcement of any winner, or the distribution of any prize. Any attempt to damage the content or operation of this Contest is unlawful and subject to possible legal action by Sponsor. Sponsor reserves the right to terminate, suspend or amend the Contest, without notice, and for any reason, including, without limitation, if Sponsor determines that the Contest cannot be conducted as planned or should tampering or unauthorized intervention, technical failure or other cause beyond Sponsor’s control corrupt the administration, security, fairness, integrity or proper play of the Contest. In the event any tampering or unauthorized intervention may have occurred, Sponsor reserves the right to void suspect entries at issue. Sponsor and its respective parent, affiliate and subsidiary companies, agents, and representatives, and any telephone network or service providers, are not responsible for incorrect or inaccurate transcription of entry information, or for any human error, technical malfunction, lost or delayed data transmission, omission, interruption, deletion, line failure or malfunction of any telephone or computer network, computer equipment or software, the inability to access any website or online service or any other error, human or otherwise.
INDEMNIFICATION AND LIMITATION OF LIABILITY BY ENTERING THE CONTEST, EACH ENTRANT AGREES TO INDEMNIFY, RELEASE AND HOLD HARMLESS SPONSOR AND ITS PARENT, AFFILIATE AND SUBSIDIARY COMPANIES, AND ALL THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, REPRESENTATIVES AND AGENTS FROM ANY LIABILITY, DAMAGES, LOSSES OR INJURY RESULTING IN WHOLE OR IN PART, DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, FROM THAT ENTRANT’S PARTICIPATION IN THE CONTEST AND THE ACCEPTANCE, USE OR MISUSE OF ANY PRIZE THAT MAY BE WON. SPONSOR AND ITS PARENT, AFFILIATE AND SUBSIDIARY COMPANIES DO NOT MAKE ANY WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, AS TO THE CONDITION, FITNESS OR MERCHANTABILITY OF THE PRIZE. SPONSOR AND ITS PARENTS, SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, ADVERTISING AND PROMOTIONAL AGENCIES, AND ALL THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, REPRESENTATIVES AND AGENTS DISCLAIM ANY LIABILITY FOR DAMAGE TO ANY COMPUTER SYSTEM RESULTING FROM ACCESS TO OR THE DOWNLOAD OF INFORMATION OR MATERIALS CONNECTED WITH THE CONTEST.
COMPLETE RULES AND DISPUTES By entering the Contest entrants agree to these OFFICIAL RULES. This Agreement constitutes the complete agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior communications and agreements between them with respect to the subject matter of this Agreement. Any disputes regarding the Contest shall be interpreted and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New Jersey (without reference to conflicts of laws).

Any attempt to damage the content or operation of this Contest is unlawful and subject to possible legal action by Sponsor. Sponsor reserves the right to terminate, suspend or amend the Contest, without notice, and for any reason, including, without limitation, if Sponsor determines that the Contest cannot be conducted as planned or should tampering or unauthorized intervention, technical failure or other cause beyond Sponsor’s control corrupt the administration, security, fairness, integrity or proper play of the Contest. In the event any tampering or unauthorized intervention may have occurred, Sponsor reserves the right to void suspect entries at issue. Sponsor and its respective parent, affiliate and subsidiary companies, agents, and representatives, and any telephone network or service providers, are not responsible for incorrect or inaccurate transcription of entry information, or for any human error, technical malfunction, lost or delayed data transmission, omission, interruption, deletion, line failure or malfunction of any telephone or computer network, computer equipment or software, the inability to access any website or online service or any other error, human or otherwise.

story:
Save lives with War Survival App

Have you ever considered how many people die each month during any kind of war action? Is it an open or hybrid war, an act of terror or any other kind of violence against civilians?

We are used to thinking that sending food, clothes and other necessities to victims of such violence is the best we can accomplish. In many cases all these actions would be unnecessary if people were able to ESCAPE at a right time.

On this juncture we suggest to increase chances of survival for those living in war zones by helping us with finishing a MOBILE APPLICATION under the name of “War survival”. The application will be translated to all most used languages and adapted to the majority of different phones (currently the prototype of the application is adapted only for android phones), moreover - different network operators.

About War

Every war requires considerable emotional and physical effort from everyone and leaves a deep scar in all people's lives. Wars claim numerous victims. Families lose their breadwinners, children, brothers and sisters.

While a lot of soldiers die on the battleground, no less innocent civilians suffer at the same time. During any war the main goal of civilians is to survive, to protect themselves from direct military threat and other impacts of a war, to save their families and protect the children. Instinctive survival and evasion of different threats become main priorities. 

About this Project

Our team invented the War Survival project to make people's lives safer. This App is made to help people during a wartime. We need all your support to start this App in many platforms and help many people stay safe and survive throughout the period of any armed conflict.

Let's help save the lives of innocent people. Using This App, people will find answers and advice on how to behave in various critical situations during an armed conflict.

About the App

It is a simple-in-use application that would show the shortest way to shelter, not yet destroyed airport, bus/train station, closest operating petrol stations, place to charge the phone, etc.

Smart ready-to-use one-button messages like “I’m OK”, “I’m injured”, “I need help”, “Connection lost”, “Phone is under limit of charging off” would simplify communication with family members and friends and let them know what is happening.

In this App we offer some means to help people survive during a war:

·  Escape will help find a safe zone near your location or escape somewhere else;

·  Locate will tell where to find the closest hospitals, shelters, help providing checkpoints;

·  Spot and notify will show to your family members and friends your location at the moment of search;

·  Status will inform others of your condition;

·  Survival knowledge will share some advice and ideas on how to survive during a war, for example, how to make a fire; 

·  SOS can help you send an emergency alert with your current location should you find yourself in trouble and are in need of immediate help or rescue.

Above are just a few examples of the prototype of the application.

The App was started to accomplish 2 goals

The first goal is to make this App applicable for any platforms that War Survival App could work on (iOS, Android, Windows and other platforms).

The second goal is to distribute mobile phones with this App installed to people living in war zone countries.

Your Help

War Survival App is an ambitious project to make the lives of people during any war easier and safer.  We have successfully implemented all core functions.  Now we need your help to finish this project and get the complete product to be applicable for all platforms. 

Many of the basic functions will be available to all people for free. We will try to implement a possibility for an app user to pay for other users. In that case different functions of this app will be available to a wider range of people.

Gaining at least 50.000 USD we will be able to start adapting to many different platrforms.

Gaining 100.000 USD would let us start translating. The biggest costs would be in translations to Arabic and Hebraic (as you know some languages are being written form write to left neither from left to write, so also all the design should be changed to these languages.

Gaining 250.000 USD would let us hire needed specialists for 1 year (application is ussualy developed and improved, tested during 2 years).

Gaining 500.000 USD would let us hire needed specialists for 2 years.

Gaining 1.000.0000 USD would let us start our mission at war zones (2nd campaign goal) and send phones to people might need them.

You never know if any war or terror act would take place where you live in. Don’t be indifferent to the things you may change and LIVES THAT YOU MAY SAVE! Regardless of what language they speak, their beliefs and the country they live in, every life is precious.

Let’s save people together. As many as we can. As fast as we can.

story:
Short Summary  

(English version is at the bottom)

Znači, želim se popeti na Kilimandžaro, najvišu planinu Afričkog kontinenta.

Ona je samo prva u nizu puzli jedne velike slagalice, odnosno mog većeg cilja - osvajanja svih 7 vrhova svijeta, odnosno najviših planina svih 7 svjetskih kontinenata. A potom slijedi i najveći izazov - K2. ;) 

Zašto? Sreća je put, a ne cilj. Nakon svakog postignutog cilja slijedi novi, stoga je potrebno stalno iznova putovati…

Želim dokazati sebi i pokazati drugima da je sve moguće.

Nakon što sam kao klinac sa 18g. obolio od Crohnove bolesti trebalo mi je jako, ali stvarno jako puno vremena, da shvatim kako imam snagu i moć ponovno preuzeti život u svoje ruke. Napornim i konstantnim radom na sebi uspio sam svoju bolest poraziti, i iako je još uvijek prisutna, ne dozvoliti joj da upravlja mojim životom i mojim pothvatima, željama i uspjesima. 

Moj cilj ovog putovanja je doći na vrh Kilimandžara - Uhuru peak -  na kojem su temperature oko -20 stupnjeva  samo u hlačama i kratkoj majici (a možda i bez majice) .Naš um je čudesan, i sposoban je kontrolirati mnoge fizičke procese. Naravno, uz puno vježbe i predanog rada. 
Znači ovako 02.07.2016.  letim za Kilimandžaro. Plan je takav da tamo na licu mjesta dogovorim uspon na vrh. U kontaktu sam sa nekoliko vodiča ali mislim da mogu povoljnije proći ako tamo direktno dogovorim putovanje a i ovako je neizvjesnost i čar putovanja veća.
Za uspon ovisno o ruti koju izaberem u prosjeku treba 5 do 7 dana. Trebam se popeti na Uhuru peak na visinu od 5895 metara.
Moje penjačko iskustvo nije veliko, ali moja volja je ogromna.
U odličnoj sam psiho-fizičkoj spremi.
Treniram Krav Maga 3 godine i došao sm do G1 stupnja.
Dosad sam istrčao 3 polumaratona (21 km), 1 maraton (42 km), 2 puta Wings for life, pretrčao tisuće kilometara.
I ono što je meni najvažnije, propješačio sam 870 kilometara dugo hodošašće Camino de Santiago u samo 22 dana, sam, pješke. To je moje prvo duhovno putovanje i putovanje koje je ostavilo ogroman utjecaj na mene.

Prakticiram i Wim Hof metodu, s kojom sam se već popeo na neka od gorja na iznimno niskim temperaturama ili kupao u mrzlim rijekama

Sve što ću raditi dokumentirati ću GoPro kamerom, tako da ćete moći pratiti i svemu posvjedočiti na mojim profilima na društvenim mrežama.
Sad mi je potrebna i vaša pomoć.

Zahvaljujem se unaprijed na svakom prilogu.

Veliko hvala od srca

Slaven


English version

So, my goal is to hike to the peak of Kilimanjaro.

This is actually part of my bigger goal – the seven summits, naturally starting with Kilimnjaro. Maybe even K2 J

Why? – because happiness is a way of travel not a destination. After each goal comes another, therefore, you just have to continue moving.

I want to prove to myself and others that anything is possible.

When I was a kid, 18 years old, I found out I have Crohn’s disease. It took me a long while before I decided I wasn’t going to let this disease define me. I chose to believe that I have the power and strength to take my life into my own hands.

The purpose of this trip is to come to the very top, where the temperature is -20 degrees Celsius, in shorts and a t-shirt (maybe even without a shirt). It might sound funny, and it seems ridiculous to me as I write this but the things is you can do it with a little bit of exercise and a right mindset. Our mind is a powerful thing, at times a little messed up.

My flight to Kilimanjaro is 02.07.2016. The plan, as of now, is to get there and once I am there arrange further the details with the locals about getting to the top. Right now I am in contact with a few guides but I believe that once I am there it will be a lot easier and cheaper to arrange everything. Plus the unknown is what sparks the interest in me.

For the summit, depending on the route I choose, it should approximately take 5-7 days.

I need to summit to the Uhuru peak, that mounts up to the height of 5895 meters.

My hiking experience is not extensive, but my will is immense.

I am in great shape, mentally and physically. I train Krav Maga for 3 years now and have received a G1 certification.

I’ve ran 3 half marathons (21km), 1 marathon (42km), and twice I ran the Wings for Life race.

I take the greatest pride in the fact that I did the Camino de Santiago, 870km in 22 days, alone hiking. That was my first spiritual trip that left a great impact on me.

The way I prepared myself for this summit is by using legendary Wim Hof’s methods. He is my inspiration! During one of my trainings I climbed Sljeme in shorts while it was -4 degrees Celsius outside, and I managed to swim in the freezing cold Kupa during winter.

Now I need your help! I appreciate you taking the time to read this and donate.

Thank you from the bottom of my heart,

Slaven

My whole summit will be on a video blog which I will update regularly on my facebook, Instagram and youtube channel.

story:
Who Wants to be a Diabetes Guru?

Now the details...

The project and why we're doing it

If you or someone you know suffers from type 2 diabetes, you are well aware of the devastating complications that can occur with type 2 diabetes. And you also know that these complications can largely be avoided by staying on top of your diabetes and controlling your blood glucose. But, there are lots of challenges to be faced in managing type 2 diabetes. Lifestyle changes, medications, blood testing. It can be overwhelming. While your physician, pharmacist, and other healthcare providers do their best, they don't have the time to provide you with all of the information you need or answer all of your questions. Did you know that the average physician spends two hours or less per year with a patient with diabetes? That makes it pretty clear that it's up to you to wage the battle. Every day. BUT how do you do that? Where do you find the detailed information you need and can understand as well as trust? We realize how difficult and frustrating it can be to find clear, simple answers to the many questions you probably have related to your type 2 diabetes.

Some time ago, we saw the same situation faced by people who suffer from migraine headaches. We knew how disabling migraine can be, so we developed Headache: What Type Is Yours? to help these people do a better job of recognizing and managing their migraines. We worked with 2 top headache specialists to develop a 30-minute program which aired on PBS stations. We also worked with the National Headache Foundation which asked for our permission to include excerpts of the program in their section on You Tube. One of these excerpts has been viewed more than 65,000 times.

As life-altering as migraine headaches are, type 2 diabetes can be even worse. So, again, we'd like to help. We'll be working with 2 diabetes experts who go the extra mile in helping their patients with type 2 diabetes do the best they can to manage their own diabetes. But instead of producing a video program, this time we want you to have more fun, so we're going to deliver the information online using a game format similar to a popular television game show. Like the TV game show, we'll have lots of questions (68 are planned subject to the support we receive; we'll develop more if support exceeds our request). Questions such as:

  • Which is a benefit of good blood glucose control?
  • Who is the most important person on your diabetes care team?
  • Which is the most effective strategy to minimize weight gain associated with a sulfonylurea like glipizide or glimepiride?
  • Which is the best choice to raise the blood glucose when experiencing hypoglycemia?
  • If I start taking metformin and experience diarrhea, I should...
  • Which is the most common reason to add a second or third medication to control the blood glucose?
  • A small risk of bladder cancer is associated with which medication?

These are examples of questions persons with type 2 diabetes have asked us. But what about you? What questions do you have? What challenges do you face in taking care of your type 2 diabetes? Please let us know by clicking the link at the end.

Game topics/sections

Subject to your input, here are the general topics related to type 2 diabetes that we plan to cover:

  1. Overview of type 2 diabetes (comparison with type 1 diabetes; disease course; risk factors)
  2. Reasons to treat (avoid complications; feel better)
  3. Treatment overview of type 2 diabetes (blood glucose- A1c, fasting, postprandial; lifestyle management, medications; overview of recently updated treatment guidelines; progressive nature of type 2 diabetes; blood pressure, cholesterol, skin, other; diabetes as a self-managed disease; adherence)
  4. Common side effects (hypoglycemia; weight gain; gastrointestinal)

 

 

The game will also include sections about individual medications commonly used to manage type 2 diabetes such as:

  • Metformin
  • Sulfonylureas/Meglitinides (such as glimepiride, glipizide, nateglinide)
  • Thiazolidinediones (pioglitazone, rosiglitazone)

Questions will cover how the medications work and the effects they have on different blood glucose levels and other things like blood pressure and cholesterol. As in other sections of the game, a big emphasis will be on watching for side effects and how each should be managed.

Like the TV game show, we think you'll have fun. But unlike the TV game show, the game is more than lots of questions. After all, the whole point to the game is helping the person with type 2 diabetes feel more comfortable and confident in managing their diabetes and get the most out of their medications. For these reasons, each question will include a brief audio discussion wherein our diabetes experts (or you) will provide the insight and tips they've learned helping thousands of persons with diabetes. We'll also include tips from persons (how about you?) with type 2 diabetes in the Personal Perspectives section of the program. But that's not all. Because we think the game will stimulate your desire to learn even more about type 2 diabetes, each game question will include links to relevant, helpful, detailed information. This information will be carefully chosen to complement the information we provide in the audio discussion following each question. We'll include information from trusted sources like:

  • US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
  • US Food and Drug Administration
  • American Diabetes Association
  • American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists
  • American Association of Diabetes Educators
  • Others

And finally, each section of the game will be concluded with an audio summary of the key information from that section of the game. The 'action plan' if you will.

So that's our plan. Will you find this helpful? Do you have suggestions to share? If so, please click the link at the bottom.

Who we are

The engine behind this project is 3 not-so-grumpy guys. As noted earlier, we assembled a team and produced the program Headache: What Type Is Yours? that aired on PBS stations. We passionately believe in the importance of people being in control of their health. We all have a personal connection with type 2 diabetes. And we all believe that a major barrier to people taking better care of their diabetes is a lack of information and understanding. We're not naïve enough to think that we're going to change the world of diabetes. But...if we can help lots of people with diabetes change their world, feel more confident, more in control, then we'll be satisfied.

Two of us have decades of experience in information technology working with Fortune 100 companies. The third of us is a pharmacist who has practiced and taught in a major teaching medical center, as well as contributed to the development of more than 450 educational programs and medical journal articles for physicians, pharmacists, and other healthcare providers. Approximately 80 of these have related to diabetes.

$The budget$

The budget for this program is $24,300. Major project costs include:

  • License fee for the online game
  • Research and development of the 68 game questions, answers, discussion; links; audio
  • Website hosting

The perks

We greatly appreciate any amount of support. All persons who contribute to the program will be acknowledged in the game credits. Persons who provide support in an amount shown to the right will receive the identified perk with our special thanks.

Share your burning question or challenge about type 2 diabetes

To share your idea, please click here. You will be taken to a page where you can send us an e-mail. One request though. Please be brief and specific. Once you have sent us the e-mail, you can click the back button to return to this page. Thanks for sharing.

One final word...

We know there are lots of places where you can provide your support--financial and ideas. If one of those is a better fit for you, we hope the project is successful. We appreciate your having considered supporting this project designed to help persons with type 2 diabetes better self-manage their diabetes. If you are able to financially support this project, thanks very much. We greatly appreciate your support. We're also interested in your ideas, so if you have a burning question or problem related to diabetes, please click the link below. We knows--we just may select it for inclusion in the game.

And please, pass this on to others you think might want to support this project in some way. Thanks.
story_txt:
Who Wants to be a Diabetes Guru?

Now the details...
The project and why we're doing it
If you or someone you know suffers from type 2 diabetes, you are well aware of the devastating complications that can occur with type 2 diabetes. And you also know that these complications can largely be avoided by staying on top of your diabetes and controlling your blood glucose. But, there are lots of challenges to be faced in managing type 2 diabetes. Lifestyle changes, medications, blood testing. It can be overwhelming. While your physician, pharmacist, and other healthcare providers do their best, they don't have the time to provide you with all of the information you need or answer all of your questions. Did you know that the average physician spends two hours or less per year with a patient with diabetes? That makes it pretty clear that it's up to you to wage the battle. Every day. BUT how do you do that? Where do you find the detailed information you need and can understand as well as trust? We realize how difficult and frustrating it can be to find clear, simple answers to the many questions you probably have related to your type 2 diabetes.
Some time ago, we saw the same situation faced by people who suffer from migraine headaches. We knew how disabling migraine can be, so we developed Headache: What Type Is Yours? to help these people do a better job of recognizing and managing their migraines. We worked with 2 top headache specialists to develop a 30-minute program which aired on PBS stations. We also worked with the National Headache Foundation which asked for our permission to include excerpts of the program in their section on You Tube. One of these excerpts has been viewed more than 65,000 times. 
As life-altering as migraine headaches are, type 2 diabetes can be even worse. So, again, we'd like to help. We'll be working with 2 diabetes experts who go the extra mile in helping their patients with type 2 diabetes do the best they can to manage their own diabetes. But instead of producing a video program, this time we want you to have more fun, so we're going to deliver the information online using a game format similar to a popular television game show. Like the TV game show, we'll have lots of questions (68 are planned subject to the support we receive; we'll develop more if support exceeds our request). Questions such as:

Which is a benefit of good blood glucose control?
Who is the most important person on your diabetes care team?
Which is the most effective strategy to minimize weight gain associated with a sulfonylurea like glipizide or glimepiride?
Which is the best choice to raise the blood glucose when experiencing hypoglycemia?
If I start taking metformin and experience diarrhea, I should...
Which is the most common reason to add a second or third medication to control the blood glucose?
A small risk of bladder cancer is associated with which medication?

These are examples of questions persons with type 2 diabetes have asked us. But what about you? What questions do you have? What challenges do you face in taking care of your type 2 diabetes? Please let us know by clicking the link at the end.
Game topics/sections
Subject to your input, here are the general topics related to type 2 diabetes that we plan to cover:

Overview of type 2 diabetes (comparison with type 1 diabetes; disease course; risk factors)
Reasons to treat (avoid complications; feel better)
Treatment overview of type 2 diabetes (blood glucose- A1c, fasting, postprandial; lifestyle management, medications; overview of recently updated treatment guidelines; progressive nature of type 2 diabetes; blood pressure, cholesterol, skin, other; diabetes as a self-managed disease; adherence)
Common side effects (hypoglycemia; weight gain; gastrointestinal)

 

 
The game will also include sections about individual medications commonly used to manage type 2 diabetes such as:

Metformin
Sulfonylureas/Meglitinides (such as glimepiride, glipizide, nateglinide)
Thiazolidinediones (pioglitazone, rosiglitazone)

Questions will cover how the medications work and the effects they have on different blood glucose levels and other things like blood pressure and cholesterol. As in other sections of the game, a big emphasis will be on watching for side effects and how each should be managed.
Like the TV game show, we think you'll have fun. But unlike the TV game show, the game is more than lots of questions. After all, the whole point to the game is helping the person with type 2 diabetes feel more comfortable and confident in managing their diabetes and get the most out of their medications. For these reasons, each question will include a brief audio discussion wherein our diabetes experts (or you) will provide the insight and tips they've learned helping thousands of persons with diabetes. We'll also include tips from persons (how about you?) with type 2 diabetes in the Personal Perspectives section of the program. But that's not all. Because we think the game will stimulate your desire to learn even more about type 2 diabetes, each game question will include links to relevant, helpful, detailed information. This information will be carefully chosen to complement the information we provide in the audio discussion following each question. We'll include information from trusted sources like:

US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
US Food and Drug Administration
American Diabetes Association
American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists
American Association of Diabetes Educators
Others

And finally, each section of the game will be concluded with an audio summary of the key information from that section of the game. The 'action plan' if you will.
So that's our plan. Will you find this helpful? Do you have suggestions to share? If so, please click the link at the bottom.
Who we are
The engine behind this project is 3 not-so-grumpy guys. As noted earlier, we assembled a team and produced the program Headache: What Type Is Yours? that aired on PBS stations. We passionately believe in the importance of people being in control of their health. We all have a personal connection with type 2 diabetes. And we all believe that a major barrier to people taking better care of their diabetes is a lack of information and understanding. We're not naïve enough to think that we're going to change the world of diabetes. But...if we can help lots of people with diabetes change their world, feel more confident, more in control, then we'll be satisfied. 
Two of us have decades of experience in information technology working with Fortune 100 companies. The third of us is a pharmacist who has practiced and taught in a major teaching medical center, as well as contributed to the development of more than 450 educational programs and medical journal articles for physicians, pharmacists, and other healthcare providers. Approximately 80 of these have related to diabetes.
$The budget$
The budget for this program is $24,300. Major project costs include:

License fee for the online game
Research and development of the 68 game questions, answers, discussion; links; audio
Website hosting

The perks
We greatly appreciate any amount of support. All persons who contribute to the program will be acknowledged in the game credits. Persons who provide support in an amount shown to the right will receive the identified perk with our special thanks.
Share your burning question or challenge about type 2 diabetes
To share your idea, please click here. You will be taken to a page where you can send us an e-mail. One request though. Please be brief and specific. Once you have sent us the e-mail, you can click the back button to return to this page. Thanks for sharing.
One final word...
We know there are lots of places where you can provide your support--financial and ideas. If one of those is a better fit for you, we hope the project is successful. We appreciate your having considered supporting this project designed to help persons with type 2 diabetes better self-manage their diabetes. If you are able to financially support this project, thanks very much. We greatly appreciate your support. We're also interested in your ideas, so if you have a burning question or problem related to diabetes, please click the link below. We knows--we just may select it for inclusion in the game.
And please, pass this on to others you think might want to support this project in some way. Thanks.

story:
My name is Dave. I am a veteran podcaster and online radio host and I live in a small town far from the major actions of the Occupy movement. (An example of my work can be found here.) I've been a lifelong believer in social and economic justice and consider myself a part of the movement, though I haven't been able to make any significant contribution yet. I hear many of my neighbors expressing confusion about Occupy, and believing that they have little to nothing in common with the people involved. I want to change that by showing that Occupiers share the same concerns, hopes and values as our neighbors. In doing so, I will also be documenting a part of what I believe to be an important moment in history.

How Will I Do It?

In order to bring these people's stories to the rest of us I will produce a webseries in which I will travel to meet with one small Occupation group in each state, interview their members and take part in events with them whenever possible. As I travel the country I will make updates on my journey available in the form of frequent blog entries, social media postings and podcast episodes and I will conduct a weekly online radio show, discussing my journey with callers and playing excerpts from selected interviews. I will also provide streaming video during events, if possible.

It is my hope that this multimedia webseries will help to illustrate that the people involved in the Occupy movement are not so different from our fellow Americans.

Why $5,000 for this project?

I'll be travelling by bus and boots and staying in the cheapest lodging I can find that has internet access (most of the groups I am going to meet are not large enough to have a physical camp), but the cost of storing all of my personal belongings for the duration of the project and moving them out of my apartment will be quite high. I will also be using part of the money to pay for a premium subscription at the online radio site where the live show is hosted and to maintain my own website for the time that the series will take to produce. There are a few items of equipment that I still need to purchase for producing good quality audio and video for you. Factor in the cost of the final two legs of the journey, Hawaii and Alaska, and expenses mount even further. Add an emergency fund to cover damaged or stolen equipment and it really adds up.


I have enough of an income, independent of work, to be able to cover much of the rest of the expense once I get started. I will also have a number of ways that supporters can donate during the project, as well.


What Cities Will I be Visiting, and Why?

The map of registered members of Occupy groups on Occupy Together's site was the best single resource I could find, so I chose groups of 20 or fewer members in each state. There are exceptions to that size limit, due to lack of registered members elsewhere in the state. These are the cities I currently plan to visit:

Coos Bay, OR
Fallon, NV
Bakersfield, CA
St. George, UT
Sedona, AZ
Taos, NM
Alamosa, CO
Lubbock, TX
Shawnee, OK
Wichita, KS
Jefferson City, MO
Ames, IA
Champaign-Urbana, IL
Anderson, IN
Saint Joseph, MI
Springfield, OH
Indiana, PA
Binghamton, NY
Rutland, VT
Portsmouth, NH
Bangor, ME
Fall River, MA
Providence, RI
Madison, CT
Vineland, NJ
Wilmington, DE
Frederick, MD
Beckley, WV
Hampton, VA
Waynesville, NC (I have a point-of-contact now.)
Aiken, SC
Valdosta, GA
Fort Walton Beach, FL
Montgomery, AL
Hattiesburg, MS
Lake Charles, LA
Clarksville, TN
Murray, KY
Bentonville, AR
Omaha, NB
Stevens Point, WI
Marshall, MN
Pierre, SD
Bismarck, ND
Billings, MT
Powell, WY
Idaho Falls, ID
Spokane, WA
Hilo, HI
Fairbanks, AK

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to be part of this journey, but cannot contribute financially, there is still plenty that you can do to help make it a reality.


  • If you know an organizer or point-of-contact for any of the groups I want to meet with, please help me get in touch with them.
  • Tell your friends.
  • Add it to link sharing services like Reddit, StumbleUpon and Digg.
  • Discuss it on your personal blogs, Facebook, Google Plus or Twitter feeds.
  • Talk about it in discussion forums.


Anything that gets the word out and increases this campaign's visibility is greatly appreciated. If you would like to help organize and coordinate this campaign let me know and I will add you as a team member here. Together we can make this happen.

story:
WorldAlpha is a massively multiplayer online real-time strategy game or MMORTS. In this persistent world, players will be working together to decide what society they are going to form, as no one player will be able to do it all. Some will be businessmen, others military and political leaders. They will work together, and use social strategy to ultimately decide the fate of WorldAlpha. WorldAlpha is in the late stages of development, the first closed beta scheduled for November 22 to 25.



Earth has failed, a smoking ruin. WorldAlpha, the only inhabitable planet within reach, is an experiment in survival. Humanity must outlive its own failure. The escape from the ruin of Home was merely another breath, a choking gasp. In order to breathe freely once more, Home must be restructured, reinvented, relocated.



WorldAlpha is a free-to-play browser based game, which will always be open to anyone to play. All players will be able to progress and will not be limited. The design is mobile friendly, so the game can be played on any mobile browser. There will be virtual currency, in the game called EarthBucks, which can be earned, won, or purchased. With EarthBucks citizens can purchase items to help themselves, their companies, their neighborhoods, cities, and countries.



In the economy players will have to gather 9 different resources such as clay, cotton, iron ore and oil, and use them to produce industrial materials like bricks, plastic and steel. These industrial materials in turn will then be used to create buildings, cars, tanks, weapons, and other end-user products.

Citizens will form companies, purchase real estate, construct buildings and employ other citizens. There will be over 200 different products which will be sold in the marketplace, and the revenue generated will further business, political or military interests.



Countries, as well as cities, will have the opportunity to form armies to protect their lands. Crews will be formed to command tanks and artillery. The Map based system will have battles that could rage on for hours. Each battle round will give the soldier an opportunity to fight in a minigame in their tank or artillery or as a sniper. Officers, crew commanders and High Command will have the chance to direct those soldiers underneath them to try to win the war on WorldAlpha.



Cities will be divided into neighborhoods which will have elected city councilors, who along with the elected mayor will make tough decisions on how to run their city. Taxes will be levied and collected, and with that money the leadership will have to protect their city and provide their citizens with academies, hospitals, city walls and more.


Nations will be a collection of like-minded cities. These countries will also hold elections to select a Head of Government, as well as officials from each city, to run the nation. A constitution will be written and voted upon. Which of the eight types of government will it be? Will it be Democracy, Aristocracy or Plutocracy? Who will hold leadership, and for how long? When will the elections be?  Will there even be elections? WorldAlpha will have many options.

The media module will let citizens open a newspaper, TV station or polling booth.  It will allow players to give their own views and commentary about what is happening in the game.  Is the war justified?  How to get rich quick? Why you should vote for the Plutocratic party?

Unlike many gaming-related IndieGoGo campaigns that raise money to finance or finish a game, WorldAlpha is in late development, and will be completed without any additional financing.  What our IndieGoGo campaign is about is getting more players to WorldAlpha to make it a richer experience for all players.  We have a modest ad budget, but we would like to expand our marketing budget to attract a larger audience.  So, the $12,000 is going to be used to advertise through the following avenues and others.

  • MMORPG.com
  • ONRPG.com
  • MMOHut.com
  • freemmorpglist.com
  • Massively
  • Google Adwords
  • Facebook Advertising
  • Reddit

The amount to each will depend on how initial advertising responds on each.  Those that prove to be better avenues will get a bigger budget.

We do have stretch goals in mind such that when we see our target being met, we’ll roll them out. These goals include a translation module and the opportunity to have WorldAlpha translated into many languages.

WorldAlpha is being developed by indie developer Big Impact Studios.  We are a team of 3 full-time staff and a lot of part-time help as well as a Flash Game Studio, Golden Gear Games.  Our office is located in Milton, Ontario, Canada, just outside of Toronto.  While most of us are in the Toronto area, some of the additional help is coming for those in the US, UK and Brazil. 

WorldAlpha producer and game designer, Michael Koehler, was owner and developer of a huge community website of over a million members, and 8 million pageviews/month before it was acquired by a US public company.  During that time he also created several online games and one PC trivia game, which were very successful.

WorldAlpha Lead Artist Serge Chumak has done work on several games including a browser based MMORTS.

WorldAlpha Lead Developer Chris Crocetti has worked on web applications for the better part of a decade.


One of our biggest rewards for all supporters is the opportunity to get beta keys for all of our closed beta dates, and bronze supporters and above will have access to our alpha (if the date hasn’t passed already).  This is significant as closed beta keys will be limited, and so by supporting us you will be able to secure one.  To give you an idea, for our first closed beta we plan to hand out around 1,000 closed beta keys above the IndieGoGo ones, and to date we have received over 8,000 beta tester requests. Our alpha and closed beta dates are as follows:

  • Alpha Test 3 – Friday, November 9 to Sunday, November 11 (November 8th cut-off)
  • Closed Beta Test 1 – Thursday, November 22 to Sunday, November 25 (November 21st cut-off)
  • Closed Beta Test 2 – Thursday, December 6 to Sunday, December 9
  • Closed Beta Test 3 – Thursday, December 20 to Sunday, December 23

As a big thank you to all our supporters, we are going to have a Sponsors pages on WorldAlpha thanking everyone.  For our Gold and above sponsors, there will be the opportunity to have a Twitter link, website link or Sponsor Ad.

 

Note that the amount of EarthBucks listed for each reward is the total amount for that level. (i.e you don’t add up all the previous tiers of EarthBucks). 

All Twitter, web site links and Images on our Sponsor page must not be sites containing pornography, obscenity, hate, criminal activity, illegal drugs, etc. or be a direct Social Strategy MMO competitor.




Website: http://www.worldalpha.com

Sign Up for Beta: http://www.worldalpha.com/beta-testers

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/worldalpha

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/worldalphagame

Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=101932385

Steam Community Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/worldalpha

Be sure to tell you your family and friends about WorldAlpha and our IndieGoGo campaign. Everyone can help by getting the word out by placing appropriate posts on gaming forums, reddit, etc.  By emailing your friends and family, you are doing your part.  Again “appropriate” is the key, please don’t spam. Be sure to use the IndieGoGo share tools to let others know.

story:
Please vote for our game on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetai...


The appeal of Igor Krutov, the creator of the game Through Abandoned.


Through Abandoned 2. The Forest

Through Abandoned 2. The Forest is the second part of Through Abandoned series. You may know the first part as Abandoned or Abandoned: The Underground City, depends on the device you are using.

What is Through Abandoned? It is a classical point-and-click adventure game based on the original first-person mechanic with interesting puzzles, a cartoon art style and athmosphere of dark mystery. 

You can play Through Abandoned here: the page on Steam.

Don't worry if you know the game as Abandoned. As we've found out Abandoned is not a good name for our game. When we've released the game on Appstore we realized that there are tons of games with the word "Abandoned" in their names. So we decided to make a little rebranding. 

Which platforms?

Through Abandoned 2. The Forest will be released on Steam for PC and Mac and we will start to port it to iOS and AndroidOS once it released.

Why do we want to get funds?

First of all, we would like to mention, that the game will be released anyway. At the moment (the time of campaign launch) around 60% is already done, we have all the resources for game developing and the release date will be in 2016. Very soon (April, 2016) we will publish a demo of the game and you could try it.

So, why do we want these funds?

We need some money for marketing (including localizations to the main world languages). Also we want to improve the game, make it better.

If we'll reach the goal, the game will be localized to German, Spanish, French and Russian.

If we'll get $2500 and more, we will add the professional voice-overs in 5 languages.

If we'll get $3000 and more, we will add some mini-games inside the game.

Perks.

At the right side of the page, you can see perks, — your prizes for supporting. Choose the one that fits to you better. Some of them include very interesting options, like an ink-sketch done by our awesome artist Eugene Smolkin or a mini-game made especially for you.

Here is an example of the ink-sketch:

Risks

As we mentioned before, the game will be released anyway. We don't need funds to develop, but only to improve the game. This is also the reason why we use a flexible withdraw option. If we'll get $1, well the game will get one more fan who will get a copy. 

Please notice, even if you fund $1 (the least possible amount), you will still get a copy of the game. So, it's more like a pre-order with lower price than on the release day. But don't limit yourself, we think that you can like another perks with larger amounts. 

Every next perk includes all previous excepting limited positions.

Tell your friends about the game.

Please, feel free to share this information. You could help others to discover our game. Point-and-click adventures relate to a very narrow genre. As people who do love point-and-click games, we know that the world saw not a lot of good games in this genre. And we do our best, to develop an excellent game that will bring you a lot of fun.
story_txt:
Please vote for our game on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetai...
