story:
Video Subtitles Available: English, Español, Deutsch, Français, 日本語

The virtual reality revolution has exploded over the last few years, but the available technology isn’t keeping up. While we’ve seen improvements in visuals, games, and head-mounted displays (HMDs), the way we experience virtual reality hasn’t changed much over the last few years. 

In order to fully experience virtual worlds, we need to actually move in those worlds. Lack of a proper movement solution breaks the immersive experience, limits us to the confines of reality, and all the excitement of an amazing VR experience fizzles out like a cheap firework.


WalkOVR is a practical, functional and affordable motion solution, specifically designed to solve locomotion problems in virtual reality. The built-in motion capture algorithms track gamers’ body movements and transform them into virtual reality.

With WalkOVR, you’re able to physically move in digital games and environments. You can walk in place, you can run in place, you can bend or even strafe. All of your movements are reflected in your favorite game.

Top names in the VR industry shared their impressions about WalkOVR.

 
 

...and here we would like to share the gameplay experiences of beloved games on various headsets in the market. We are pretty sure your headset is one of them because WalkOVR has a way to work with almost all of them...

WalkOVR has been tested with Oculus Quest while using ALVR to stream SteamVR games wirelessly, currently in keyboard mode. Here is a quick and funny gameplay video:

 

The Forest VR is truly one of our favorite games. WalkOVR lets you really feel that survival experience provided by the game; after all, we all need to answer one question: Which one is more immersive? using the touchpad to move around and find life-saving resources or searching them literally by physical walking?

 

 

Great puzzles need great products. You can play the Talos Principle VR on Oculus Rift with walkOVR. Walk around naturally and solve incredible puzzles just by being in that incredible world.

 

 

PSVR Compatibility is not as easy as other headsets due to many issues. But we have a workaround! If you are PSVR owner and also have Cronus Max Plus or Titan II (not tested) then you can move in PSVR games with WalkOVR in its Keyboard mode and enjoy the highlands of Tamriel. For detailed instructions regarding setup, you can talk to us or check the FAQ section.

 

if you have a Windows MR headset then you are able to walk around in awesome VR games. Such as Serious Sam VR. Gameplay with HP Windows MR Headset, which is a valid sign for HP Reverb Headset compatibility (not tested yet).

 

 

Did you see how a great game Slightly Heroes is? We enjoyed it so much while we play it on Oculus GO and it is one of our favorite games. Playing it with WalkOVR is so much fun.

 

 

Are you a Minecraft fan and you like to play it on GearVR? Then we had good news, we are compatible with it too! Just get your Gear VR, connect your WalkOVR to your phone and you are good to go.

 Motion capture in tiny boxes 

WalkOVR consists of four tiny nodes with built-in motion sensors and algorithm. These nodes capture your lower body movements and transmit them to your gaming device via Bluetooth.

Using WalkOVR is similar to using five Vive Trackers at once.  It doesn't track locational changes but tracks positional changes of your ankles and knees. WalkOVR is compact, cost-efficient and designed for everyday games and apps.

Because Motion Capture Matters

In Locomotion, motion capture matters, because in contrast to a simple motion detection it brings more comfort in your gameplay. By tracking your body in real-time, determining the movement you do in your spot or in your play area eliminates unintentional movements and decreases your motion sickness. Plus, it may bring lower body usage in games such as VR Chat.

With simpler motion detection systems unexpected behaviors occur and VR users face a hard time in their play area which eventually may lead to motion sickness or dizziness.

However, although we encourage everybody to pledge for the standard WalkOVR; there may be some that still wants a simpler even basic locomotion solution. That's why we developed and released BASIC and LITE versions of WalkOVR. For those who want a simple solution for a lower price tag, here is our comparison chart between our products.

 

What is WalkOVR BASIC and LITE

WalkOVR BASIC and WalkOVR LITE are the newly released fully wireless but simplified version of WalkOVR. While WalkOVR has five nodes and uses motion capture system to track user movements properly, WalkOVR BASIC has only one WalkOVR node that you strap on your knee to get basic locomotion in VR games. On the other hand, WalkOVR LITE has two WalkOVR nodes, and provide better locomotion and room-scale usage than WalkOVR BASIC. However, both of them can't be compared to standard WalkOVR with respect to their features and potential. You can find more details in what's in the box section.

High performance, long gameplay. Strap and go.

WalkOVR is designed for gamers’ comfort and connects to your gaming rig via Bluetooth.  The setup is plug and play. It comes with straps for you to quickly and easily suit up. Unlike the other motion suits out there, you’re not required to wear tights or bulky suits. Just strap the nodes onto your chest, knees, and ankles, then move in your favorite VR game. 

 

 

WalkOVR also provides high performance with its RTOS implementation. In almost real-time, it quickly transfers your physical movements to your digital avatar. Since we know how important uninterrupted gameplay is, especially when it comes to virtual reality,  your gaming experience will be uninterrupted for up to four hours.

Get fit without trying 

How many times have you sat in the same position for hours and hours while playing a game? With WalkOVR, You can play your favorite games and stay active the entire time. Regular physical activity can give you more energy, help you lose weight, and even improve your sleep.

What if we would say you can literally walk up to 5.4 miles in Skyrim? Did you know that you can burn around 500 calories in ~100 minutes during your journey?

Keep using your play area and keep your natural posture 

Keep your natural posture while playing, plus, you’re still able to control your in-game avatar as you do.

You need to move with small steps in your play area right? You can still use your defined play area/guardian area with WalkOVR. So you can move just 20 inches in the virtual world and grab your weapon off the floor?

You can use your gameplay area as you do in your standard VR gaming while you are using WalkOVR

Willing to sit? Play seated as well 

You are a person willing to play your games seated? We have a solution for you too!

Here is a quick and short Pavlov VR gameplay video with WalkOVR while seated.

Seated gameplay 'may' be available through a enable/disable function on client interface. Still under development.
 

Ultimate compatibility 

WalkOVR is and will be, compatible with almost all locomotion supported SteamVR titles, such as Fallout 4, Doom VFR, Skyrim VR, and Onward. It’s also compatible with the top VR HMDs again through SteamVR or WalkOVR's keyboard & gamepad modes. Just check out the below diagram, it is easier to show than explaining it with words:

 

Suggested Bluetooth connectivity distance to your VR system is 3.3 meters (max).

and just a few examples of the Native VR as well as traditional games WalkOVR works with: 

WalkOVR's keyboard mode allows VR enthusiasts play classic games in 3D stereoscopic VR

 

That’s not all. WalkOVR has keyboard and gamepad modes as well! These modes not only allow it to be compatible with Oculus GO, GearVR, PSVR or Google Cardboard, they also enable it to support 3D stereoscopic modes of legendary games, such as Counter Strike Global Offensive, GTA V or Left 4 Dead. As you see a few examples above.

OVR Portal

OVR Portal is our client software that handles the integration of our system with SteamVR. It will recognize compatible games in your Steam library, will list them and will adjust the main configuration parameters of your game profile for each game. With its incorporated self-learning capacity, OVR Portal will even modify some parameters based on your in-game experience (development in progress).

OVR Portal will let you track your own activity as well. If you’re a gamer who wants to use VR solely for health or fitness purposes, then good news: you will be able to monitor your active time, how many miles you walked or ran, and even how many calories you burned during your gameplay. All such awesome features are in development.

Extendibility

WalkOVR is not designed only for today’s needs. We have your future needs in mind as well. There is a port on WalkOVR main node which is reserved for future use. We’re already hard at work on many add-ons and accessories to enhance your VR experience even more. Who know what will be the next after its development: Controllers for mobile VR? affordable haptic packs? one more set of WalkOVR nodes to make it full body motion suit in the future? or many other modules...

Decreased motion sickness

One of the main reasons motion sickness occurs is the lack of standard body motion during your in-game smooth movements. Your brain reacts with motion sickness while you are in a VR experience because it thinks there’s something wrong. It sees a moving environment but doesn’t feel movement in your muscular system. WalkOVR allows your brain to feel this movement and, as a result, greatly decreases the possibility of suffering from VR sickness.

 

 

Our beta testers rated their VR sickness level as a 2.9 out of 10 - This is a huge improvement over the average score of 7 out of 10. Are you sick of getting sick while playing VR games and need a cost-effective, feasible solution? WalkOVR is for you.

WalkOVR uses a set of motion nodes that continuously track users’ lower body movement in 3D space. Then, in just a few milliseconds, these nodes transmit their calculated positional data to the main processor unit and then to the OVR Client. Once this information is transmitted to the client through the Bluetooth communication, the OVR Portal application starts processing the incoming data and converts it to proper information that SteamVR understands. 

Our story started with developing our own omnidirectional treadmill, the more mechanical version of WalkOVR.

We’ve tested the compatibility of this version with almost all major VR headsets and many well known AAA VR games, like Arizona Sunshine, Fallout 4 VR, Skyrim VR, and Onward.

Our client application, OVR Portal is still under development and currently different than the mockups we shared above.

We need some further driver development and implementations for a few games to play with specific headsets since they use a different locomotion scheme with those headsets than the standard touch-based locomotion.

After the Kickstarter campaign success, we asked the enclosure design of WalkOVR and more than %70 of our backers wanted to get the fancy enclosure. In the past month, we’ve worked on renewing the design of the enclosures based on the improved hardware. Now, current backers will get the following enclosures since we are working on its molding design.

Beside the enclosures, we’ve worked on packaging as well. In the past month, after the Kickstarter, we’ve improved the durability and quality of the packaging of WalkOVR. 

We agreed with DHL for worldwide shipment.

More importantly, we produced a very limited number of WalkOVRs through the same process we will use for mass production. It was more expensive than standard prototype productions but it allowed us to see major problems right away. Currently, we have already fixed many problems that may cause delays in backer products. We have plan B for many occasions. Please see below as proof of that production:

pre-manufacturing samples' production, the current version is already improved than what you see here in this video

WalkOVR is a team of engineers, designers, and developers that met together with the dream of enhancing Virtual Reality since 2016. We started our journey to develop our own patented omnidirectional treadmill. During our beta tests, based on the feedback from fellow gamers, we decided to develop a wearable version of WalkOVR in 2018.

Until today, we developed and tested many prototypes to perfect the way we experience Virtual Reality and to enhance the way we play games. We are a team of gamers that develops for ourselves, and for all fellow gamers.

 

Developing hardware can be a complex process for many reasons: constraints with capital, limited technical and/or human resources, design and molding issues, etc. Thanks to our previous experience and current partners, we’ve successfully achieved many of these steps.

Now we’re at a stage where we need to polish most of the things we’ve done so far and we need to finish the development of client software for a smooth gamer experience–but to do that we have to be sure global gamers and the VR community truly believe in and seek solutions like WalkOVR.

Following a successful campaign, the funding we receive will be used for ordering materials, assembling the electronics, and facilitating the mass manufacturing of the entire product.

We are a startup dealing with hardware and software development and don’t have 'much' experience in manufacturing t-shirts and mugs. Therefore, we focused on delivering our product in the most affordable way with below rewards. 

We already achieved some certain milestones in the past and below features will be provided to our backers either at the time of shipping or after the shipping with respect to our development efforts.

Decoupling

Your movement direction will be your body direction as it is supposed to be.

Motion Capture in supported games

This is a hard task and we realized it is harder than we expected but many of you asked for it and we unlocked that during our previous campaign. This will take more time and resource. Mocap features won't be available until 2020, shipping your products are our earliest priority.

 

Extensions and Add-Ons

Besides, we have additional news for you. WalkOVR has an extension port on it. This is important because it will let you extend WalkOVR in the way you prefer. For example, our dream with WalkOVR is making it an affordable full body motion capture system, with 15 to 30 nodes. if you are an Indie developer you will be able to extend WalkOVR to 10 - 15 - 30 node motion capture system rather than its standard 5 node package; or if you are a fan of mobile VR you'll be able to connect WalkOVR controllers as you see above, under "Extendibility" section.

Deliver Our Message 

 

Special Thanks 

We want to give a special thanks to the gaming community on Facebook, Reddit, Twitter, especially to hundreds of individuals that tried WalkOVR in the past months, for their feedback and support.

We also want to thank MSI for all of the support, gaming and VR infrastructures they provided to us since the beginning. Special thanks also go out to all the great game companies and publishers for the games we mentioned here and for all the games we’ve played and loved during our lifetime. 

 

Liability disclaimer: the WalkOVR is not being developed by Valve® Corporation and/or any other valuable brands mentioned here on this page; it has no connection to Valve® or SteamTM or any other respective trademarks mentioned here.

Tax Disclaimer: WalkOVR is not responsible for any VAT, tariff, duty, taxes, handling fees, customs clearance charges, etc. required by your country for importing consumer goods. We do not collect this beforehand, and cannot give you an estimate of the cost. Charges may vary around the world.

WalkOVR prototypes since the beginningCurrent enclosures are re-designed upon request from our backers.WalkOVR is a team of engineers, designers, and developers that met together with the dream of enhancing Virtual Reality since 2016. We started our journey to develop our own patented omnidirectional treadmill. During our beta tests, based on the feedback from fellow gamers, we decided to develop a wearable version of WalkOVR in 2018.Until today, we developed and tested many prototypes to perfect the way we experience Virtual Reality and to enhance the way we play games. We are a team of gamers that develops for ourselves, and for all fellow gamers.  
Developing hardware can be a complex process for many reasons: constraints with capital, limited technical and/or human resources, design and molding issues, etc. Thanks to our previous experience and current partners, we’ve successfully achieved many of these steps.Now we’re at a stage where we need to polish most of the things we’ve done so far and we need to finish the development of client software for a smooth gamer experience–but to do that we have to be sure global gamers and the VR community truly believe in and seek solutions like WalkOVR.Following a successful campaign, the funding we receive will be used for ordering materials, assembling the electronics, and facilitating the mass manufacturing of the entire product.We are a startup dealing with hardware and software development and don’t have 'much' experience in manufacturing t-shirts and mugs. Therefore, we focused on delivering our product in the most affordable way with below rewards. 
We already achieved some certain milestones in the past and below features will be provided to our backers either at the time of shipping or after the shipping with respect to our development efforts.DecouplingYour movement direction will be your body direction as it is supposed to be.Motion Capture in supported gamesThis is a hard task and we realized it is harder than we expected but many of you asked for it and we unlocked that during our previous campaign. This will take more time and resource. Mocap features won't be available until 2020, shipping your products are our earliest priority. Extensions and Add-OnsBesides, we have additional news for you. WalkOVR has an extension port on it. This is important because it will let you extend WalkOVR in the way you prefer. For example, our dream with WalkOVR is making it an affordable full body motion capture system, with 15 to 30 nodes. if you are an Indie developer you will be able to extend WalkOVR to 10 - 15 - 30 node motion capture system rather than its standard 5 node package; or if you are a fan of mobile VR you'll be able to connect WalkOVR controllers as you see above, under "Extendibility" section.
Deliver Our Message  
Special Thanks We want to give a special thanks to the gaming community on Facebook, Reddit, Twitter, especially to hundreds of individuals that tried WalkOVR in the past months, for their feedback and support.We also want to thank MSI for all of the support, gaming and VR infrastructures they provided to us since the beginning. Special thanks also go out to all the great game companies and publishers for the games we mentioned here and for all the games we’ve played and loved during our lifetime.  Liability disclaimer: the WalkOVR is not being developed by Valve® Corporation and/or any other valuable brands mentioned here on this page; it has no connection to Valve® or SteamTM or any other respective trademarks mentioned here.Tax Disclaimer: WalkOVR is not responsible for any VAT, tariff, duty, taxes, handling fees, customs clearance charges, etc. required by your country for importing consumer goods. We do not collect this beforehand, and cannot give you an estimate of the cost. Charges may vary around the world.

story:
First, allow me to introduce myself


I am Jacco Jansen and I am the owner of myBad Studios.


I first started making games in 2008 and was, shall we say "discovered" right after the  incredible success of my first game, Shuriken Practice, for then Mac Dashboard platform. I have since been working as a freelance contractor while working as a full time middleware author.


All my time has been spent working on other people's projects or content for other people so whenever the young ones asked me "what games have you made?" I could never point them to anything that is still available... After the last time I had to explain to my niece how I am working in the games industry but don't have any games of mine to give her and watching the disappointment on her face, I decided it was time I got back into the game (pardon the pun) and got started working on the first of the series of games I had been planning on doing...


Game Overview

First of all, what is Undead Infestation?

Undead Infestation is a casual game that you can easily pick up and play for a few minutes at a time but it offers a clear progression and a goal to work towards. 

You play the game as a variety of unique, unlockable characters ranging from medieval knights and cybernetic enhanced samurai to SWAT and other soldiers. 

The story goes that the world has been infected with a virus of unknown origin and that virus keeps the dead alive with an insatiable appetite for living flesh. Unlike zombies, these creatures retain their mental abilities and agility so they are far more dangerous than your average zombie.

Gameplay

So how does this game work? The game was inspired by the classic Atari title Kaboom where you faced off against a mad bomber running along the top of the screen throwing bombs at an increasingly fast rate. Your goal was to catch the bombs before they could reach the bottom of the screen and if you missed 3 bombs, it was game over. 

It was a very simple premise but I used to play that game for hours on end and have hardly ever enjoyed a game that much since. This game is inspired by, but not going to merely be a clone of Kaboom. Gameplay also consists of zombies running around  the top of the screen, throwing or shooting various infected projectiles at you, requiring that you catch them before they infect whatever is behind you but in this game you will be able to also fight back! You get to play both offence and defence!

 
You will be presented with a range of characters you can unlock and each of them has a special ability, unique unto him or her. Some slow down time, making it easier to catch the stray projectiles while others destroy all the projectiles currently on the screen. Others attack the creature directly but with a very poor aiming system making contact unlikely. The payoff being that if you do make contact you instantly win either the round or the match, depending on the character.

The game does become harder as you progress through the enemies but the game can be completed using any one of the characters. Each character just changes the gameplay experience for you, making it more or less challenging than with another character.

Unlocking the next level is done by achieving a success rating of over 80% on the preceding level. Not as easy as it sounds but doable. On the earlier levels I make you work for it and on the later levels I lull you into a false sense of ease before I really make you work for it :D Unlocking a new character is achieved by completing certain levels with a 100% rating.


What I Need & What I still want to do


I currently have the game up and running but it needs to get rounded off. Right now all the characters use the same projectile, for instance. I need to create more custom and unique projectiles per character. Also, the player characters still need their animations for their special abilities... The game is in dire need of some extra music tracks and sound effects and some of the graphics could really do with an artist's touch...


As one of the perks I will make the beta version available on my website so you can start playing the game immediately. You will get to see the game progress from it's current working state to it's final release ready state... As a little side bonus, since the game is actually already using the live database it means that your scores will be saved to the actual high scores list and your scores will be the ones people see when they start playing the game :D But I digress...


Apart from the extra animations, audio and graphical retouches, another thing I still need are the various licenses to release this game onto the various stores: MacStore, AppStore and WindowsStore. I have also been testing the game out on the PS Vita and I plan on releasing it on there also, just so you know! :D


...and finally, I want to be able to add a few cinematic scenes before each battle and possibly as an end of game story telling what each character did after saving the world. I definitely want to add a story mode to the game to explain why you are battling. Why do most of the infected look like zombies while others look like real monsters? And how did that guy from medieval times get here? What in The World is going on here? What connections are there between these characters?

...read the story to find out.


Before and After

This is to show you the level of improvement this game has gone through already since I first started getting the basics of gameplay up and running to what it looks like now...

Before...

And after...

As you can see, the game has already undergone a huge transformation. It contains  6 complete, high quality levels with dynamic lighting as well as 7 enemy characters and 5 player characters upgraded from PS1 quality models to PS3 quality models and a very, very sorely needed GUI upgrade! :D


Stretch Goals


For my first stretch goal I would like to make the special abilities upgradable and thereby make the experience even more unique per character

For my second stretch goal, I would like to make the special abilities upgradable via collectables found inside a full 3D RPG style dungeon exploring system. There won't be any enemies to battle during these sections, though, so the challenge will be presented in the form of traps and time limits.

For the third stretch goal I want to add boss enemies you can battle in full RPG style to get your rewards.

Your contribution


All and all, what I need now is to add the polish that will make a working game feel complete and just... right. Right now it still feels amateur as it cuts from one scene to the next. With your help I can give this game the aesthetic look and feel it deserves and just improve on the entire experience from A to Z!




Other Ways You Can Help


If you want to help out with my campaign but cannot do so via a contribution, that is okay also! 


Please make use of the IndieGoGo share tools to spread the word about my project. Tell your friends, post of Facebook... anything you can do to help would be greaty appreciated :D


Thank you once again for looking at my project :D

Before...


And after...

story:
ebay Purchase link：click here

 

The Aixmeet Case is the ultimate way to protect your Nintendo Switch! Encasing both your Nintendo Switch and Joy-Cons, it solves the biggest annoyance of current cases - not addressing the Switch as three separate parts. With the Aixmeet you can detach your Joy-Cons without removing the case and exposing your Nintendo Switch, so you can play with your friends safely. The case is totally enclosed in a high-grade TPU shell making it dust, splash and drop-proof while keeping it ergonomic and comfortable to grip. And it comes with 2 solid kickstands so you can set it up anywhere.

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

The Aixmeet Case encases both your Nintendo Switch Joy-Cons and allows you to detach them for play whenever you need to without any hassle, so when you want to play with a friend there is no removal of the case to get to the Joy-Cons. 

Don’t just keep your Switch protected, protect your controllers as well.

The Aixmeet arrives with 2 solid kick-stands on the back of the case to keep the console upright anywhere while you game away. Trust it to stay upright everywhere you find yourself, from the the coffee shop table to the airplane tray.

Protecting your Nintendo Switch fully is exactly what the Aixmeet does by fully enclosing it in a high-grade TPU plastic shell to protect both your console and your Joy-Cons.

Built to be ergonomic and comfortable to grip so you can game for hours without your hands becoming tired!

Using high-grade environmentally friendly thermoplastic polyurethane, the Aixmeet is dirt-proof, splash-proof and drop-proof while also protecting against scratches to keep your Switch in perfect condition. Never worry about your kids dropping their Nintendo Switches and breaking them ever again!
 

The Durability of TPU

The Thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU)  Aixmeet uses provides high tension, high tensile strength, toughness, is an environmentally-friendly material, and is skin friendly. 

The Aixmeet is extremely easy to put on your Nintendo Switch and to remove, taking only ONE second to take the Aixmeet protective case off, and you won't have to remove the Joy-Con's case off to do it! This also makes it extremely easy to dock while keeping your Joy-Cons protected.

 

 

 



Aixmeet is currently in it's Pre-Production phase.
And thanks to our manufacturing partners we will be able to manufacture the first 1000 cases and ship them immediately after the campaign concludes. We will then kick off into our full-production run to deliver every case to our remaining backers!

story:
Lost in the realm of Gods and spirits, where dreams are the fabric of reality and souls are reborn. On the path to reincarnation, souls must shed their worldly memories. But you have refused to give up your past; a kindred spirit has ignited a flame inside of you...

Evergate is an expansive 2D puzzle-platformer featuring a unique align-to-shoot mechanic. Unleash your Soulflame and harness energy trapped within crystals to solve puzzles, find lost memories, and save your kindred spirit.

Windows DRM-Free Evergate Demo

Want to talk about the demo or chat with others playing? Have questions? We've set up a Discord server here for everyone in the community! 

  •  A HEARTWARMING EPIC spanning life & death and space & time 
  •  100+ PUZZLES with open-ended solutions
  •  10+ CRYSTALS with unique powers that can be creatively combined 
  •  MYTHICAL AFTERLIFE steeped in lore
  •  COLOSSAL BATTLES against the Gods and nightmares come to life
  •  HAND-DRAWN ARTWORK creates wonder in every moment 
  •  RICH SOUNDTRACK evokes the magic of Ki's journey

Legend tells that the Gods forge each soul's heart—its flame—from the ancient power of the Source. But it's the unique connection to your kindred spirit that has ignited your Soulflame and awakened the Source inside you.

Align crystals between you and the Source and fire your Soulflame to unleash their extraordinary powers. Use these powers to reach the unreachable, confront your foes, and banish the nightmares of your past back to the shadows.

There are more than 10 different types of crystals, each with a unique ability. Combine multiple crystals for even greater effect.

The swap crystal exchanges you with the Source you were targeting. Time slows down while you're aiming so you can precisely line up your shot.

The boost crystal sends a shockwave along your Soulflame, propelling you in the opposite direction.

The death crystal sends a destructive wave down your Soulflame, destroying the first objects in its path—even if that's you.

Evergate blends cerebral puzzles with skill-based execution. The goal of each puzzle is to reach the gate at the end however you can. Some players may opt for a straightforward route while others will strive for the more difficult complete solution using every crystal. This offers challenges for casual and hardcore gamers alike.

All of Evergate's puzzles are open-ended. These creative playgrounds encourage experimentation and embrace a spirit of trial and error. Messed up your jump? See a more fun solution? Hold the reset button to quickly try a new approach.

A second player can control Ki's spiritual guide. Friends and family can join Ki on her adventure and work through the puzzles alongside you.

The Gods have scattered your memories and taken your kindred spirit deep into the heart of the Afterlife. Search for your memories and reclaim what was lost.

The Afterlife is full of fantasies and dangers arranged into unique domains, each ruled by a deity. You'll explore four of these domains and their native crystals. As you recollect your memories, you unlock new crystals and areas to explore.

Your scattered memories have torn rifts in the fabric of time & space. The Source has brought your nightmares to life and they are bleeding into this reality. Enter the portals to your past and solve the tangled puzzles within. Traverse surreal dreamscapes and reach the gate at the end to recollect your memories. 

 

While the Source fuels your Soulflame, it is not yours alone. It breathes life into fantastical flora and wondrous creatures. Yet in the shadows, untold nightmares feed off its power and grow... 

Even your recollections are not safe from its ancient energy. Your childhood fears have been brought to life by the Source. To recover your memories, you must first overcome your demons.

But brandishing your Soulflame invites unwanted attention. The deities who maintain the natural order and wield celestial abilities stand in your way. On your quest to find your kindred spirit and reclaim your memories, you must confront these massive, stage-sized deities. 

Sweet Swag!

As a thank you for supporting Ki on her journey, we've assembled a sweet set of swag so you can follow alongside her: 

 

Evergate is a passion project for us, a game made with all our hearts. We are in love with its story, world, and characters, and we can't wait to share it all with you. But we need your help to get there!

As our ambitions for Evergate have expanded, we have realized we need more resources to bring it to life. For the past three years, we've been developing Evergate in our spare time and self-funding the production. By backing us, you will allow our small team to:

  • Accelerate our release date by over a year
  • Hire additional developers, artists, and sound designers
  • Release on additional platforms
  • And much more!

Curious about the gameplay mechanics of Evergate? Wondering about who exactly the developers are? Want to know why the heck we want to make this game? Well, all of those questions (and more!), are answered in our "Behind The Afterlife" video.

 

Stone Lantern Games is a budding indie game studio founded by 4 MIT graduates. Like creating a character in an RPG, each engineer has a specialty: Narrative, Visual Effects, Art or Music.

Kent - Lead

After finishing Elder Scrolls: Oblivion in two sleepless weeks, Kent emerged from the basement of his childhood home with a desire to create an epic story of his own. He began his own journey by learning to code and how to tell stories. While building software for robots, Kent invited his friends from MIT on the chase for that dream—of bringing an entire world to life in a video game.

Ariel - Architect

Ariel's passion for game development began at the early age of 7. His favorite games would often inspire thoughts of new abilities, units, and world lore to enrich the experience. This ongoing desire to tweak existing games evolved into a life long trend of making strange and experimental game fragments. Studying computer science and physics in college have honed Ariel's talents at building procedural animations and interactive media. Kent has concisely summarized him as "a true painter of numbers, with a vast collection of formulas ready to craft any moment."

Cynthia - Artist

Cynthia is the visual mastermind behind the beautiful world of Evergate. She also happens to be an MIT-educated electrical engineer. When she's not showcasing her art, she might be building destructive robots with her Battlebots team or cosplaying as her favorite characters from Overwatch. 

M. R. Miller - Composer

M.R. was inspired by games like Final Fantasy 7 and Sonic the Hedgehog to become both a composer and a software engineer. He likes mashups of the two disciplines, e.g. he once programmed dancing robots for an opera for the Prince of Monaco. These days, he works on his own music (Planet Diver, Slime-san) and alongside other composers on films (Power Rangers, Fate of the Furious) and games (ABZÛ, Pode).

Evergate is currently under active development. We've shown off early versions to convention-goers at PAX East & West, Boston FIG, and elsewhere. The reception has been overwhelmingly positive: Evergate was selected for PAX Rising; won the Audience Choice award at BFIG; and was nominated for The 2018 Bit Award's Game of the Year and Best Style.

This is our first game so we have and will continue to face new challenges. But at this point, we've laid a solid technical foundation and created all the building blocks we need to construct the final game. The first divine domain is done, but there are still three more to go, as well as the mind-warping finale! There's still tons of work ahead, like console ports, testing, and the full soundtrack.

Not one of us questions whether the game *will* happen, only *when*. We are all thoroughly committed to the project and have been for three years already.

Our biggest shortfall right now is time. A successful Kickstarter will afford us more time to work on the game as well as additional personnel. With the proper resources, we are aiming to launch Evergate in November 2019.

As we progress towards launch, we plan to keep the Kickstarter community appraised of our progress with frequent, regular status updates. Keep us honest and follow along as we code the game, create its artwork, and compose its music.

Making a game is hard, but we're a driven, passionate team. Our time at MIT and as engineers in the real world have given us the skills needed to make Evergate a reality. And with your help, together we can bring this dream to life.

As you recollect your memories, you unlock new crystals and areas to explore.Your scattered memories have torn rifts in the fabric of time & space. The Source has brought your nightmares to life and they are bleeding into this reality. Enter the portals to your past and solve the tangled puzzles within. Traverse surreal dreamscapes and reach the gate at the end to recollect your memories.  While the Source fuels your Soulflame, it is not yours alone. It breathes life into fantastical flora and wondrous creatures. Yet in the shadows, untold nightmares feed off its power and grow... Even your recollections are not safe from its ancient energy. Your childhood fears have been brought to life by the Source. To recover your memories, you must first overcome your demons.But brandishing your Soulflame invites unwanted attention. The deities who maintain the natural order and wield celestial abilities stand in your way. On your quest to find your kindred spirit and reclaim your memories, you must confront these massive, stage-sized deities. Sweet Swag!As a thank you for supporting Ki on her journey, we've assembled a sweet set of swag so you can follow alongside her:  Evergate is a passion project for us, a game made with all our hearts. We are in love with its story, world, and characters, and we can't wait to share it all with you. But we need your help to get there!As our ambitions for Evergate have expanded, we have realized we need more resources to bring it to life. For the past three years, we've been developing Evergate in our spare time and self-funding the production. By backing us, you will allow our small team to:
Accelerate our release date by over a year
Hire additional developers, artists, and sound designers
Release on additional platforms
And much more!
Curious about the gameplay mechanics of Evergate? Wondering about who exactly the developers are? Want to know why the heck we want to make this game? Well, all of those questions (and more!), are answered in our "Behind The Afterlife" video. Stone Lantern Games is a budding indie game studio founded by 4 MIT graduates. Like creating a character in an RPG, each engineer has a specialty: Narrative, Visual Effects, Art or Music.Kent - LeadAfter finishing Elder Scrolls: Oblivion in two sleepless weeks, Kent emerged from the basement of his childhood home with a desire to create an epic story of his own. He began his own journey by learning to code and how to tell stories. While building software for robots, Kent invited his friends from MIT on the chase for that dream—of bringing an entire world to life in a video game.Ariel - ArchitectAriel's passion for game development began at the early age of 7. His favorite games would often inspire thoughts of new abilities, units, and world lore to enrich the experience. This ongoing desire to tweak existing games evolved into a life long trend of making strange and experimental game fragments. Studying computer science and physics in college have honed Ariel's talents at building procedural animations and interactive media. Kent has concisely summarized him as "a true painter of numbers, with a vast collection of formulas ready to craft any moment."Cynthia - ArtistCynthia is the visual mastermind behind the beautiful world of Evergate. She also happens to be an MIT-educated electrical engineer. When she's not showcasing her art, she might be building destructive robots with her Battlebots team or cosplaying as her favorite characters from Overwatch. M. R. Miller - ComposerM.R. was inspired by games like Final Fantasy 7 and Sonic the Hedgehog to become both a composer and a software engineer. He likes mashups of the two disciplines, e.g. he once programmed dancing robots for an opera for the Prince of Monaco. These days, he works on his own music (Planet Diver, Slime-san) and alongside other composers on films (Power Rangers, Fate of the Furious) and games (ABZÛ, Pode).Evergate is currently under active development. We've shown off early versions to convention-goers at PAX East & West, Boston FIG, and elsewhere. The reception has been overwhelmingly positive: Evergate was selected for PAX Rising; won the Audience Choice award at BFIG; and was nominated for The 2018 Bit Award's Game of the Year and Best Style.This is our first game so we have and will continue to face new challenges. But at this point, we've laid a solid technical foundation and created all the building blocks we need to construct the final game. The first divine domain is done, but there are still three more to go, as well as the mind-warping finale! There's still tons of work ahead, like console ports, testing, and the full soundtrack.Not one of us questions whether the game *will* happen, only *when*. We are all thoroughly committed to the project and have been for three years already.Our biggest shortfall right now is time. A successful Kickstarter will afford us more time to work on the game as well as additional personnel. With the proper resources, we are aiming to launch Evergate in November 2019.As we progress towards launch, we plan to keep the Kickstarter community appraised of our progress with frequent, regular status updates. Keep us honest and follow along as we code the game, create its artwork, and compose its music.Making a game is hard, but we're a driven, passionate team. Our time at MIT and as engineers in the real world have given us the skills needed to make Evergate a reality. And with your help, together we can bring this dream to life.

story:
The great guys at Feldherr have chipped in with 5 of their brilliant back packs, these are available in a limited perk.

Well they went in no time at all, but don't worry you can pick yours up direct from Feldherr here.

STRETCH GOALS

Stretch goal 4 (Upto $30,000)

So every backer will receive a voucher discount code after the campaign BUT the value will be as follows -

$26,000 - 5%

$27,000 - 10%

$28,000 - 15%

$29,000 - 20%

$30,000 - 25%

This will be off of advertised RRP in the GCT Studios web store and cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer/voucher code/store credit etc.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stretch goal 3 ($25,000 MET)

If we hit $25,000 We will -

1. Release Akimoto at the launch of the Ito

2. Give everybody donating $100 or more Akimoto for free!

How can we get there?

  • See if there's any perks you'd like to upgrade to.
  • Phone a friend, tell them about the FREE models at $15,000 AND $20,000 AND $25,000
  • Click the share buttons on this page.
  • Post the following on any websites you use -

Check out Bushido's Indiegogo campaign; indiegogo.com/bushido

@ $25,000 The 'I want I-TWO' Perk ($100) gets you -

13-15 models AND (6) Ito faction dice AND Free worldwide shipping.

OR

14-16 models AND Free worldwide shipping.

It's a brilliant deal (THAT JUST GOT BETTER)!!!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stretch goal 2 ($20,000 MET)

If we hit $20,000 We will -

1. Release Ayako Ito at the launch of the Ito

2. Give everybody donating $100 or more a choice of;

FREE Ito Faction Dice (6).

Or

FREE Satoshi model.

How can we get there?

  • See if there's any perks you'd like to upgrade to.
  • Phone a friend, tell them about the FREE models at $15,000 and $20,000
  • Click the share buttons on this page.
  • Post the following on any websites you use -

Check out Bushido's Indiegogo campaign; indiegogo.com/bushido

@ $20,000 The 'I want I-TWO' Perk ($100) gets you -

12-14 models AND (6) Ito faction dice AND Free worldwide shipping.

OR

13-15 models AND Free worldwide shipping.

It's a brilliant deal!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stretch goal 1 ($15,000 MET)

$15,000 We made it!!! What does it mean?

  • Everyone that signs up for an Ito starter set will receive Itsunagi for FREE.
  • Satoshi will be available at the launch of the Ito.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome, here's a quick intro...

GCT Studios launched Bushido last year and we have had an excellent time sharing our world with you. Bushido is a table-top, 32mm miniatures, Oriental Fantasy, skirmish game, where fast and brutal gameplay combine with real strategic depth.

We launched with four factions and grand plans to release more and really fill out the Jwar Isles. Now we have concepted the next faction and our excitement levels have risen to the point that we want to share it with you NOW... And that's where you come in, we need your support to get this off the concept table and released sooner.

With your help the Ito will come to life and leave their island. You can cause the Prefecture of Ryu yet another setback as their uneasy alliance with the Ito comes crashing to an end, the upper echelons of the Takashi clan's fears of an attack from across the Silver Strait finally realised. 

You can help us to allow the Ito to finally shed their veil of deceipt and reveal their true nature to world.

Why we need your help...

Because we are brimming with so many ideas, so many cool areas of the Jwar Isles are still to be explored. So many factions are yet to mobilise their forces in the fight for the future of the Jwar Isles. Your help means we can realise this sooner, starting with the Ito.

What exactly will we do...

The goal we have set will allow us to continue working with some of the best sculptors in the world to create the starter set for the Ito faction. This will consist of five finely sculpted miniatures and their associated high quality game cards.

Want to see the concepts for the five models?

There you go...

We hope you are as excited as we are about the possible emergence of the Ito. Thanks in advance for all your help. Don't forget everything from a link on a blog to a like on Facebook will help us reach this goal. If you like what you see and want to help you can use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.

What if we exceed the total?

We really don't want to tempt fate but there are a huge number of ways in which passing the goal could help fund more Bushido goodness. More Ito models for one thing to get that list building element from the outset. Tokens for all that Ki and so on. A glossy rulebook packed full of art and stories to really bring Jwar to life. More factions, exploring the myths and legends of the orient and asia, the list is endless!!!  

Thanks in advance for any help you can give...

(If there's a special way you'd like to be involved in the campaign missed by our perks, please feel free to add or contact us with your suggestions)

story:
Hey everyone

My name is Gee, I'm a gamer and love FPS game so much. I played a lot of FPS game but I'm still never played Counter Stirke Global Offensive, The new Counter Strike game. So I need a little help to buy this game.

Thank you in advance.

story:
Don't forget to check our updates!

After our previous successful crowdfunder,
the Mamut Skulls protection set ( LINK ) for the Vive,
we felt that we needed to branch out to the rest of the VR scene.
This in turn led to the Mamut Gun Stock that is currently in production,
available for both Vive and Rift users. ( LINK )

While play testing our gunstock for the Rift it was obvious
that the controllers lacked in comfort and it was difficult to keep a firm, 
secure grip for an extended amount of playtime.

We call our solution to this problem "Touch Grip". 
An injection molded TPU (Thermo Poly Urethane) base that builds
length and girth to the handle while also keeping it in securely in 
place with adjustable straps. Twist it around in 3D.

Extended grip

Room for your little finger, help to actually grasp
the controller without pressing buttons.



Extra securing

Original strap helps secure the Grip.
No need to dismount the strap.
(Updated, check updates.)
 


Grith / Ventilation

Adds friction against your palm while
keeping your hand cool.



Securing straps

Round woven, cotton filled flexible strap.
Comfortable and adjustable, easy fit for any hand.




Large fastener

Easy to find while in VR
​(Updated, check updates.)




Easy mount / dismount

Mounting - 
Press the controller down the cup, friction will do the rest.
Dismounting - 
Just pull the controller out.
​(Updated, check updates.)



Technical details, per piece:
Material: TPU (Thermo Poly Urethane)
Size: 130x45x40mm / ~5.1x1.8x1.6in
Weight: ~25grams / ~0.88oz

Get yourself a set, shipped World Wide for free!

Shipping planned in June.

All prototyping and schematics for production is already complete, 
the only thing that's left is help with funding for the injection mold.

Touch controllers not included.

story:
What is EventingStar! ?

EventingStar! is a new take on a dedicated discipline sim horse game - taking realistic aspects of both farm management, horse breeding/training, and the actual three day eventing competition world, we are hoping to produce one of the most realistic - but fun! - dedicated discipline sims to date.

EventingStar! (aka ES!) is also aiming to bridge the gap between the sim game industry and the actual horse industry - we are hoping to bring actual products and services, as well as events, on board as sponsors in order to increase the audience and popularity of the MMOSIM. Eventing is an incredibly popular sport internationally, and we are hoping to bring an entirely new audience into sim, as well as supporting current players!

Planned Features

  • Bring your horses up from the bottom levels of eventing up to CCI**** competition
  • Choose the country you’d like to represent, and build your farm there; compete within your local area before moving on to bigger, more exciting venues.
  • Build your farm from the bottom up; start with a small set of land and a small facility, and add more to your stable as you gain money and experience.
  • Train train train! Condition your horses with a variety of training methods for all three phases of an event.
  • Gain notoriety as a trainer, and rider, on the international circuit. The more horses you get to the top levels, the easier it is to train for yourself and others, and the more sought-out you will become as a trainer.
  • Travel all over the world, competing in top international events (but remember, travel isn’t cheap! Especially with horses in tow).
  • Breed horses for a variety of colours and patterns, or just breed for top performance!
  • Realistic limits for horses; not all are capable of reaching the top levels!
  • Realistic injury stats, and stable management.
  • Manage your farm wisely, choosing the feed, hay, bedding, and practices for each.
  • Compete throughout the EventingStar calendar year, and choose your schedule.
  • Register yourself with the Equine Federation and compete internationally!
  • Human avatars to dress in a variety of different outfits - show your style!
  • Tack up your horses in the appropriate equipment, featuring recognized and well-loved brands!

Why We Need Your Help!

Planning, developing, and launching a SIM game takes a lot of time, effort, and expenses. Our goals are to have a playable Alpha game by November 2014 - in order to do this, we will need to bring on additional programmers, artists, and pay for other costs such as servers, domains, and advertising. Currently, we are developing EventingStar! on a testing server, but would benefit from more dedicated space.

In short, we need your help to assist us with the following aspects of the game:

  • Hiring of additional programmers and artists (This is our biggest expense!)
  • Servers & domain name costs
  • Advertising and branding materials

What Do You Get for Helping?

Contributing to our IndieGoGo campaign not only gets you an Alpha account and gives you early access to the game before anyone else, but it also unlocks features only available to IndieGoGo campaign contributors! Earn special rare items for your horses, farm, and human avatar, as well as unlocking other features to make your gameplay experience even better right out of the start box!

    Who is Behind EventingStar! ?

    EventingStar! is a combined project of two experienced sim players, managers, and owners. Our lead developer/programmer, Apex, is not only experienced in web design and development, but is also a branding expert and eventing enthusiast. Our artist, Kitei, has been working actively in the sim industry for many years and has produced a portfolio of incredibly beautiful artwork. 

    What Has Already Been Done?

    • Planning and compilation of information required for horses, competitions, and general game mechanics.
    • Layout and branding
    • Some page designs
    • Some artwork: Horses, some tack, and the town map
    • Development has begun on a testing server

      Risks & Challenges

      There are always risks in developing these types of games - whether it be financial lock up, business and other commitments for staff and developers, or other potential road blocks, things happen. That's why its been so important for us to really heavily plan this game from the get-go; we've got a massive planning document filled with all of our ideas, programming outlines, and to-do lists. With these, its hard to get off track, and its easy to plow through any challenges that meet us. This game has been in the planning stages for upwards of four months, and we feel that we are now ready to move on to the next stage - development! 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you can't help with a financial contribution to our campaign, share it with others! We appreciate your support :)

With these, its hard to get off track, and its easy to plow through any challenges that meet us. This game has been in the planning stages for upwards of four months, and we feel that we are now ready to move on to the next stage - development!

story:
THE REAL GAME

This will be free online game on either your phone or in your browser.

You challenge your friends to complete hilarious actions (wax their legs, cover themselves with honey, or dress as a wizard) and they have to respond with photographic proof, pics or it didn't happen

We built this interactive friend to friend game and we want to get in the hands of our friends, like you. This game is about adolescent and adult psychological play that enhances friendships, trust and fun. Our challenges can be embarrassing, gross and even crude but they are never offensive. 

The system enhances play to encourage interactivity, deeper connections and fun memorable experiences with your friends. The game has a lot of surprises and challenges that will stretch the elasticity of friendships and build stronger bonds. The game is all around fun, appeals to your ego and helps players reconnect. 

A few sample challenges

That ain’t countrytime: Spill water or other liquid on yourself so it looks as though you have lost control of your bladder and walk in public. 

Wingardium levi oh-no: Dress up like a wizard and cast spells on random strangers. 

Rip it: Wax a strip of hair off of your body. 

THE REAL PLAN 

The game is nearing the end of development. Portions of the game is in testing while cross platform integration is just starting. We want to make the game accessible by all online means. By phone, By tablet, By computer, By social networks, By SMS Text and any future means. 

So here is our Release Plan outline. (Subject to Change) 

  - Website ready for beta testing by October 1st

 - Mobile Versions ready for beta testing by October 15th 

 - Limited Beta testing release November 1st

 - Sneak Peak Player Release December 1st 

 - Public Release (1.0) December 25th 

To accomplish this plan we need a few things. 

 - Two additional UI Designers (part-time) 

 - One Usability Testing Coordinator (contractor) 

 - One iOS UI Designer (contractor) 

 - Additional Office Space & Equipment 

 - Azure Infrastructure Specialist (Advisor) 

 - Sponsors 

In return, 

With your contributions we will hire additional staff, rent addition office space & equipment and contract specialized talent who will make this Game spectacular, user friendly and fun. In addition we will be able to effectively promote and launch the game. 

Join us today – together we will succeed.

We built this interactive friend to friend game and we want to get in the hands of our friends, like you. This game is about adolescent and adult psychological play that enhances friendships, trust and fun. Our challenges can be embarrassing, gross and even crude but they are never offensive. 
The system enhances play to encourage interactivity, deeper connections and fun memorable experiences with your friends. The game has a lot of surprises and challenges that will stretch the elasticity of friendships and build stronger bonds. The game is all around fun, appeals to your ego and helps players reconnect. 
A few sample challenges
That ain’t countrytime: Spill water or other liquid on yourself so it looks as though you have lost control of your bladder and walk in public. 
Wingardium levi oh-no: Dress up like a wizard and cast spells on random strangers. 
Rip it: Wax a strip of hair off of your body. 
THE REAL PLAN 
The game is nearing the end of development. Portions of the game is in testing while cross platform integration is just starting. We want to make the game accessible by all online means. By phone, By tablet, By computer, By social networks, By SMS Text and any future means. 
So here is our Release Plan outline. (Subject to Change) 
  - Website ready for beta testing by October 1st
 - Mobile Versions ready for beta testing by October 15th 
 - Limited Beta testing release November 1st
 - Sneak Peak Player Release December 1st 
 - Public Release (1.0) December 25th 
To accomplish this plan we need a few things. 
 - Two additional UI Designers (part-time) 
 - One Usability Testing Coordinator (contractor) 
 - One iOS UI Designer (contractor) 
 - Additional Office Space & Equipment 
 - Azure Infrastructure Specialist (Advisor) 
 - Sponsors 
In return, 
With your contributions we will hire additional staff, rent addition office space & equipment and contract specialized talent who will make this Game spectacular, user friendly and fun. In addition we will be able to effectively promote and launch the game. 
Join us today – together we will succeed.

Twiiter: https://twitter.com/EmpromGame

Official site: http://www.emprom.net

story:
Welcome to Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign for Generals' Order (GO), a strategy card game by Strategy Entertainment Pte Ltd from Singapore!

Generals' Order is a game that simulates ancient Chinese warfare that combines Wisdom (devising strategies), Courage (deploying generals) and Calculation (resource management). 

We will hope you like this campaign and help us to reach our goals by supporting and sharing this campaign.


Eight years ago, three good friends who are veteran TCG players decided to venture into a crazy yet daring business - pooling their savings to develop an unique card game – one that is different from the run-of-the-mill TCG and something fun that will entice people to give it a try!

It was a daunting and challenging task. Firstly, they are up against several established TCGs already in the market. Secondly, they had limited funds to develop an extensive production. Most importantly, developing a card game in Chinese is definitely a huge risk but one that they were determined to give it a shot.

“We are fans of many TCGs but there is not one that really simulates realistic ancient Chinese warfare. We need a game where there are real consequences: characters who are killed will not appear again. We know soldiers have to move in order to attack their enemy and real army will require supplies. No other TCGs incorporated this rules and design of their games. We want to be the first to do it.” 

And so, the creators began their journey – developing the game mechanism, the characters and their features, as well as getting the artworks ready. After nearly two years of preparation, Generals' Order, a Chinese strategy card game based on the popular Chinese novel ‘Romance of the three kingdoms’, is finally ready for launch.

In 2007, a new company, Strategy Entertainment Pte Ltd was inaugurated.

Strategy Entertainment has been producing Generals' Order since 2007. Locally, we have amassed a strong player base of thousands, and have released multiple expansion sets of cards. We have received many requests from our international fans to produce an English version of our game. After going through detailed planning, we decided to use Indiegogo as a platform to jump start this campaign.

Generals' Order showcases a wide variety of art styles, ranging from anime illustration to realistic painting. Some of the artists who had illustated our cards include, Stanley Lau, Lennart, Jason Lan among many other talented artists.

Stanley Lau, better known for Artgerm, is a world acclaimed artist from Imaginary Friends Studio. His portfolio includes exquisite artworks for Capcom, DC Comics, Square Enix, Riot Games and other giants in the entertainment and gaming industry. 

Lennart Tsen, a.k.a illuminus, is a prolific Generals' Order artist who is distinguished for his anime artistic flair. Lennart's artworks are featured in many of our Ultrapro products.

Jason Lan, is responsible for drawing most of our realistic-style artworks. Jason has produced works for Applibot Inc., Paizo Publishing, Fantasy Flight Games and other game studios.


Regardless of whether you decide to back our campaign or not, we welcome you to our Facebook page and throw us a 'Like' if you will.


Our target is to raise $3,000 USD. We have outlined the production schedule and your contributions will help us bring this game to our English speaking fans. With this amount, we can produce a new English version set, Rise of The Kings (ROTK) based on our existing cards and re-illustrate some of our existing artworks.

By translating our game to English, we believe more people will come to know and play our game.

We are constantly striving to improve every aspect of our game. Not just the gameplay but we also want our cards to be more aesthetically appealing.  If we are able to reach and exceed our goal, we can get more excellent artists to re-illustrate our cards.


Why Indiegogo? Because the people in Indiegogo love cool games!

Your funding will enable us to translate the cards in our basic set and game instructions to English. It will also be used to enhance the current artworks, develop the art files for printing, as well as the printing and shipping of the decks and promotion cards.

After this Indiegogo campaign, this game set will only be available at market standard retail price (MSRP). By backing this campaign, you can get yours first with Indiegogo exclusive items, awesome accessories at a significant discount now (20-40% off MSRP).  You can also get it first before it is at the retail shops and receive reward items like exclusive limited edition promotion cards (e.g. 5 Elite Generals) which will not be available post-Indiegogo. 

Click the following to see the detailed description of the promotion cards.



If you are a military warfare enthusiast, loves Chinese history or enjoy scheming against your rival, then Generals' Order is a game for you.

Generals' Order is a strategy card game that was developed based on ancient Chinese history and the Chinese classic novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

This game is recommended for 2 players and each round lasts around 15 to 30 minutes. Each player will required a deck of 40 - 60 cards to play.

This English version set, GO:Rise of the Kings can be played separately or used together with the Generals' Order Chinese version Expansion sets.

In this game, you take on the role of a Warlord during the Late Han Dynasty and will have to defeat anyone who stands in your way. With hundreds of generals, advisors, weapons and troops at your disposal, you can build your ultimate deck and conquer your rivals!

We have put in tremendous work in improving the game. With many years of experience and feedback from our existing players, we guarantee you a deep and balanced strategy card gaming experience!

KEY FEATURES:

  • Unique card manoeuvring system. With the 4-zone battle map, players will need to fight for positions to gain the upper hand. Unlike many TCGs in the market, Generals’ Order offers players to move their troops around the battle map. You can choose to lay siege on enemy’s fortress or feign retreat and ambush your enemy.


  • Affiliation and upkeep. Do you want to take advantage of the affiliation bonus to rush out your troops or balance your resources to offset your upkeep? Affiliation bonus allows you to recruit generals of the same faction with less cost; giving you the upper-hand to overwhelm your opponent. To portray a more realistic battle, we have an Upkeep system that requires players to "feed" their army at the end of every turn. 


  • 8 factions from the Three Kingdoms era to choose from.  Each faction is designed to cater to different play styles. For example, Wei is suitable for the aggressive player but if you are a defensive player, Wu might be your favorite choice.



Click on the video to learn how to play our game.




There are four main types of cards in Generals' Order Card Game namely Character, Strategy, Equipment and Counter cards.

They are the military units who are mostly generals under your command. While many of them are veteran fighters or strategists, there are some who possess special skills that are beyond your imagination!

Your generals and strategists play a critical role in Generals' Order. They are used to attack your opponent, lay siege and defend your fortress.

All generals have three values - Recruitment cost, Might and Wits. 

Attack damages are based mainly on Might while Intelligence is useful for executing powerful tactics.


They are tactics which you can deploy to gain advantage when the opportunity arises!

[Strategy] Cards are usually used by high Intelligence [Character]. Surprise your opponent with "Traps" and "Ambush" or confuse your opponent's generals with "Forged Order". Most [Strategy] Cards require execution cost so craft your plan carefully.


There are 2 types of [Equipment] cards, [Troop] card and [Armament] card. They help to strengthen your [Character] cards and their effect last throughout the game. 

Some examples of [Troop] cards are Elephant Troops, Heavy Cavalry and many more. These specialized troops strengthen your [Character]s, with some that even offer special ability.

Under [Armament], you can find historical treasures found during "Three Kingdoms" era, such as Guan Yu's Green Dragon Crescent Blade and Lu Bu's Red Hare. Every [Armament] is unique. This means if a [Armament] is equipped by one of your generals, it cannot be equipped by your other generals.


They are the only type of cards that can nullify certain actions made by your opponent. This gives you an opportunity to turn the tide! Keep these to protect your generals from opponent's scheme.





FINAL THANKS

We are extremely grateful for your time, pledges and your sharing of this campaign! We are definitely looking forward to deliver our product and rewards to you. 

 


Will there be more English version of Generals' Order in future?
It will depend on the response we get from this campaign. We definitely would like to produce more English version of our game.

Are we allowed to mix both Chinese and English version cards during gameplay?
Yes.

How do we get the Chinese version of Generals' Order Card Game?
Selected Generals' Order products in Chinese version are available at our Facebook online store. 

Will there be a digital version of Generals' Order Card Game in future?
We are looking into it but it will depend on our players' response. 

Will the cards be of standard size? I want them to fit into card sleeves for protection?
Yes. Our cards come in the standard size of 3.48"by 2.49".

How is the shipping cost handled?
Shipping to Singapore addresses is included in perk prices. International Backer will need to add an additional 18 USD to cover the overseas shipping cost.


To learn more about us, please feel free to visit our official website below.

story:
This event and campaign will help raise much needed funds, awareness and resources for those affected by the superstorm, and we are asking for YOUR HELP.

Let's get our love to the East Coast from the West Coast!

THE STORY

STiKS GAMING was created to help raise money for worthy causes by creating unique interactions between celebrities and their fans through gaming. After the horrific effects of Hurricane Sandy devastated the East coast, we knew we had to contribute. So we decided to reach out to everyone we know to help us design the 1st annual STiKS ARCADE Gaming Gala, an amazing night of gaming, music and entertainment to benefit Hurricane Sandy Relief Efforts.  

Please read the perks to the right. 

On December 6, 2012 at Boulevard3 in Hollywood, CA at 7:30pm, the STiKS ARCADE will thanks to our generous sponsors at Boost Mobile, our media partner CraveOnline, and our celebrity host committee of Janina Gavankar (True Blood); Cobi Jones (MLS soccer star); Michael B. Jordan (The Wire, Friday Night Lights); Mike "The Miz" Mizanin (WWE); LaMorne Morris (New Girl); Scott Porter (Friday Night Lights); Ethan Zohn (Survivor).

*due to constantly changing schedules, we cannot guarantee the attendance of any particular celebrity. You Must be 21+ to attend the event.

We're blessed to have music by DJ Nick Cannon, and our guest list of attendees and surprise performances is growing daily. The event will feature some celebrity head to head gaming battles and showcase almost two dozen classic arcade games ranging from Tetris and Ms. Pac-Man to Galaga and Gauntlet, among many others.

Donate to have the opportunity for an amazing fun filled night of gaming with us and all of our celebrity friends. But for those who cannot attend, your help is still needed and we hope our perks will attract you to give to them worthy causes below.  You will also be able to see some of the excitement LIVE while it is being streamed by craveonline.com.

You can learn more about "us" and the event on our website at www.stiksgaming.com. To contact us directly with any questions please email us at arcade@stiksgaming.com.

The 2 amazing organization your donations will support are K.I.D.S., Oceanside Community Service & The Community Food Bank of New Jersey:

 

www.kidsdonations.org

K.I.D.S. has a unique (and amazing!) 10-1 system matching $10 in products to victims in need for every $1 donated. 

The K.I.D.S. HURRICANE RELIEF EFFORT continues to provide for thousands of children and families who are still struggling from the tremendous losses inflicted by Sandy.

Kids in Distressed Situations (K.I.D.S.) was founded in 1985 with the mission of providing new kid-essentials to children and teens who have been impacted by poverty and tragedy.

Since its inception, K.I.D.S has provided almost 1 billion dollars to help nearly 70 million children. K.I.D.S. has been recognized by Consumers Digest as #1 in the Humanitarian Category in their 2012 Tri-Annual Edition of Top Charities for its spending efficiency. The Chronicle of Philanthropy places K.I.D.S. among the top 2 percent of non-profits in the U.S. 

 

Oceanside Community Service, Inc. (OCS) is an all volunteer registered non-profit established in 1949 to aid those in need within the Community of Oceanside, Long Island and assisting surrounding communities.

Oceanside, Long Island and it's surrounding commmunities were ravaged by not only hurricane sandy but a nor'easter a week later as well.  Everything from homes to businesses to cars to schools were flooded, damaged and destroyed.

Hundreds of thousands lost power in the region and were without power, heat, hot water or garbage pickup.  The damage will in the millions.  See the video above that shows some of the terrible damage to this community.

OCS has already been providing these couragoeus services in the wake of this disaster:

  • Salvaged and transferred 600 cases of sub-zero frozen food from Oceanside High School and transferred to “The INN” (the Interfaith Food Network) which operates 17 soup kitchens and housing for the homeless and battered women and children on Long Island. Oceanside High School lost power for 5+ days and therefore the food would have had to be thrown out. Quick thinking by the Board of Education and the Superintendent of Schools allowed the food to be donated.
  • Coordinated with High School staff and cooked, packed planned delivery routes, got volunteers to knock on doors as well as get drivers to use precious gas to deliver over 7,000 hot Meals to those who had been subsisting on cold food, no heat, no electricity and storm damaged homes whose damages are indescribable – you have to see the pictures to believe it.
  • Set up warming station locally outside of FEMA and Governmental control. FEMA and OEM (Nassau County Emergency Management) facilities were not located where those affected could get to once everyone lost their cars and long gas lines kicked in. We recognized this early on and adjusted to circumstances and were able deliver hot food as noted above.
  • Set up a shopping pantry for residents to come and take  non-perishable food – not MRE”s to sustain families during this crisis.
  • Set up a clothing boutique for those in need of clothes as well as provided cleaning supplies to help in the cleans up.
  • Delivered food by bicycle when the gas lines were long and people out of Town needed food to tide them over.

These volunteers have been phenomenal and need our support.

The Community FoodBank of New Jersey (www.cfbnj.org/sandy )

Today, the FoodBank distributes 39 million pounds of food and groceries a year, ultimately serving 1,500 non-profit programs including 436 programs served by its Partner Distribution Organizations (PDOs). Through their combined efforts, they help to feed 900,000 low-income people in 18 of New Jersey’s 21 counties.

CFBNJ has been distributing over 100,000 lbs of food daily to families displaced by Hurricane Sandy.

The Community FoodBank of New Jersey has been working closely with New Jersey Voluntary Organization Active in Disaster (VOAD), the Red Cross, and the Salvation Army to respond to the needs of the many New Jersey Residents who have been affected by the devastation.

A designated 501(c)(3) charitable organization, the Community Foodbank of New Jersey is a member of Feeding America, the nation’s largest network of food banks, as well as a member of the New Jersey Federation of food banks which includes ourSouthern Branch, the Food Bank of South Jersey, and our three Partner Distribution Organizations (PDOs): FoodBank of Monmouth & Ocean Counties, Mercer Street Friends Food Bank and NORWESCAP Food Bank.

Our Mission

Our mission is to fight hunger and poverty in New Jersey by assisting those in need and seeking long term solutions.  We will engage, educate, and empower all sectors of society in the battle.

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise $35,000 for amazing causes. Please read out perks to the right!  We'll do whatever we can to help you donate!

What will your money do?  Great question! K.I.D.S. needs our help to get neccessities for those hurricane victimes including clothes, books, shoes, undergarments, juvenile products, home goods and homecare products. With the holidays approaching OCS is needs to continue their great work to aid the families of Oceanside and surrounding burroughs with non-perishable food for at least 2 weeks. CFBNJ has been distributing over 100,000 lbs of food daily to families displaced by Hurricane Sandy.

Here are some numbers that show the impact your donations can make!

  •  $20 will provide underwear, socks, a shirt, pants and shoes for four children
  •  $50 can help us provide $500 worth of hygiene products
  •  $110 will help K.I.D.S. distribute 1,000 blankets to victims of Hurricane Sandy
  •  $250 will provide $2,500 worth of winter shoes and bo $500 will provide 2,000 diapers for a shelter serving victims of Hurricane Sandy

  •  $1,000 can help us provide $10,000 worth of warm winter clothing and coats


We can make a big impact and we are hoping we can get your help.

*If you need to make a donation tax deductible, please contact us directly to make your donation at arcade@stiksgaming.com with a phone number we can reach you at.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our efforts with your friends and use indiegogo's share tools to get the word out.

If you do a help us out we might finally admit YOU won that game of Pac-Man we played in '86.
